ESP.ORIGINAL: The Rising Angel
ESP.TRADUIT: 升天使

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pre-War Musical Composition
ESP.TRADUIT: 战前音乐创作

ESP.ORIGINAL:
It's an old composition of a Pre-War song, meant to be played on the piano.
It's titled "I Only Have Eyes for You."
ESP.TRADUIT:
这是一首古老的战前歌曲作品，本来是用钢琴演奏的。
标题是《我只在意你》。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vault 22 Rising Angel Note 1
ESP.TRADUIT: 避难所 22 升天使注 1

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The project labeled Rising Angel has yet to enter its second phase, due to a number of setbacks.
It appears the amount of radiation required for the orchid to grow far exceeds previous projections. Radiation levels have reached a point that personnel are not even allowed in the quarantine area without proper protection.
Unfortunately, this creates a dilemma for our researchers. Use of a radiation suit reduces exposure, but makes it nearly impossible to make use of medical aids. Dr. Allen made the mistake of removing his helmet to ingest his Rad-X, and did not survive the ordeal.
ESP.TRADUIT:
由于遇到一些挫折，名为升天使的项目尚未进入第二阶段。
看来兰花生长所需的辐射量远远超出了之前的预测。辐射水平已经达到了在没有适当保护的情况下甚至不允许人员进入隔离区的程度。
不幸的是，这给我们的研究人员带来了困境。使用防辐射服可以减少暴露，但几乎不可能使用医疗辅助设备。艾伦博士犯了一个错误，他为了摄入辐特宁-X摘下头盔，最终没能幸免于难。

ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I know it feels like the world is conspiring against you. But that's just how it keeps time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我知道你觉得整个世界都在与你作对。但这只是它保持节奏的方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop to take a breath and it'll leave you behind. Try to get ahead and you'll find it stuck in its ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 停下来喘口气，世界就会把你抛在身后。试图超前，却发现它固守成规。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gotta put hope in today, darling. Not for some man from long ago or some future that will never be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得把希望寄托在今天，亲爱的。不为遥远过去的某个人，也不为永远不会到的未来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the kind of love you hold onto. That's the kind of hope that can never tell a lie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这才是你该抓住的那种爱。这才是永远不会说谎的希望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you go on and get back to adventuring. I've got to see the owner about this gosh darn jukebox!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你上路回去继续冒险吧。我得去找老板谈谈这个该死的点唱机！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I may be a man of God, but even I have my limits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我虽然是个牧师，但我也有我的极限。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unnggh...Where are we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔...我们在哪儿？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Darn it to heck, I swear this infernal jukebox never plays what I want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是见了鬼，我发誓这鬼点唱机从来不放我想听的歌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there darling. Miss me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，亲爱的。想我了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Here I go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，我来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: This floor looks promising...let's see what we have over here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地板看起来不错...让我们看看这里有什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh my god, look! I think I can see it, way in the back. Bright as an angel! That has to be our orchid!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦我的天，看那儿！我想我看到了，就在后面。亮得像天使！那一定是我们的兰花！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies

ESP.ORIGINAL: Better make sure though. Don't want to walk headfirst into a dust storm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过最好确认一下。不想一头撞进沙尘暴里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do me a favor and check the terminal. I'm gonna see we can't find a button that opens that door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮我个忙，查查终端。我去找找看有没有什么按钮能打开那扇门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you got it open! Good work. Find anything else on that terminal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你把门打开了！干得好。在那终端上还发现了什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's a lead. A vault though? Didn't know the sun spent the night underground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这是条线索。是个避难所？没想到太阳晚上会藏在地下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cole's wife doesn't have much longer. We better get to that vault and fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 科尔的妻子没多少时间了。我们得赶紧去那个避难所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vault 22. Never had a lucky number. Twenty-two's as good as any.
ESP.TRADUIT: 22号避难所。我从来没有幸运数字。22就算一个吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, sorry, just thinking about this lead in Boulder City. Hope we don't miss him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，抱歉，我只是在想着巨石城的这条线索。希望我们别错过了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, we're here. I've been in one of these before, and there's always more going on inside than whatever I'm looking for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，我们到了。我以前进过这样的地方，里面发生的事情总是要比我想找的东西多得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies

ESP.ORIGINAL: So do what you gotta do. I'll keep an eye out for that orchid in the meantime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你做你要做的事吧。我会同时留意那朵兰花。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unggh..where are we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 唔...我们在哪儿？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now if you got caps, that's a different story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有瓶盖，那是另一回事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you change your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，你改变主意了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe we're done here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们这里结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Anger
NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get the fuck away from me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的滚远点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you're Mister Grant's friend, right? How do you like the act?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你是格兰特先生的朋友，对吧？你觉得这个表演怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me and Grant go waaaaay back. Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和格兰特认识很久了。是呀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, maybe I met him last month. But if time is money, for the amount of caps I'm charging him, I feel like I've known him forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，也许上个月才认识他。不过如果时间就是金钱的话，按我收他的瓶盖来看，感觉已经认识他很久了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm getting paid a premium to work here, but the boss still doesn't mind if I call him cheap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里工作工资很高，但老板还是不介意我说他小气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's because I convinced him it makes the gamblers want to take his money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是因为我说服了他，导致赌徒们就想要搞走他的钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh fuck, I've got the meanest hangover.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦我操，我宿醉得厉害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've really gotta stop drinking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的得戒酒了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've had it with drinking. Tell the bartender to get me some orange juice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经喝够酒了。告诉酒保给我来点橙汁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dreamt I pissed on Charlie's grave last night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我昨晚梦到我在查理的坟墓上撒尿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eh, he was probably thirsty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，他可能口渴了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I know you? Shit if you don't look familiar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认识你吗？妈的，你看着真眼熟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it's you. Still palling around at Charlie's old place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是你啊。还在查理的老地方闲逛吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You here to fuck or ask more questions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是来操逼的还是来问更多问题的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me grab a drink first hon, then we'll talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲爱的，先让我喝一杯，然后我们再聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not now sugar, I got a show to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在不行，宝贝，我还有演出要上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there handsome, what can I do you for? A drink, a song, or a story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，帅哥，你想要点什么？一杯酒，一首歌，还是一个故事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there gorgeous, what can I do you for? A drink, a song, or a story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，美女，你想要点什么？一杯酒，一首歌，还是一个故事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I do for you, honey?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要点什么，亲爱的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make it quick, I got another set coming up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快点，我还有一场要上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, I don't know how much longer I can keep this up. Where is that son of a bitch?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，我不知道还能撑多久。那个狗娘养的在哪里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Charlie always said I had one foot in the club, and one foot out the door. Heh, one foot in the club.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查理总是说我一只脚在俱乐部里，一只脚在门外。呵，一只脚在俱乐部里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That cat was always finding ways to rib me about my leg. I'm gonna miss that idiot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那家伙总是找机会取笑我的腿。我会想念那个笨蛋的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not too many cats wet their whistle when Carmen's on stage. So I'm all yours. What can I get you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡门在台上表演的时候，没有多少人润嗓子。所以我全心全意为你服务。你能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need a drink?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要喝一杯吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Long day at work I bet. Well, you've come to right place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌你工作了一整天。好吧，你来对地方了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What'll it be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想来点什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I get you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your poison?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你喜欢喝什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure the lighting is bright enough? We want people to feel safe enough to lose their money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定灯光够亮吗？我们希望人们感到足够安全，能放心地输掉他们的钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, there you are! I was wondering when you would return! What do you think of the renovation!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你来了！我还在想你什么时候回来呢！你觉得装修得怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to see you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Renovations are going splendidly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 装修进行得很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be sure to take in one of our shows. Technically they're just rehearsals, but it's no different than the real thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一定要来看场我们的表演。从技术上讲，它们只是彩排，但跟真实情况没什么不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Carmen once told me that dumb shit was drunk on a dream. Dying's the only real way to sober him up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡门曾告诉我那个傻瓜总是沉醉于梦想之中。只有死亡才是唯一能让他清醒的方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: New in town, huh. Your timing couldn't be better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚来镇上的啊，哼。你来得正是时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pictures are like old motel rooms. No matter what you're looking at, somebody's probably jerked off to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 照片就像旧旅馆房间。不管你在看什么，可能都有人在那打过飞机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say there's about a million ways to die, and you can only choose one. But more often than not, it's not your choice to make.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说有上百万种死法，但你只能选一种。但大多数时候，你根本没得选。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The crazy thing about feral ghouls is, they used to be people like you and me. Well, not exactly like us. We're one of a kind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于狂尸鬼最疯狂的事情是，他们曾经是和你我一样的人。呃，不完全一样。我们是独一无二的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you're in a gun fight, it's never about who's right. It's about who's left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在枪战中，从来不是关于谁是对的（Right）。而是关于谁是活的（Left）。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: With karma, you deserve what you get but you don't always get what you deserve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因果报应，你应该得到你应得的，但你不总是得到你应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know how they call bullets, "rounds?" Well, they ain't round no more. Should call 'em "triangles."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道他们怎么称呼子弹的，“rounds”？好吧，其实它们现在一点也不圆（Round）了。应该叫它们“三角形”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a nice gun you got there. Shoots like what, a thousand triangles per minute? It's a Class A murder machine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你那枪真不错。像是，每分钟射出一千个三角形一样？真是台A级谋杀机器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I once knew a raider who carried the teeth of his victims around his neck. They called him "The Dentist."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾认识一个掠夺者，他把受害者的牙齿挂在脖子上。他们叫他“牙医”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell, I'll eat crow for breakfast, and my words for lunch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼，我要把乌鸦当早餐，把我的言语当午餐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know how Jet makes you faster? Neither do I. But I think it has to do with how it makes you skinny. You're more...aerodynamic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道杰特怎么让你更快吗？我也不知道。但我觉得它可能和让你变瘦有关。让你更...流线型。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some say you shouldn't do chems first thing in the morning. You know what I say? Fuck those people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人说早上不应该第一件事就嗑药。你知道我怎么说吗？操这群人的妈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever, uh, made it with a ghoul? It's on my bucket list. Right under, "make a condom out of a radiation suit."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有，呃，和尸鬼做过？这是我的遗愿清单上的一项。就在“用防辐射服做个避孕套”下面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got two pieces of advice for you. Never tell anyone everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你两条建议。永远不要告诉任何人所有的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you see a bulge in my pants, well, that would be my penis.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你看到我裤子有凸起，呃，那就是我的老二。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of music you like when killing folks? Rock? Country? Thank God for radios, or else we'd have to hear 'em scream.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀人时你喜欢听什么音乐？摇滚？乡村？感谢上帝赐于收音机，否则我们就只能听到他们的尖叫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is something wrong? You look like you just took your temperature. With a cactus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么问题吗？你看起来像刚用仙人掌量过体温。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vincent Vincent, at your service. Accept no imitations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 文森特文森特，为您服务。不接受任何仿冒品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't be a drag, don't be a wet rag. That's what the teens say. Why? Radiation. Fucks up the brain. Makes you say shit that don't make sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要当累赘，不要扫人兴。这是青少年说的。为什么？辐射。它会搞乱大脑。让你说出毫无意义的屁话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll get off on the wrong foot to back the wrong horse while it barks up the wrong tree.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会起错步，押错宝，还会干错人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Life, buckaroo. Ain't it grand? But death...death is no small thing either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 生活，哥们儿。难道不美妙吗？但是死亡...死亡也不是小事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got a good eye for hunting. Two good ones in fact. At least, when I have my glasses on. The other two are just lazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在打猎方面有只火眼金睛。实际上有两只。至少，戴上眼镜的时候是这样。其他两只眼睛就有点懒了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wanna know how I keep my gun hand steady? It's right in the name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想知道我是怎么保持拿枪的手稳定的吗？答案就在名字里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got a spring in your step, I got a storm in my pants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你走路带风，我裤子里带雨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They call me Vincent-Vincent, so nice they named me twice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们叫我文森特-文森特，这么好的名字，给我取了我两次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I ever found a genie in a bottle, you know the first thing I'm wishing for? Being more careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我在瓶子里找到了精灵，你知道第一个愿望我会许什么吗？更加小心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever tried a Brahmin steak burrito? Stuff will make you shit razor blades.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试过布拉曼牛排卷饼吗？这东西会让你拉出刀片来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's two kinds of people in this world. Those who think chems are great, and those who are wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世界上有两种人。一种人认为嗑药很棒，另一种人是错误的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: War. War never changes. Except for all the parts that are different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战争。战争永不改变。除了所有不同的部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What has one eye, four lips, and one mouth? Let's just make sure the answer isn't "Us."
ESP.TRADUIT: 一只眼睛，四张嘴唇，一个嘴巴的东西是什么？我们只需要确保答案不是“我们”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sky's the limit. Ground's the average.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天空是极限，地面是常态
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'm wasted. But I'll need another shot to confirm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我喝醉了。但我需要再来一杯确认一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's your favorite chem? I know you got a favorite. Everyone's got a favorite. Wait, don't tell me...it's all of them, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你最喜欢的毒品是什么？我知道你有最爱。每个人都有最爱。等等，别告诉我...全都是，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My gun only knows two words. Rat and Tat. But you best believe people listen to what it has to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的枪只知道两个词。嘣和哒。但你最好相信人们会听它说的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not big on conspiracies. The people in charge got nothing to hide. After all, if they make the rules, it's legal for them to fuck you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太相信阴谋。掌权者没有什么好隐藏的。毕竟，如果他们制定规则，乱搞你就是合法的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When in doubt, buckaroo, aim for the crotch. Never fails.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你感到怀疑时，哥们儿，瞄准裆部。这始终可靠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sugar bombs, bucko. Hundreds of years old, but tastes like it was made yesterday. That's American ingenuity, right there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 糖衣炮弹，老兄。已经几百年了，但味道就像昨天做的一样。这就是美利坚智慧，就在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most ankle-biters don't make it past their tenth birthday. Not to worry. You just make more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数熊孩子过不了十岁生日。不用担心。你只需要多造一些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at you, wearing a nice suit. You're a goddamn pussy magnet is what you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看你，穿着一身漂亮的西装。你他妈的就是个小穴磁铁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at you, wearing a nice dress. You're a goddamn cock magnet is what you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看你，穿着一身漂亮的裙子。你他妈的就是个老二磁铁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bust a cap, then bust a nut, that's my motto.
ESP.TRADUIT: 射击，然后射精，这是我的座右铭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: For the record, my dice ain't that fuzzy. Just gotta get 'em waxed every now and then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就记录而言，我的骰子并不那么模糊。只是需要时不时擦一擦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't count your chickens before they hatch. Choke 'em instead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要高兴得太早。得扼杀在摇篮里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: They said on Sunday, God rested. And on Monday, he went back to jerking off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说星期天，上帝休息了。星期一，他又回来打飞机了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say a good cowboy comes right out the womb. Guess who put him there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说一个好牛仔一出生就注定了。猜猜是谁让他来到这世上的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't shoot for the moon, shoot for the vein.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别对月球开枪，对静脉开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paranoia is another word for being too smart for your own good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 偏执只是聪明过头的另一种说法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hickory, dickory, dock, the Wastes can suck my cock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滴答滴答钟声响，废土嗦我老二爽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doing chems is like turning your eyeballs around and getting a look inside your head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗑药就像把眼球转过来，看看你脑袋里面是啥样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever tell a joke to a midget? It usually goes over their heads.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对一个侏儒讲笑话了吗？这通常会超出他们的理解范围。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're keeping real busy. Busier than a one-armed monkey with three peckers. I like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的很忙。比只有一条手臂但有三个老二的猴子还忙。我喜欢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I once met a wastelander who told me he had ants in his pants. What a load of hooey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经遇到过一个废土游民，他告诉我他裤子里有蚂蚁。真是胡说八道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I fear ants? I wouldn't call it that. More like I respect their power.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我害怕蚂蚁吗？我不会这么称呼它。更像是我尊重它们的力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The beauty of ants is that they're smart, but they don't over-think things either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蚂蚁的美妙之处在于它们很聪明，但它们也不会过度思考。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ant colony I'm studying isn't too far from here. Every day the nest grows bigger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在研究的蚁群离这里不太远。每天蚁巢都会变大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You! Keep your hands where I can see them and we won't have trouble!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你！把你的手放在我能看见的地方，我们就不会有麻烦了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can stitch you up, but it'll cost you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以给你缝合伤口，但是需要你花点钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got pricing plans for some of the more expensive surgeries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一些更昂贵的手术的定价计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not now, I'm busy. Meet me at the Drive-In, we'll talk there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在不行，我正忙着呢。到汽车影院见我，我们在那里谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look over there, at that big white space! Tell me, what do you see?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看那边，那一大片白色的地方！告诉我，你看到了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: But maybe that's where you can help us. We need enough paint to fill this entire screen. The problem is we don't have any money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但也许你可以帮我们。我们需要足够的颜料来填满整个屏幕。问题是我们没钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've done well, my protege, and this masterpiece is proof of your labors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做得很好，我的徒弟，这幅杰作就是你辛勤劳作的证明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You deserve to pat yourself on the back. I'd do it myself, but it saves time if you do it for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你值得自我表扬一下。我本来可以自己做，但你替我做的话会节省时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you done what I asked?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你完成我交代的事情了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在有什么事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If Pollock says you're okay, then we can talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果波洛克说你没问题，那我们就可以谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gumdrop [11002DF0] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to Pollock, I just do the painting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去找波洛克谈，我只负责画画。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chainsaw [110030DB] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gumdrop [11002DF0] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gumdrop [11002DF0] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chainsaw [110030DB] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chainsaw [110030DB] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Old Man Johnson may be dead, but I ain't running that store.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老约翰逊可能死了，但我不会经营那家店。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need something fixed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要修理什么东西吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need supplies, check inside the station. If you need something repaired, you're already in the right place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要物资，就去站点里面看看。如果你需要修理什么东西，你已经来对地方了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I do for you?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You lose someone too? I know the feeling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也失去过某个人吗？我懂那种感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You a friend of Art's? I'm sorry for your loss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是艾特的朋友吗？节哀顺变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Goodsprings Settler [1100494F] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'll take care of the rest. Why don't you head on over to the bar and toast his memory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们会处理剩下的事情。为什么你不去酒吧向他致敬呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Goodsprings Settler [1100494F] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks again for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次感谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Goodsprings Settler [1100494F] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mornin'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早上好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Afternoon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下午好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Evening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 晚上好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The storm's coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 暴风雨要来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I ask you something? Have you ever seen or met the owner of this nightclub?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能问你些事吗？你有见过这家夜总会的店主吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, why must it be so dark in here? I nearly hit my knee on that chair.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，这里怎么非要这么黑？我差点把膝盖撞到那张椅子上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might want to try the singer, at least when she's not on stage. I heard her cousin knew the owner quite well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能想尝试一下这位歌手，至少当她不在舞台上时。听说她表弟跟店主很熟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll stay here and keep an eye out for any wealthy looking patrons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会留在这里留意任何看起来富有的顾客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there, cowboy. Ready to saddle up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，牛仔。准备好上马了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there, cowgirl. Ready to saddle up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，女牛仔。准备好上马了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back again? You can't get enough of me, can you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又回来了？你对我真是欲罢不能，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got my caps or what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你拿到了我的瓶盖还是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Carmen once told me that dumb shit was drunk on a dream. Dying's the only real way to sober him up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡门曾告诉我那个傻瓜总是沉醉于梦想之中。只有死亡才是唯一能让他清醒的方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you looking at?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在看什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angry Patron [11004CFD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You going into Gomorrah? Watch out for that new girl Alice, she's a real cunt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要去蛾摩拉吗？小心那个新来的女孩爱丽丝，她真是个混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angry Patron [11004CFD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even a Freeside whore is better than what they got in that Omerta run piece of shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使是自由城的妓女，也比她们在黑手党经营的狗屎里的待遇更好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angry Patron [11004CFD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Disgust
