ESP.TRADUIT: 你在看什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angry Patron [11004CFD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something I can do for ya friend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能为你的朋友做点什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paladin, paladin, where do you roam! Paladin, paladin, far, far from home!
ESP.TRADUIT: 白乐定，白乐定，你漫游何方！白乐定，白乐定，你远离家乡！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have gun will travel reads the card of a man! A knight without armor in a savage laaaaaand!
ESP.TRADUIT: 身怀单枪会遍英雄好汉 ，赤手空拳不畏龙潭虎穴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note

ESP.ORIGINAL: His fast gun for hire heeds the calling wind, a soldier of fortune is the man called, paaaladin!
ESP.TRADUIT: 快枪利眼闯过惊涛骇浪 ，这个豪杰就叫做白乐定！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paladin, paladin, where do you roam! Paladin, paladin, far, far from home!
ESP.TRADUIT: 白乐定，白乐定，你漫游何方！白乐定，白乐定，你远离家乡！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He travels on to wherever he must! A chess knight of silver is his badge of trust!
ESP.TRADUIT: 云游四方去往唤他之地，银白骑士是他信任徽章！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are campfire legends that the tradesman spin, of the man with the gun, of the man called Paladin!
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇工巧匠编唱传奇故事，来歌颂枪手名为白乐定！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Paladin, paladin, where do you roam! Paladin, paladin, far, far from home!
ESP.TRADUIT: 白乐定，白乐定，你漫游何方！白乐定，白乐定，你远离家乡！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, here he is. "Charlie Hardy, Died Decemeber of 2280. No known kin." Yup, a good man, that Charlie!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，他在这里。 “查理·哈迪，卒于 2280 年 12 月。没有已知的亲属。”是呀，查理可是个好人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny how they left out the part about him being a low down, no good son of a bitch! ha-ha-ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞笑的是，他是个卑鄙无耻的混蛋这一部分，他们怎么就忽略了呢？哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! I didn't know this was a party! Hola muchachos! Donde esta...beer-o!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！我不知道这是一个派对！你好啊老铁们！啤酒在哪个地儿呢！（西班牙语）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess they don't speak Spanish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜他们不会说西班牙语。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah well, guess it's just you and me tonight. Back to the saloon!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊好吧，我猜今晚只有你和我了。回沙龙去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Howdy stranger, take a seat by the campfire. It's a long way from here to town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好陌生人，来篝火旁找个位置坐下吧。从这里到镇上还有很长的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honest to god, you keep yourself as busy as a cat on a hot tin roof. Mind if I join you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说，你让自己忙得像热锅上的蚂蚁一样。我可以加入你吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Strong shoulders are good for lifting spirits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 强壮的肩膀有助于振奋精神。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Life's all about breaks. You gotta know when to make 'em and when to take 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 生活就是关于休息的。你得知道何时抽身，何时休息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've said it's always good to be thorough. In this life, if you cut corners, you get cornered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说过做事要做彻底。在生活中，如果你走捷径，你会被困住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chin up sugar, you'll never reach the sky if you're always looking down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 振作起来，宝贝，如果你总是低头看着地面，就永远无法触及天空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Strong as oak, sweet as honeysuckle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坚强如橡木，甜美如忍冬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every dog's got a few fleas, even you and me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每只狗都会有几只跳蚤，甚至你和我也一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your arms wide and your spirits high.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保持双臂张开，精神饱满。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: We heading out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们出发吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where to next partner?
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一站是哪里，伙伴？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where to next partner? Seeing as my business is done, I got nowhere to be. Feels pretty good, to be honest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一站是哪里，伙伴？既然我的事情做完了，我就没什么地方要去了。说实话，感觉挺不错的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some days you feel like doing nothing, but that'll just leave you feeling empty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些日子你就是什么都不想做，但那只会让你感到空虚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My motto is, if you ain't got anything nice to say, don't say anything at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的座右铭是，如果你没有什么好话要说，那就别说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You hear what the chatty cat said to the tongue? I just don't get you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听到那个话痨猫对舌头说什么了吗？我真搞不懂你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Long time, no see partner. You going solo this time or you want to head out together?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好久不见伙伴。你这次要一个人走，还是想一起出发？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haven't seen you in a coon's age! You fixing for a companion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好久不见啦！你在找个伴吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rise and shine bright eyes! Early bird gets the worm!
ESP.TRADUIT: 起床啦，亮眼睛！早起的鸟儿有虫吃！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always say a good day starts with a healthy smile. And maybe a side of bacon if you got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我总说美好一天从健康的微笑开始。如果可以的话，也许再来点培根吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Out here, a good night's sleep is as scarce as hen's teeth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里，能睡好的觉可比鸡的牙齿还少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think? NCR, or Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得呢？NCR，还是军团？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bill done hit his head on something hard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比尔把头碰到硬东西上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's it going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 过得怎样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you believe this mope?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能相信这个消沉鬼吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just having a drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是喝了一杯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I need is a good beer and a free jukebox.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只需要一杯好啤酒和一个免费点唱机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do me a favor and bring us a few drinks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮个忙，给我们带几杯饮料来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E98] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E98] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Move along wastelander.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走开，废土游民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E97] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're a little busy. Talk to Ranger Jackson if you're looking for work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有点忙。如果你在找活干，去找游骑兵杰克逊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E97] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E98] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E98] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E99] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E9A] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I'm a little busy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我有点忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E9A] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't talk right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在不能说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E9A] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what'll you have?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你要点什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartender [1100922F] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back around? What'll it be this time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又回来了？这次想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartender [1100922F] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么帮你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartender [1100922F] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Howdy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My girl can be stubborn at times, but if you've met her father, it's hard not to see why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的女孩有时候很固执，但如果你见过她父亲，就很难不明白为什么了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The food here isn't bad, but we mostly come here to relax and talk things out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的食物还不错，但我们大多是来这里放松和聊天的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're getting married in a few months. Give or take. We don't have a date.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们几个月后结婚。大概。我们还没有确定日期。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think we need any family there anyway. It's our day, not theirs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反正我觉得我们不需要家人在场。这是我们的日子，不是他们的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11F] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能为你做点什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B289] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B289] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Morning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早上好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B289] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good afternoon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下午好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B289] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Evening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 晚上好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B289] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B288] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good afternoon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下午好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Morning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早上好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Evening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 晚上好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能为你做点什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I'm a little busy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我有点忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't talk right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在不能说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE35] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE87] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't talk right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在不能说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE87] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I'm a little busy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我有点忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE87] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE88] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My job is to make sure Cafferty makes it to California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的工作是确保卡弗提迪安全到达加利福尼亚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mercenary [1100CA96] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Took this job as a favor. Normally I don't work with his kind. And by "his kind" I mean paranoid assholes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就当帮个忙接下这项工作。通常我不和他这种人打交道。“他这种人”是指偏执的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mercenary [1100CA96] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mercenary [1100CA96] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you? What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？你想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cafferty [1100CA98] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You try anything funny and Brooks will blow your brains out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要是耍花招，布鲁克斯会把你的脑袋打掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cafferty [1100CA98] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got my good eye on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会盯着你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cafferty [1100CA98] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I might just blow my last wad on some chems and hookers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我可能会把最后一点钱花在毒品和妓女身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDA7] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The dancers here just don't do it for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的舞者对我没吸引力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDA7] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDAB] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Need something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDAB] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our luck's about to change, I can feel it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要转运了，我能感觉到！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDC] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My husband's busy losing all our money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我丈夫正忙着把我们所有的钱都输光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDF] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDF] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Smart move. Those Legion assholes are bad news.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明智之举。那些军团混蛋很可怕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCD] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad you killed him. I would've done it myself if my pal here wasn't such a chicken shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴你杀了他。如果我这家伙不是个胆小鬼，我自己就会动手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCD] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks. Truth is, killing him was probably the smart thing to do. I just didn't have the nerve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。实际上，杀了他可能是明智的选择。我只是没有勇气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, we've got a problem maybe you can help us with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我们可能有一个问题，也许你可以帮帮我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're crazy letting him go free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你疯了，竟然放他走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCD] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't say I didn't warn you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别说我没警告过你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCD] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you've decided to let him go. Well, I hope you know what you're doing. Either way, my friend and I are glad to have him off our hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你决定放他走了。好吧，我希望你知道自己在做什么。无论如何，我和我的朋友都很高兴摆脱他了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your funeral.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是你的葬礼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCD] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'd save us a whole lot of heartache if you could figure out what to do with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能想出对付他的办法，就会让我们少很多烦恼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I say we just shoot him. Right in the head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说我们就开枪打死他。直接往头上打。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCD] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You saw what they did to Nipton. They're just a bunch of animals, and we need to treat them that way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到他们对尼普顿做了什么。他们只是一群野兽，我们必须那样对待他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCD] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: If this guy isn't Legion, then why is he still wearing the armor? I don't trust him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这家伙不是军团的人，那他为什么还穿着军团护甲？我不信任他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCD] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem unsure of how to proceed. Be wary. Hesitation brings consequences.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你似乎不确定该如何继续。要谨慎。犹豫会带来后果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The profilgates were careless. And now they're dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些放荡者太粗心了。现在他们都死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you don't mind, I'd like to ask you a question about that...thing outside. The dinosaur.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不介意，我想问你一个关于外面那个... 恐龙的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 万岁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I live so that I may serve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我生来是为了服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What troubles you, profilgate?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么困扰你，放荡者？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I follow and I serve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟从并服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: HELLO
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey Jack, when are we gonna hire some new people around here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿杰克，我们什么时候才能在这里雇些新人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're quite a pair, aren't we Jack?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们真是一对啊，对吧杰克？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what happened to your cousin anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你表亲到底怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: REMOVED - Them Jackal Gangers leave me be. Probably because I got ant pheromones all over my body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已删除 - 那些豺狼匪帮就让我自生自灭吧。可能是因为我的身上都是蚂蚁信息素。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: REMOVED - Don't make the ant queen angry. You wouldn't like her when she's angry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已删除 - 不要惹怒蚂蚁女王。她生气时你会后悔的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm just pulling your leg. There's no way anyone would ever stop liking ants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我只是在开玩笑。没人会停止喜欢蚂蚁的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: REMOVED - Don't touch my ants. I've been known to do crazy things to people who touch my ants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已删除 - 不要碰我的蚂蚁。有人曾经告诉我，碰我蚂蚁的人会遭报应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: REMOVED - Someone once told me I look antsy. That has to be the finest compliment I ever done got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已删除 - 有人曾经告诉我，我看起来很焦虑。这肯定是我收到的最好的夸奖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: REMOVED - They say ants are one of God's creatures. Lose the "creature" part and you're closer to the truth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已删除 - 他们说蚂蚁是上帝的创造物之一。去掉"创造物"一词，你就接近真相了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: REMOVED - Someone once told me I look antsy. That has to be the finest compliment I ever got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已删除 - 有人曾经告诉我，我看起来很焦虑。这肯定是我收到的最好的夸奖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some days you feel like doing nothing. But that'll just leave ya feeling empty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些日子你就是什么也不想做。但那只会让你感觉空虚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always say, a good day starts with a healthy smile. And maybe a side of bacon if you got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我总说美好一天从健康的微笑开始。如果可以的话，也许再来点培根吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Out here, a good night's sleep is as scarce as hen's teeth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里，能睡好的觉可比鸡的牙齿还少。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's your turn to fiddle with the jukebox.
ESP.TRADUIT: 轮到你去摆弄点唱机了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think this bar was like? Before the war, I mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得这个酒吧以前是什么样子的？我指战前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is this town called Goodsprings anyhow? Ain't nothing good about it. It doesn't make a lick of sense if you ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个镇子为什么叫清泉镇（Goodsprings）？这地方一点也不好（Good）。如果你问我，这一点也不合理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thing is, I've lost half of it, so I figure, what's the point?
ESP.TRADUIT: 事情是，我已经失去了一半，所以我想，有什么意义呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you so worried about appearances, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么这么担心外表呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, how much you making from that side job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你从那份兼职挣了多少钱？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: How much you think a Honus Wagner rookie card would be worth?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得霍纳斯·瓦格纳的新秀卡能值多少钱？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger
NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger
NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger
NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger
NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise
NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled
NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still trying to figure out what to get Margaery for Christmas. Unfortunately "psychiatric help" is not an option.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还在想要给玛格丽买什么圣诞礼物。不幸的是，“心理咨询”不在选项之列。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E97] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's the wife?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的妻子好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E97] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: The other day Margaery sent me money for my birthday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前几天玛格丽给我寄了生日礼金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E97] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ergh...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E97] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: You hear that gunfire last night? Couldn't have been more than two miles out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你昨晚听到枪声了吗？不可能超过两英里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E99] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know how you do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你是怎么做到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E99] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E99] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you heading out to the Strip when your tour's over?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你结束巡回演出后去长街吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E99] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happens if they don’t come for the dam? What if they go for something else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们不来夺取大坝怎么办？他们会去抢别的什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E99] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You hear what they're saying out in town? Some hero is out walking the wastes, solving people's problems. Like a real life Wyatt Earp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说城里在传什么吗？有个英雄在废土中晃荡，解决人们的问题。像个真实版的怀特厄普一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11006D0B] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: How many more years you think we got John? Ten, twenty?
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰，你觉得我们还有多少年？十年，二十年？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11006D0B] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: John, was it you who gave me that Bible?
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰，是你给我那本圣经的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11006D0B] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is Clancy still up for tomorrow?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克兰西明天还上吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Face Wrap Armor [1100877D] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What made you join the priesthood anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你当初为什么加入牧师行列的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11006D0B] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what did the Sergeant say? You're my friend John, you can tell me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那军士长说了什么？约翰，你是我的朋友，可以告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11006D0B] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why does the military need a chaplain anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 军队为什么需要牧师？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11006D0B] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: So do I call you chaplain now or just John?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在是叫你牧师还是只叫约翰？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11006D0B] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: So are you gonna invite him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你会邀请他吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what did he do to you that's so bad?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么他对你做了什么那么糟糕？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Play a game with me. Just one, come on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和我玩个游戏吧。就一个，拜托。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about Vegas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对维加斯有什么看法？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just saying, your father getting you a gecko for your birthday isn't the worst thing in the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是说，你父亲给你生日送了只蜥蜴并不是世界上最糟糕的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's too much graf around here. What we should be doing is hanging more corpses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里涂鸦太多了。我们应该多挂些尸体才对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11F] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who do you think would win a fight between four dogs and a Deathclaw?
ESP.TRADUIT: 四只狗和一只死亡爪哪个会赢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11F] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really need to kill something. Anything. It’s been too long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的需要杀点东西。任何东西都行。已经过了太久了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11F] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Disgust
NPC : [1100A11F] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Susan, I think I've achieved a new scientific breakthrough!
ESP.TRADUIT: 苏珊，我觉得我取得了一个新的科学突破！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B288] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Isn't it interesting how mirelurks are bipedal? Do you think it's possible we need to classify them differently?
ESP.TRADUIT: 泥沼蟹是两足动物，这不是挺有趣的吗？你觉得我们需要重新分类它们吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B288] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Surprise
NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B288] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: The harvest is gonna be smaller than usual. Everyone's saying it's gonna be a rough season.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收成会比平时少。大家都说这会是个艰难的季节。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever think of how remarkable it is? We damn near blew up the world, and we're still here. Fighting. Every single day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有想过这有多了不起？我们几乎毁了世界，但我们还在这里。每一天都在战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about taking a trip? It's been a while since we've stepped out of town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对出去旅行有什么看法？我们已经很久没出城了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what people are saying about you, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道人们在怎么谈论你，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Surprise
NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do they call 'em "potato crisps?" Aren't they potato chips?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们为什么叫它们“薯片”呢？它们不是薯条吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE87] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is Clancy still up for tomorrow?
ESP.TRADUIT: 克兰西明天还上吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE87] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's in this drink?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这饮料里有什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE87] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think I'm getting drunk fast enough for my liking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我喝醉的速度还不够快，不太符合我的口味。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE87] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Disgust
NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE87] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sure it's safe here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定这里安全吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cafferty [1100CA98] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm telling you, I don't like the way that guard was looking at me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉你，我不喜欢那个警卫看我的眼神。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cafferty [1100CA98] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard them talking about feral ghouls living nearby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到他们在谈论附近有狂尸鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cafferty [1100CA98] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, but what if the ghouls they're talking about aren't really feral? Like there's a community of people like me living there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，但如果他们谈论的那些尸鬼并不真的是发狂的呢？就像有一个像我这样的人群居住在那里一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cafferty [1100CA98] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you get into this line of work anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么入这行的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cafferty [1100CA98] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard something's snatching cattle at night. What if they blame me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说晚上有东西在偷牛。如果他们怪到我头上了怎么办？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cafferty [1100CA98] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I might just blow my last wad on some chems and hookers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我可能会把最后一点钱花在毒品和妓女身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDA7] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: The dancers here don't do it for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的舞者不吸引我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDA7] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad
NPC : [1100CDA7] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad
NPC : [1100CDA7] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we oughta try a different casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们应该尝试一家不同的赌场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDF] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I get that playing cards and pulling slots is fun, but don't you get tired of losing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道打牌和拉拉杆很有趣，但你不厌倦一直输钱吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDF] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have to tip the dealer so much?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定要给荷官那么多小费吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDF] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you think Lady Luck is a woman?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么认为幸运女神是女性？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDF] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe you hit on sixteen!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我简直不敢相信你会在16点要牌！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDF] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: My motto is, if you ain't got something nice to say, don't say anything at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的座右铭是，如果你没有什么好话要说，那就什么都别说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Long time no see partner. You going solo this time, or do you want to head out together?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好久不见伙伴。你这次要一个人走，还是想一起出发？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haven't seen you in a coon's age. You fixing for a companion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好久不见了。你在找个伴吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You hear what the chatty cat said to the tongue? "I just don't get you."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听到那个话痨猫对舌头说什么了吗？”我真搞不懂你。“
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We heading out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们出发吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where to next, partner?
ESP.TRADUIT: 下一站去哪，伙伴？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rise and shine, bright eyes, early bird gets the worm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 起床啦，亮眼睛，早起的鸟儿有虫吃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to go now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you see my cousin, you tell her to come buy me a drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你见到我表亲时，告诉她来请我喝一杯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be careful out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在外面要小心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: See ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早点回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course. Remember, you're always welcome here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。记住，这里随时欢迎你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to go now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you feel a lump in your throat, it's not love. It's probably a serious disease.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你感觉喉咙有肿块，那不是爱情，那很可能是严重的疾病。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't forget to tell your friends about me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别忘了向你的朋友们介绍我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那就这样吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chainsaw [110030DB] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: See ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chainsaw [110030DB] (mod) NPC : Gumdrop [11002DF0] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gumdrop [11002DF0] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: See ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh-huh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for lending an old man an ear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你愿意听一个老头子唠叨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Safe travels friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一路顺风，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Farewell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember, a deal's a deal. Don't tell my cousin what I'm doing here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住，说话算话。别告诉我表亲我在这里做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, if you see my cousin, do me a favor and don't tell her I'm here. She wouldn't get it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，如果你见到我表亲，帮个忙别告诉她我在这里。她是不会理解的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember, the Big Horn Saloon is where he'll be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住，大角沙龙就在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Catch ya later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 待会见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那就这样吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your peepers peeled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保持警惕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're the sheriff, and I'm the deputy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是警长，我是副警长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fall, and I'll catch ya. So you pretty much know where I stand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要是跌倒了，我会接住你的。所以你肯定知道我是哪一边的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every day's gonna be like lollipops and roses, so long as we got each other's backs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要我们互相支持，每一天都会像棒棒糖和玫瑰一样美好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm right behind ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就在你身后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Until next time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下次再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartender [1100922F] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Talk to you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以后再谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartender [1100922F] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Me and my friend are gonna talk it over some more. But if you wanna make it easier on us, be my guest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。我和我的朋友还要再商量一下。但如果你想让事情变得更容易点，那就请便吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vale. Until we meet again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。等我们再次相遇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then let us proceed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么让我们继续吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough questions for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在问题问够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let all be vanquished under our might.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让一切都在我们的力量下被征服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough questions for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在问题问够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: In hoc signo taurus vinces.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以这金牛标志为胜。（拉丁语）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough questions for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在问题问够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Divide et impera.
ESP.TRADUIT: 分而治之。（拉丁语）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough questions for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在问题问够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Towns like these are like rabbits in a world full of foxes. The more it grows, the more filling the meal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样的城镇就像狐狸世界中的兔子。它发展得越壮大，狐狸们就能吃得越饱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This motel is typical of NCR rule. It sits right outside their camp, and they don't even bother to find out what goes on inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家汽车旅馆典型地展现了NCR的统治。它就坐落在他们的营地外面，他们甚至都懒得去了解里面发生了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: So with war fast approaching, troopers come to this bar and impair their judgment...on purpose?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以随着战争快速临近，士兵们来到这个酒吧并削弱他们的判断力...是故意的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: The more I learn about the NCR, the more confused I get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我了解NCR越多，就越感到困惑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Strange that a town this small and this open is able to defend its perimeter. Either the guards are strong or their hunters are bored.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇怪的是，一个这么小又这么开放的城镇竟然能够守住它的周界。要么是守卫很强大，要么是猎人们很无聊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Monuments like these puzzle me. These men made no great sacrifice. Fighting to the death is one's duty as a soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像这样的纪念碑让我感到困惑。这些人并没有做出伟大的牺牲。战斗至死是一个士兵的职责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you show mercy, this is the result.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你施以怜悯时，就会有这样的结果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: A punishment should be an example...a message to all that sin will not be tolerated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 惩罚应该是一个典范...是对所有人的警示，告诉他们罪行不会被容忍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: The lottery has a purpose. It's not to set a man free. It's to spread the word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抽奖有其目的。它不是为了释放一个人。而是为了传播这个消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vulpes Inculta. The cruel fox. A man with his reputation normally sticks to the shadows, but he is as capable a warrior as the next man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赤狐因库塔。残忍之狐。一个人如果有这样的声誉，通常会待在阴影中，但他和其他人一样是一位能干的战士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Killing Vulpes will send a clear message to Caesar. The only question is how he will respond.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死赤狐会向凯撒发出明确的信号。唯一的问题是他会如何回应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's definitely some strange things growing in this vault. I'm just not sure they came out of the ground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个避难所里肯定有些奇怪的东西在生长。我只是不确定它们是不是从地里长出来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nipton isn't too far from here. We can make it there and back before the sun comes up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尼普顿离这里不太远。我们可以在太阳升起之前赶到那里然后返回。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: This farm gives me the creeps. Feels like the animals are all staring at us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个农场让我感到毛骨悚然。感觉动物们都在盯着我们看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I get why Ghost is frustrated. Sometimes it feels like the Legion could be sitting on your porch and the NCR would rather wait until they got inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我理解幽灵为什么这么沮丧。有时候感觉像是军团可以坐在你家门廊上，而NCR宁愿等到他们进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: A lottery? What's he blabbing on about? I don't like this one bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抽奖？他在胡言乱语什么？我一点都不喜欢这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe we survived that. We should check the crosses, see if anyone survived.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我简直不敢相信我们幸存了下来。我们应该检查一下十字架，看看还有没有人幸存。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hard to let a bunch of murderers walk away, but we gotta be smart. Besides, the good Lord will make sure they get theirs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让一群凶手逍遥法外很困难，但我们必须聪明点。再说了，上帝会确保他们得到报应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: It doesn't matter what they did, or who they were. You don't put people to the cross. You bear it, same as Jesus did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管他们做了什么，或者他们是谁。你不能把人钉在十字架上。你要像耶稣一样忍受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I feel like he's telling us right now we need to put an end to the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得他现在在告诉我们，我们需要把军团终结。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: So the troopers at Camp Searchlight all turned to ghouls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以探照灯营地的士兵都变成了尸鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a shame we can't return the bodies, but bringing those dogtags back to their families will mean a lot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能把尸体带回去真是遗憾，但把那些狗牌带回给他们的家人意义重大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad you found it in your heart to forgive Benny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴你能从心底原谅本尼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the Lord forgives, it's not about saying what he did was okay. It's more about liberating yourself from all that hate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当主原谅的时候，并不意味着他所做的事情没问题，而更多是为了从那些仇恨中解脱出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you had to kill Benny. Just be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你不得不杀了本尼。小心一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You let that hate boil inside you, and one day it'll consume you. Sometimes the better path is to forgive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你让那种仇恨在你心中煮沸，总有一天它会吞噬你。有时候原谅才是更好的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad the NCR got control of their prison. Let's just hope they're a little smarter about how they run it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴NCR控制了他们的监狱。希望他们在管理上能更聪明些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to come back here and find the Powder Gangers turned to Gang-Bangers because the guards decided to give 'em all machine guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想再回来这里发现火药帮已经变成了黑帮，因为警卫决定给他们所有人机关枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: The problem with some folks is, whether it's energy or water or a pat on the back, you can't just give someone a good thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人的问题在于，无论是能源还是水，或者是一句赞扬，你就不能简单地把好东西给某个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some people are gonna try and sell it, other people are gonna try and steal it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人会试图卖掉它，其他人会试图偷走它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the back of my mind, I kind of figured Logan would try something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我心里，我有点觉得洛根会尝试些什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the Lord says not to judge lest ye be judged. One of these days, I'm gonna prove him right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但主说不要去评判，免得你也被评判。总有一天，我会证明他是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like the NCR was mining this place for gold. But if the town's any indication, it ain't the fever that killed 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来NCR在这个地方开采金矿。如果镇子有任何指示的话，那么他们就不会死于淘金热了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like a power plant. Radiation's high here, but not so bad that we can't look around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来像是个发电厂。这里的辐射很高，但并不糟到我们不能四处看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vipers. They tend to be good with making something out of nothing. And by looking at this cave, they had a lot to work with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毒蛇帮。他们往往善于无中生有。从这个洞穴的情况看，他们有很多东西可以利用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: So Benny's at the Tops. Don't know how you wanna play this, but I'll try my best to be your Ace in the hole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以本尼在九重天。不知道你想怎么玩这一手，但我会尽力做你的最后王牌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The terminal says find someone in Nipton. Given what happened, that might be harder than it sounds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 终端上说要在尼普顿找到某人。考虑到发生过的事情，那可能比听起来的还要糟糕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Searchlight looks like a normal town. But if the NCR set up base there, then Logan's right. There should be a lot of supplies we can use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 探照灯营地看起来像个普通的小镇。但如果NCR在那里设立基地，那么洛根就是对的。我们应该能找到很多可以用的物资。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know why Benny thinks the Legion's gonna keep him safe. That's like a rabbit cuddling a snake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道为什么本尼认为军团会保证他的安全。那就像兔子拥抱着蛇一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not surprised there's ghouls over at REPCONN. I've got nose for radiation, and that place was on my list of stinkers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不奇怪REPCONN有尸鬼。我对辐射挺敏感的，那地方简直臭不可闻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: So Chris thinks he's a ghoul because he lost a few hairs? Sounds to me like an old fashioned mid-life crisis.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以克里斯觉得自己是尸鬼，就因为掉了几根头发？对我来说听起来就像是老式的中年危机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish I knew why you crashed that rocket. But at least we know for sure they're in a better place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我倒是希望知道你为什么要让那枚火箭坠毁。但至少我们知道他们现在在一个更好的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad you sent Jason's flock on their way. The Lord's with 'em in spirit. I know this because he sent them you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴你让杰森的徒众离开了。主与他的精神同在。我知道这是因为主向他们派遣了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the Powder Gangers think they can take on the NCR, they're gonna need more than a few sticks of dynamite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果火药帮认为他们可以对抗NCR，那他们就需要更多的炸药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know the NCR has its issues, but letting the inmates run their asylum is like using a bullet for a band-aid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道NCR有自己的问题，但让囚犯管理他们的疯人院就像把子弹当创可贴一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I get that this guy's selling ashtrays, but he might want to leave out the used cigarette. Unless he's trying to tell us it works.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这家伙在卖烟灰缸，但他最好把抽过的烟头拿出来。除非他想告诉我们这玩意还能用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should see if the elevator's working. Fastest way to the bottom is usually straight down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该看看电梯能不能用。通往底部的最快方式通常是笔直往下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like the residential area. Probably not going to find it here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来是居住区。这里可能找不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a cave at least. And there's stuff growing in places. Well, if it's in this vault, it'd probably be here. Let's look around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这至少是个洞穴。而且有些地方还有东西生长。嗯，如果它在这个避难所里的话，那么它可能就在这里。我们四处看看吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Used to be there wasn't no safer place than a sheriff's own bed. World ain't what it used to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以前警长的床上是最安全的地方。世界已经不是过去的样子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope that new sheriff works out. Primm's one of those places that's hard to feel safe in, no matter who's in charge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望新的警长能发挥作用。普瑞姆是一个很难让人感到安全的地方，无论谁掌管着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: It can get as hot as blue blazes in this town. Saw a guy fry a squirrel on the pavement, no joke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这镇子热得像火炉一样。我见过一个家伙在路面上烤松鼠，我没在开玩笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some people say city folk ain't really clean. Just squeaky. But everyone I've met seems nice enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人说城里人的品行不怎么端正。只是表面上看起来端正。但我遇到的每个人都还挺友好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pa always warned me about bars like this. Said there was a lot of backseat bingo going on, whatever that means.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爸爸总是对我警告这样的酒吧。说里面经常有些不轨之事，不管那是什么意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Gomez fella didn't seem too trustworthy, but you know what they say, the Lord works in mysterious ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个戈麦斯老哥似乎太不可信了，但你知道人们常说，主以神秘的方式行事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just gotta hope it's his hand at work here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只能希望这是他做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Getting dark out, what's the plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 天黑了，有什么计划？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodsprings. I like the name. Ma'd say you can't see the springs or the good by the looking at it, but I like a little bit of optimism.
ESP.TRADUIT: 清泉镇。我喜欢这个名字。妈会说从外表来看，你看不出清澈和泉水，但我喜欢乐观一点点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might find some work over at the saloon. Most people though are just hard at work drinking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许可以在沙龙找点活干。大多数人不过只在努力地喝酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say old Doc Mitchell can patch a stinger off a bee. Most folks are just wondering about the guy who got stung.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说米切尔老医生能把蜜蜂身上的刺拔出来。大多数人只是在想被蜇伤的那个家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: This might be a good place to hole up for the night. Although the smell will get on your clothes faster than a mid-July sunburn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可能是个过夜的好地方。虽然气味会比正七月的日灼更快传到到你的衣服上
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard there's a ghost living on the rooftops here. I ain't afraid of heights, but I think it's best we keep both feet on the ground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说这里的屋顶上住着一个鬼。我可不是怕高啊，但我觉得最好保证双脚都在地面上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place's got more doo-hickeys than a dentist. Best not press any buttons lest things start drilling our teeth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方的小玩意比牙医那还多。最好别按任何按钮，免得有东西开始往我们的牙齿里钻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: This old stop is barely a building. Notice how the beds are out in the open? No one wants to sleep under a roof that'll fall on your head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个老地方连建筑物都算不上。注意到床是露天的了吗？没有人想在会塌下来的屋顶下面睡觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: So were dinosaurs a pre-war thing, or a pre-pre-war thing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以恐龙是战前的东西，还是比战前还要战前的东西？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cause Dinky may look friendly, but judging by those teeth I wouldn't invite him over for dinner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为丁奇看起来可能挺友好的，但看看那些牙齿，我可不会邀请它过来吃晚餐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We all have a cross to bear. In war time, the burden's so big you need a whole regiment to lift it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都有负担要承受。在战争时期，这个负担重得需要你用一整个连队来承担。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: The names here are all the brave men and women who helped carry that weight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里都是勇敢的男男女女的名字，他们帮助扛起了这份重担。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder whose bright idea it was to give the prisoners dynamite. That's like having a death by firing squad, only you give the prisoner the gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道是谁的大聪明主意，把炸药给了囚犯。这就像是行刑队让囚犯自己拿枪来自杀一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want some of this? Huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想尝点这个吗？嗯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hyagh! Hahahaha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨呀！哈哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bleed motherfucker, bleed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 流血吧，操你妈，流血！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lick my tube steak you piece of shit!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mole rats! Watch out for their fucking tusks!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Die you ugly little cocksuckers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 去死吧，你们这些丑陋的小混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: These folks are madder than a wet hen. I say we dry 'em off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些人比泼妇还要疯。我说我们让他们冷静下来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Protect us Lord, and keep us safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主啊，保佑我们，保证我们的安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess it's time to sort out the saints and the sinners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来是时候分清谁是圣人，谁是罪人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, let's send these boys packing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，让我们把这些家伙打发走！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get ready for a fight!
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好战斗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got your back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我护着你后面！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hostiles! Twelve O' Clock!
ESP.TRADUIT: 敌人！12点方向！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: These raiders are fit to be tied. Best be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些掠夺者被激怒了。最好小心点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's raining radscorpions out here. And here I am without an umbrella.
ESP.TRADUIT: 外面在下辐射蝎。而我却没带伞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deathclaws. Well Johnny, fuck me with a guitar and call me Peggy. Because we're about to get raped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 死亡爪。好吧，约翰尼，拿吉他干我吧，然后叫我佩吉。因为我们要被强奸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like that's the last of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来那是他们中的最后一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The rape train has no brakes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这辆强奸列车没有刹车。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like bakin' biscuits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小菜一碟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fish in a...whatya call it...barrel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瓮中捉...什么来着...鳖是吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like we hit them where it hurts. Right in the dick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我们击中了他们的要害。就在命根子上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That fight went as smooth as apple butter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那场战斗顺滑得跟苹果酱一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That, my friend, is how you bring the pain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个，我的朋友，就是你带来痛苦的方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never liked this part. Looting bodies just don't seem right. Then again, it ain't like we're killing saints.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就没喜欢过这一部分。抢劫尸体似乎不对。不过再说了，我们也不是在杀圣人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of these folks have stolen enough caps to burn a wet mule. So it ain't like we're taking what's theirs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些人中的一部分偷的瓶盖都能让鬼推磨了。所以我们并不是在拿走属于他们的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Phew! That was a close one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀！那可真险啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was a tough one. I'm sweating like a fiend in church.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打得真艰苦。我汗出得像个教堂里的魔鬼一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: We take 'em down and let God sort 'em out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们干掉他们了，让上帝去裁决他们吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You certainly saw them coming. You're keener than a three-eyed cat staring at a mousehole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你肯定看到他们来了。你比盯着老鼠洞的三眼猫还要警觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a one way ticket to the frying pan for these folks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对这些人来说，那是通往地狱的单程票。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good fightin'. You barely got a scratch on ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打得不错。你几乎一点伤都没受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh, these poor fools couldn't fight their way out of a wet paper bag.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唉，这些可怜的傻瓜真是软弱无能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was an easy fight. Like hunting elephants on ice skates.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打得挺轻松。就像穿着溜冰鞋狩猎大象一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't much to that fight. They were more scared than a puppy pooping peach seeds if you ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那场战斗没什么了不起的。在我看来，他们比小奶狗还胆小。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You all right? That fight was busier than a one-legged man in butt-kicking contest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没事吧？那场战斗比踢屁股比赛的瘸子还要忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Surprise
