ESP.ORIGINAL: Phew, we sure get in a lot of messes. Well, if you're gonna be stupid, you gotta be tough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀，我们确实陷入了很多麻烦。好吧，如果你要做蠢事，那就要有点蛮劲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dip 'em in bullets and roll 'em in the dirt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喂他们吃饱子弹，再喂他们吃饱土。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这等着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Roger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gotcha.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Following.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to wait here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你在这里等着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's trade equipment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们交易装备吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. What are we trading? Barbs? Because I got a lot of jokes. Dick ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。我们在交换什么？挖苦人的话吗？因为我有很多笑话。荤的那种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. What are we trading? Barbs? Because I got a lot of jokes. Dick ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。我们在交换什么？挖苦人的话吗？因为我有很多笑话。荤的那种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, and throw in a pack of ciggies if you got 'em. Nothing like a smoke after a meal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，如果你有的话，再给我一包烟吧。事后一支烟，赛过活神仙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. What you got?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。你有什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. But no more guns. I need another gun like I need a dick on my elbow. Come to think of it, that might be useful. Gimme.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。但别再给我枪了。多把枪就像手肘上多长出个老二一样。不过想想也是，多一根可能也挺有用的。给我得了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problemo. But do you ever think about...you know...carrying less shit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。但是你有没有想过...你懂的...少带点垃圾玩意？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. But I ain't exactly built like a Big Six. Sure, I got chem strength, but that shit goes quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。但我可没那种壮汉的体格。我能嗑药变强，但那玩意消耗得很快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Just remember you owe me, seeing as I gave you that cold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。记住你欠我的，因为我把感冒传给你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, can do. Might want to wash your hands though. You don't know where I've been.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。不过你最好洗洗手。因为你不知道我去过哪里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, have some mentats. Shit makes you smart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来，整点曼他特。这破玩意让你变聪明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you've got the veins, I've got the drugs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有血管，我就有药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here. Have some steady. Good for the aim, bad for the brain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来。整点稳定剂。对准头好，对大脑不好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh. Got any liquor? I think I'm wasted, but I'll need another shot to confirm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃。有酒吗？我觉得我醉了，但我需要再喝一杯确认一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right on. I got rads, nads, and Fancy Lads. Take your pick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。我有辐射、蛋蛋和俏男孩夹心蛋糕。挑一个吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, weЃfre running low on ammo. If you gave me a dollar for every bullet we got, IЃfd have twenty-five cents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我们子弹快用完了。如果一颗子弹给我一美元，那我就只有二十五美分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所愿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take what you must.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿你必须要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, gonna share some of them spoils? You're so rich I bet you buy a new boat when the other one gets wet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，要分享些战利品吗？你太有钱了，我敢打赌，船打湿了你就会买一艘新的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Make sure you pack enough ammo. You know what they say. Drop a bullet, lose a tooth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。确保带够子弹。你知道俗话说。掉一颗子弹，就少一颗牙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me know if you need any extra clothes. Beds around here are so cold you'll shake like a hound dog on Elvis night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还需要衣服，告诉我。这里的床太冷了，你会像猫王跳的猎犬一样发抖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Much obliged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, take what you need. Some of it is about as useful to me as an ashtray on a motorcycle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，拿你需要的东西。有些东西对我来说就像摩托车上的烟灰缸一样没用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got any food? I'm so hungry my belly thinks my throat's taking a nap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有食物吗？我饿得不行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's mine is yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的就是你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: We probably should get rid of some of our food too. Some of it stinks so bad it could knock a buzzard off a gut wagon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们也许应该把一些食物也扔掉。有些臭得能让秃鹫掉下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You hungry? I'm fixin' to fry up some iguana if you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你饿了吗？如果你饿的话，我准备烤点蜥蜴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got some taters if you need 'em. Bullets too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要的话，我有土豆。子弹也有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, let's trade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我们交换东西吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, might have something you can use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，可能有些东西你能用得上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just think of me as your personal pack brahmin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把我当作你的私人双头牛包吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Picked up some spare shells if you need 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要的话，捡些备用的弹壳吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problem. I was never one for traveling light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。我从来都不轻装旅行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, might want to turn that flashlight on though. Don't wanna grab the wrong thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，不过可能要把手电筒打开。可不想拿错东西了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. I got some bread if you're hungry. Don't eat the tips before the middle though, you'll have trouble making ends meet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。如果你饿了，我有一些面包。不过先别吃两端，不然你就顾不上两头（making ends meet）了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're living in high cotton by the looks of it! Got more caps than a pop store!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你富裕得很！瓶盖比热门店铺还多！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough about tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不说战术了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I keep telling myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是我一直告诉自己的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough about tactics, you're fine as you are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战术方面谈够了，你现在就很好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所愿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your distance. Try to flank them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和他们保持距离。不妨从侧面攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gotcha. I'll keep my distance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 懂了。我会保持距离的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problemo. Flank 'em and shank 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。侧面包抄然后解决他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you command.
ESP.TRADUIT: 遵命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. I'll keep my distance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。我会保持距离的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your distance. Try to flank them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保持距离。尝试侧翼包抄他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，就这样。我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right behind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟在你身后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 了解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的距离不错。让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes ma'am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，女士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that is your wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你这么想的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay close to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 紧跟着我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Affirmative. Close as a ghost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。靠得跟鬼一样近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you command.
ESP.TRADUIT: 遵命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got it. I'll stay close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道了。我会保持靠近的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stick close to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 紧跟着我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've chosen wisely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你选择得很明智。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about how close you're following me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来讨论下你我之间的距离。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Affirmative.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所愿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to use ranged weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你使用远距攻击武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. Reach out and touch 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。伸出手去接触他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所愿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gotcha.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to use ranged weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要你用远程武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Switch to a melee weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 切换到近战武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Kill 'em up close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。近距离干掉他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've chosen wisely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你选择得很明智。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to switch to melee weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要你换成近战武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈点别的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Roger that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所愿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all. Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right behind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在你身后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 了解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to change your combat style.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你改变你的战斗风格。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about your tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们谈谈你的战术吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes ma'am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，女士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you command.
ESP.TRADUIT: 遵命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right behind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就跟在你身后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay large, stay in charge. On the way to roll.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保持强大，掌控全局。继续前进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's kick up some sand bucko. See what we find.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来惹点乱子吧，老兄。看我们能找到什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Following.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正在跟着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们出发吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's hit the trail then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们就出发吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's time for us to part ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们该分道扬镳了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problemo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'll be heading on alone for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我会独自前行一段时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that is your wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你这么想的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we should travel together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我们应该同行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ohhhhhh no-no. No! Bad idea! One goes in, one goes out. Two can't go out! That fucks up the math something serious!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，不，不行！不行！坏主意！一个进去，一个出来。不能两个人都出来！会严重搞乱计划！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the other hand, nine months ago, I knocked up this beat up old raider in exchange for some Jet. I bet you both my fuzzy dice she's having twins!
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一方面，九个月前，为了换点杰特，我跟一个老掠夺者搞上了。我用我的两个骰子挂件打赌，她怀的是双胞胎！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, you convinced me. The math works out. Just say the word, and I'll carry the one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你说服我了。计划能进行。你说了算，我会照办的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could follow me instead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以跟着我了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Just watch out for friendly fire. If my toilet is any indication, I don't have the best aim.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。就是要小心友军火力。如果从我的马桶来看，我的准头并不是最好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ready for more adventures?
ESP.TRADUIT: 准备好迎接更多冒险了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes ma'am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，女士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caveat emptor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 买家需谨慎。（拉丁语）
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come with me, I need your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我来，我需要你的帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our enemies await.
ESP.TRADUIT: 敌人在等着我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come with me, I need your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我来，我需要你的帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I follow and I serve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟从并服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come with me, I need your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我来，我需要你的帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck yeah! Kill those sons of bitches!
ESP.TRADUIT: 真他妈好！杀了那些狗娘养的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yeah, come to papa, you ugly little cunt!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢耶，来爸爸这里，你这个小丑逼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got some bullets here with your name on 'em! And they're gonna write my name in your chest!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些子弹上有你的名字！它们会把我的名字刻在你的胸口上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes ma'am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，女士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 了解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我确定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, I'll head on home. If you need me again, just whistle. Preferably somewhere close by, or chances are I won't hear it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我要回家了。如果你再需要我，就吹口哨。最好是在我附近，不然我可能听不见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your call, buckaroo. I'll just be out wandering the countryside. What's left of it, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说了算，哥们儿。我就到处走走。不管还剩下什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you wish. If you seek my services again, I'll be near the Legion safehouse where you found me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所愿。如果你再次需要我的服务，我会在你找到我的军团安全屋附近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Roger that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes ma'am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，女士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他事情吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我没有动手，你也不要擅自攻击敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Affirmative.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that is your wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你这么想的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you not to attack enemies until I've engaged them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你在我跟敌人交战之前不要攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Roger that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Agreed. Aggression wins the fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同意。进攻能赢得战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gotcha.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你一看到敌人就攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like you to go back to the Lucky 38 for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你现在回幸运38赌场去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your call buckaroo. If you need me again just whistle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说了算，哥们儿。如果你再需要我，就吹口哨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. I'll be waiting there if you need me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。如果你需要的话，我会在那里等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I'll wait for you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就在那里等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to go alone for a bit. Meet me at the Lucky 38.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要单独一个人一会儿。幸运 38 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm hit! Fuck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我中弹了！操！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy shit that fucking hurts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，真他妈的疼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Agh! You wouldn't shoot a man with glasses, would you?!?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！你不会开枪打戴眼镜的人吧？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nyagh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aha! Fucking die! Jesus!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！他妈的给我死！天哪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eyagh!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wake
ESP.TRADUIT: 醒来

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, that was a close one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，差点就完蛋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, if it grew back, I wouldn't have a reason to shave it in the first place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，如果它能长回来，我一开始就没理由去刮了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you do a lot of saying. Not a lot of thinking though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，你说了很多。虽然没有经过太多思考。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pardon?
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说一遍？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A little slow, are we? If you want a drink, talk to the bartender.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有点迟钝，是吗？如果你想要喝一杯，去跟酒保说吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want a song, you'll have to wait a spell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想听首歌，就得等一会儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you want a story, well...the night's still young.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你想听个故事，嗯...时间还早。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are those my only choices?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些是我唯一的选择吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: First time here? There's only three choices hon. If you want a drink, talk to the bartender.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一次来这里吗？亲爱的，这里只有三个选择。如果你想喝一杯，去跟酒保说吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want a song, you'll have to wait a spell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想听首歌，就得等一会儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you want a story, well...the night's still young.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你想听个故事，嗯...时间还早。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll have a drink, thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要喝一杯，谢谢你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you're talking to the wrong gal. I don't serve the drinks. But you buy me one, sugar, and you might get a story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你找错人了。我不负责倒酒。不过你要是我请我一杯，甜心，说不定就能听到一个故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to make a request.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想提出一个请求。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's sweet, but I need a little time. Why don't you be a swell cat and buy me a drink to pass it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那太好了，但我需要点时间。你为什么不好好待着，给我买杯酒，打发时间呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about you tell me your story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不如你给我讲讲你的故事吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not what I meant, honey. I was asking if you aimed to write one. Something to tell your friends back home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是这个意思，亲爱的。我只是问你是不是想写个故事。你回家后会告诉你朋友的那种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if you do it right, you won't even need a pen. It'll write itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你做对了，甚至连笔都不需要。故事会自己书写。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want this bird to sing, you'll need to wet her beak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想让这只小鸟唱歌，就得润润她的喙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your poison?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你喜欢喝什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scotch, actually, but it tears my throat something fierce, so the owners don't like it when I drink the heavy stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实那是苏格兰威士忌，但它很刺激喉咙，所以店主不喜欢我喝这种烈酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you tell the bartender to get me a martini with an olive kilt, he'll know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你告诉酒保给我来一杯橄榄裙子的马提尼，他会明白的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks sugar. If martinis are a sonnet, then whiskey's like a drum. But we can't all sing like angels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，亲爱的。如果说马提尼是一首十四行诗，那威士忌就像一个鼓。但我们不是都能像天使一样唱歌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's a scotch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的苏格兰威士忌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since before there was anyone to listen. When the only jeers you'd hear was the echo from a sour note.
ESP.TRADUIT: 早在有人听的时候就开始了。那时唯一能听到的嘲笑声是走音后的回声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: How long have you worked here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里工作多久了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you still performing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在表演吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No sugar, not here. It wouldn't feel right. And it's kind of nice being a member of the audience for a change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，亲爱的，不是在这里。那样就不太对了。而且偶尔作为观众也挺好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: My cousin used to date the owner, and a warm bed brings a lot of favors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我表亲曾经和店主约过会，而这种关系能带来很多好处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you get the job here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么得到这里的工作的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you have aspirations to become a singer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的心愿就是成为一名歌手吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does it matter? Sure, in another life, maybe I get to change my cards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么关系吗？当然，也许在另一种人生中，我可以换牌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: But in this life, we play the hand we're dealt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但在这一人生中，我们只能打命运发给我们的牌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: These pipes are only good for talking and singing. And no one cares what I have to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个嗓子只适合聊天和唱歌。而没人在乎我想说什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look rather young.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看上去还挺年轻的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your eyes like to tell you a story. Full of little white lies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的眼睛喜欢给你讲述充满了小小的善意谎言的故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you look closely, the seams are stitched in black.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你仔细看，缝线是黑色的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's hard to imagine anyone jeering at you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很难想象会有人嘲笑你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe not now. But it takes time to be flawless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许现在不是。但变得完美需要时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say the night has a thousand eyes, and every single one is pointed at that stage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说夜晚有千万双眼睛，每一双都盯着那个舞台。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every little pair is its own judge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每一双眼睛都是独立的评判者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where is your cousin now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的表亲现在在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably shacking up with some other high roller. I don't blame her. It's not easy making a living out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能和其他有钱人住在一起了。我不怪她。在这里谋生并不容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do what you can with what you got, for as long as you got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你还拥有着，用你所拥有的去做你能做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When it's gone and she comes back, I'll be here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当它消失了，她回来时，我还在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to go back to my other questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想回到我的其他问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing. As long as you're buying, I'm listening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然可以。只要你买单，我就听着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR will probably shoot him on sight, and maybe you with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR 一看到他可能就开枪，也许你会和他一起吃枪子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I'm afraid of. The other option was to just cut him loose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这正是我担心的。另一个选择是干脆放他一马。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you want, you can talk to him first. See if you can't figure out what he's really up to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你愿意，你可以先和他谈谈。看看你能不能搞清楚他到底在搞什么鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your friend looks like an idiot. Whatever he says, do the opposite, and you'll go far in life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的朋友看起来像个白痴。不管他说什么，跟他反着来，你就能活得更久。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh, he ain't dumb, just a little scared, and with good reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵，他并不笨，只是有点害怕，而且有足够的理由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell, I'm scared too. That's why I'm hoping you'll make a decision for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼，我也害怕。这就是为什么我希望你能替我们做个决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if I talked to him first?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我先跟他谈怎么办？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I was about to suggest the same thing. Of course, it might do more harm than good, depending on what he says.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我正要建议同样的事情。当然，取决于他说了些什么，这可能会弊大于利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your friend's right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的朋友是对的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, maybe. Problem is, he's all talk. Neither of us have ever killed a man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，也许。问题是，他光说不练。我们俩都没杀过人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you wanna do it, be my guest. It'd save us both the trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你想干，那就请便吧。这样我们俩都省事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see no reason to change it. But if you fear Caesar's enemies, then it can't be helped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有理由更换它。但如果你害怕凯撒的敌人，这样做也没有用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, before I change, there are some things you should know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，在我更换之前，有些事情你应该知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, perhaps it's best if I show you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑再三，也许最好是展示给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to talk about your outfit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要谈谈你的服装。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay as close to me as possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽可能靠近我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 了解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your distance when you follow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟随的时候保持距离。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you command.
ESP.TRADUIT: 遵命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's time for us to part ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们该分道扬镳了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you wish. If you seek my services again, I'll be near the Legion safehouse where you found me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所愿。如果你再次需要我的服务，我会在你找到我的军团安全屋附近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our enemies await.
ESP.TRADUIT: 敌人在等着我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come with me, I need your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我来，我需要你的帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I'll wait for you there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就在那里等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to go alone for a bit. Meet me at the Lucky 38.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要单独一个人一会儿。幸运 38 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said you were an assassin. What targets have you killed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说你曾是一个刺客。你干掉过什么目标？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mostly tribal chiefs. As a former savage, I know their weaknesses, and how best to exploit them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大部分是部落酋长。作为一个曾经的野蛮人，我知道他们的弱点，以及如何最好地利用它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you work alone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一个人工作吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, we work in groups of four. The skill of the assassins depends on the target we hunt. But all are veteran legionaries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我们以四人小组工作。刺客的技能水平取决于我们追捕的目标。但都是经验丰富的军团老兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are jobs assigned in the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团中的工作是如何分配的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We are given the job we deserve. Caesar cares not for rank or experience. He only asks for results.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得到应得的任务。凯撒不在乎军衔或经验。他只关心结果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It makes no difference whether you are the captured or bear the standard of the Legion itself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你是被俘还是承载着军团的旗帜，都没有区别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All men serve under Caesar, and no man is given margin for failure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有人都服务于凯撒的统治，没有人允许失败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to go back to my earlier questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想回到我之前的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所愿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you have a moment, I'd like to discuss something personal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有时间，我想讨论一些个人问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've always been honest about who I am. The confusion is theirs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直都对自己是谁很诚实。感到困惑的是他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I fought the Legion forces to a standstill, they saw who I was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我与军团的力量僵持不下时，他们看到了我是谁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I pledged my blade to Caesar, it was plain as day that I was no woman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我向凯撒效忠时，很明显我不是女人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only now do they deny the truth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有现在他们否认了事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did the Legion not know about your past?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么军团不知道你的过去？

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所愿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Essential] Do whatever you can to stay alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: [重要] 尽你所能维持生命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 了解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Non-Essential] I want you to fight to the death.
ESP.TRADUIT: [非基础内容] 我希望你拼死战斗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to use melee combat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你使用近战战斗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've chosen wisely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你选择得很明智。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to use a ranged weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你使用远程武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As you wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如你所愿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, does it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 干啥呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does hope lie?
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望存在吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. You've been traveling these wastes. Why don't you tell me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。你一直在这片废土中旅行。你为什么不告诉我呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing so far from town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你离镇子这么远在做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for something, maybe you know it. It's a plant. An orchid, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找东西，也许你知道它。是一种植物。我想是兰花。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say it grows out where the dust is thick, but you know how that is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说它生长在尘土密布的地方，但你知道是什么情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Places like that you can't take more than two steps before the radiation soups your insides.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像那样的地方，在辐射把你的内脏煮熟之前，你两步都走不了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of skills do you have?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有哪种技能？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I learned most of what I know from my Ma and Pa.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我学到的大部分知识都来自于我的爸妈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ma was a real Annie Oakley. Give her a shotgun and a shot glass and she was a happy camper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈妈曾是个真正的安妮·奥克利。给她一把猎枪和一个小酒杯，她就开心了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pa was a preacher. Soon as Ma was done sinning, he was there to wash 'em clean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爸爸曾是个传教士。每当妈犯了罪，他就会来洗净它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: By the way, I think I finally found an answer for whether Hope lies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 顺便说一句，我想我终于找到了希望存不存在的答案。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yeah? And what's that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦是吗？那是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yeah? And what's that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦是吗？那是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some thoughts about your name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对你的名字有些想法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can follow me. I'll help you look for it, if you watch my back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以跟我来。如果你留意我的背后，我会帮你找它的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hm, wouldn't hurt to have another set of eyes. All right, you got yourself a deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼，再多一双眼睛也无妨。好吧，就这么说定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: No use letting the tail wag the dog. You go on and lead the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任由小事左右大局是没有用的。你带路吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come with me. I could use your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我来吧。我需要你的帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's hit the trail then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们就出发吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come with me. I could use your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我来吧。我需要你的帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thought you'd never ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还以为你永远不会问了呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you join me again? I could use your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不再加入我呢？我需要你的帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What makes these plants so valuable?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么让这些植物这么有价值？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's Cole?
ESP.TRADUIT: 科尔是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A soldier I met out in the wastes. When I found him he was halfway up God's interstate, but damn if I didn't manage to reel him back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在废土遇到的一名士兵。当我找到他时，他只有半条命了，但该死的是我竟然把他拉了回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I asked him what happened, he said he got separated from his troop, and more importantly, his wife.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我问他发生了什么事时，他说他和他的部队分开了，更重要的是，他和他的妻子也分开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found this on one of the poachers. What do you make of this journal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在一个偷猎者身上发现了这个。你对这本日记有什么想法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me see that. There ain't a lot I understand here, but it almost sounds like they're fixing to grow these plants on their own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看。我不是很理解这里，但听起来好像是他们准备自己种植这些植物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to know more about you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想更多地了解你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You writing a book, darling? Well, if you are, I guess it's smart to peek under the cover.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在写书吗，亲爱的？如果是的话，我猜瞧瞧封面下面是明智的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想知道什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, what do you wanna know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，你想知道什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why two bullets?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么要两枪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: One to kill you, and one to make sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一枪击毙你，一枪确认击杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In any case, this is his camp, and that lovely piece of tin over there is his trailer. Me, I'm just passing through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，这是他的营地，那边那个可爱的锡块是他的拖车。而我，我只是路过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is he a mute?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是哑巴吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'd certainly explain a lot. But no, I reckon he's just the silent type.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这倒是可以解释很多事情。但是，我猜他只是个沉默寡言的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: In any case, this is his camp, and that lovely piece of tin over there is his trailer. Me, I'm just passing through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，这是他的营地，那边那个可爱的锡块是他的拖车。而我，我只是路过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see him try.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看他尝试一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wouldn't see much of anything either way. If he don't get you, the man upstairs will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论哪种方式，你都看不到什么东西。如果他不干掉你，楼上的人就会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In any case, this is his camp, and that lovely piece of tin over there is his trailer. Me, I'm just passing through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，这是他的营地，那边那个可爱的锡块是他的拖车。而我，我只是路过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seems like there'd be some dysfunction there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来那里会有一些功能障碍。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we got along well enough. I don't know if opposites attract, but they sure as hell stick together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们相处得还不错。我不知道是不是异性相吸，但他们肯定会黏在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need two things to survive out here in the wastes. A quick draw and a strong faith. I was blessed with both.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在废土中生存需要两样东西。快速的反应和坚定的信念。我两样都被赋予了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's like a family of contradictions. Is that how you got your name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像一个充满矛盾的家庭。你的名字就是这么来的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe. Pa always said he would've died if it weren't for the good book.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许吧。爸爸总说如果没有圣经他早就死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ma always told me you're one bad shot from digging your own grave. I think they were both right, in their own way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈妈总是告诉我，你离自掘坟墓就差射歪一枪。我觉得他们两个都对，在各自的方式里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: And who taught you to be insufferable? Your cousin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那谁教你这么讨人厌的？你的表亲吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, I reckon I learned that all by myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，我想全靠我自己学到了这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've always said opposites attract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直说异性相吸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe that too. Can't save a man if there ain't one dying. Can't wash a sin if you ain't made a mistake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也信那个。如果没人濒死，就无法救命。如果没有犯错，就无法赎罪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, when I was an ankle biter, me and some of the other kids used to shoot cans off Old Lady Maven's fence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，当我还是个小屁孩的时候，我和其他一些孩子经常在梅文老女士的围栏上打罐子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Isn't that dangerous? You could've shot this Maven person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是很危险吗？你可能会打中这个梅文的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wouldn't have done no harm, seeing as she was up there with the angels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不会造成伤害的，因为她已经和天使在一起了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you do it for fun, or to help improve your aim?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这样做是为了好玩，还是为了帮助增长你的枪法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Little of both, I guess. Not that it helped much. I probably hit more dry wall than anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜两者都有点吧。不过也没那么有帮助。我打在干墙上的可能比其他的都多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe even hit Maven too, and she was up there with the angels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 甚至可能也打中了梅文，不过她已经和天使在一起了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I used to do the same. Except we'd shoot bottles after drinking them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以前也这么做过。不过我们是喝完之后打瓶子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ma would've liked you. She always said she was part Indian, because she didn't waste any part of the bottle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈妈会喜欢你的。她总是说她有印第安血统，因为她不浪费瓶子的任何部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I doubt Maven would've approved though, but she wasn't around to set us right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我想梅文可能不会赞同，但她已经不在了，不能纠正我们了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about Bobby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我关于鲍比的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He'd just go in and come out with like a dozen or so cans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就进去了，然后带出来大概十几个罐子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: And every day we kept waiting for him to say there ain't no more, but we'd always run out of bullets first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每天我们都在等着他说没罐子打了，但我们总是先把子弹打光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So one day I ask him, just how many cans were in that basement?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以有一天我问他，地下室里到底有多少罐子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then he shrugs his shoulders and tells me, "Hell if I know. They just pop out of that metal box like they was her baby."
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后他耸了耸肩膀，告诉我：“见鬼，我也不知道。它们就像是从那个金属盒子里生出来的崽子一样。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know why but, after he said that, I got a harder time shooting tin cans than I do people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道为什么，但在他说完那句话之后，我发现打罐子比打人更难了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to Maven?
ESP.TRADUIT: 梅文怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't know. Must've been the cholesterol that got her, cause the whole house was full of 'em. Cans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道。肯定是胆固醇害了她，因为整个房子里塞满了罐子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Course, most of us were too scared to go down to the basement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我们大多数人都太害怕去地下室了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But my cousin Bobby - bless his foolish heart - he just ran in like it was nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我的表亲鲍比 -- 愿他那愚蠢的心灵得到祝福 -- 他就那样毫无顾忌地冲了进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if hope lies, but I don't think you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道希望存不存在，但我认为你没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, maybe it does. Lately I've been thinking there's more to my name than hopes and lies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，也许是这样。最近我一直在想，我的名字（Hope Lies）蕴含的比希望（Hope）和谎言（Lies）还要多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I guess you'll have to keep me around a little longer to find out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我想你得再多留我一段时间在你身边才能弄清楚！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe hope lies in you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信希望就存在你身上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well aren't you a ray of sunshine. I like your optimism though. There ain't enough of it around these parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你真是一缕阳光。不过我喜欢你的乐观态度。这种态度在这些地方真是少见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if hope lies, but I don't think you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道希望存不存在，但我认为你没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've seen too much shit. This whole world is more or less hopeless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我见过太多狗屎了。这整个世界或多或少都是绝望的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, I hope you ain't talking about me. I may be pathological, but vindictive's a bit of a stretch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，我希望你不是在说我。我可能有点病态，但报复心强可就有点扯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Which is just what a liar would say. I guess you'll have to keep me around a little longer if you wanna know the truth!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这正是一个说谎者会说的话。如果你想知道真相，我想你得再多留我在你身边一段时间！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It lies all right. It's a pathological, vindictive liar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，它确实说了谎。它是一个病态、报复心强的说谎者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, in that case, we better cling to it, before it slips away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，既然这样，我们最好紧紧抓住它，免得它溜走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I have no idea. I just know it's your name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，我不知道。我只知道这是你的名字。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn straight. You saved my life back there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 完全正确。你刚才救了我的命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if something were to happen to you, you bet I'm gonna return the favor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你出了什么事，我一定会回报你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: So don't go running off without me. As far as I'm concerned, I'm your guardian angel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以不要离开我。在我看来，我是你的守护天使。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. I just know I have faith that you'll be there for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我只知道我相信你会来支持我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That it is. Maybe I'm the only Hope you've got. But hell, you could do worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实如此。也许我是你唯一的希望（霍普）。但是真见鬼，你本来会更糟的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It can't be a lie. Because if we don't have hope, we lose everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不会是谎言。因为如果我们没有希望，我们就失去一切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I agree. That's what I've been telling Al all these years, but he seems to think the world's better off without me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意。这些年来我一直这么告诉艾尔，但他似乎认为没有我这个世界会更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a joke, by the way. Kudos to you for not laughing. Takes guts not to, considering I'm holding a shotgun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 顺便说一句，那是个笑话。你能不笑真是了不得。考虑到我正拿着一把霰弹枪，这可真需要点胆量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not use RadAway or other medication?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不使用辐特宁或者其他药物？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They tried that already. Even got her in one of those suits, in case the air was bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们已经试过了。甚至给她穿上了那种服装，以防空气有问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doc said the plant's the only thing that'll save her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 医生说这种植物是唯一能救她的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: A friend's wife? How well do you know this person?
ESP.TRADUIT: 朋友的妻子？你对这个人了解多少？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know him, and that's all that matters. The rest, well, it's complicated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认识他，那就足够了。其他的，呃，就有点复杂了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is this plant so rare?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么这种植物这么稀有？

ESP.ORIGINAL: People don't got any sense is why. When they found out what it could do, everyone and their sister plucked it out of the ground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们为什么总是缺乏常识呢？当知道它的功效后，所有人都把它从地里拔出来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ask people now, they say it's gone forever. Can't find what ain't there. But Pa always told me, "can't never could."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在问人们，他们会说它永远消失了。你找不到不存在的东西。但爸爸总是告诉我，“‘不存在’从来就没有存在过。“
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So long as you have faith, God will show you the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你有信念，上帝就会指引你前行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I imagine a cure for heavy radiation sickness would net a lot of caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想治疗重度辐射病的方法会赚很多瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, there's profit in it. Enough to make people kill for it. So this ain't exactly gonna be a picnic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，这其中有利可图。足以让人们为之杀戮。所以这绝对不会轻松。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: In fact, if word gets out, I'd say it'd be more like a tornado in a trailer park, so we best put on our bibs if we wanna eat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，如果消息传开了，我得说情况会更乱，就像个拖车公园里刮龙卷风一样。所以如果我们想吃饭的话，最好系好围兜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, let's go find this plant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们去找这种植物吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for helping. I ain't good at this sort of thing but...I just wanna say I owe you one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的帮助。我不擅长这种事情，但是...我只是想说我欠你一个人情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you stay with him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你留在他身边了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. We traveled together for months after, looking for his troop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。之后我们一起旅行了好几个月，寻找他的部队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: After a while, we stopped looking and just started wandering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 过了一段时间，我们停止了寻找，开始漫无目的地流浪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not making excuses but...we didn't even know if we'd last the day, and well, the better emotions...they were in short supply.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我并不是在找借口，但是...我们甚至不知道自己能不能活过今天，而且，更好的情绪...也是稀缺很。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's his fault as much as it is yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是他的错，也是你的错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, and he knew right away. Problem is, I didn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，他当时马上就知道了。问题是，我没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty girls can be foolish, but more often make fools of men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 漂亮的女孩会犯傻，但更多的时候会让男人犯傻。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ain't exactly pretty, but I am most certainly a fool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我并不算漂亮，但我绝对是个傻瓜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're the other woman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你就是另一种女人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That I am. Didn't see it that way at the time though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是。但我当时并没有这么想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like a pretty poor excuse to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我来说听起来是个很烂的借口。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got me there. A bad excuse is like putting lipstick on a pig. And I was one soggy piece of bacon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对。烂借口就像在做无用功一样。而我就是块湿漉漉的培根。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you felt guilty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你感到内疚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even when we found that radio, I was praying to God we'd hear nothing but static.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使我们找到了那台收音机，我也在祈祷希望听到的只是杂音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But when he turned it on and that voice came through the other side, my heart sunk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但当他打开它，另一边传来那个声音时，我的心都凉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you love him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你爱他吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. But I do know I was fool enough to wish his wife ill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。但我知道我要是蠢到可以才希望他的妻子病死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: And truth is, when it happened I almost looked up at the sky and thanked the Lord almighty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实是，当这事发生时，我几乎抬头望天，去感谢全能的主。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: It wasn't until I went to see her, and looked into that poor woman's eyes that I knew I done broke a vow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直到我去看她，看到那可怜的女人的眼睛，我才知道我破坏了一项承诺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything I do now...it's to make sure that man and his wife fix theirs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在做的一切...都是为了确保那个男人和他的妻子能够修复他们的关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Which means there might be a farm somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这意味着某处可能有一个农场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you may be right. Never heard of a flower farm, but at this point I don't care if it's growing out a pig's ear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你可能是对的。我以前从来没有听说过花卉农场，但在这个节点上我不在乎它是不是从猪耳朵长出来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only thing that matters is we find it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一重要的是我们找到它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that even possible?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可能吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I doubt it. I reckon you'll find lips on a bloatfly before you figure out how to grow an angel out the ground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我质疑这点。我认为你会在发现苍蝇身上长嘴唇之前，弄清楚如何在地里种出天使来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only thing that matters is we find it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一重要的是我们找到它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That might explain why this place is barren.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这或许可以解释为什么这个地方这么荒芜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you may be on to something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，你有头绪了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pa always said God ain't the type to speak to you straight, but he'll always steer you right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爸爸以前总说上帝不是那种直接对你说话的人，但他总会指引你走向正确的方向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just let it go. Let the whole thing go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放手吧。让整个事情过去吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: About ten minutes ago I was about to agree with you. Then these fellas showed up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大约十分钟前我差点同意你的想法。然后这些家伙出现了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, they done pointed their guns at us, but somewhere behind them was God pointing the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们确实拿枪指过我们，但在他们背后某处，是上帝在指引着我们方向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm fixing to take a bath in a tub full of RadAway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备在装满辐特宁的浴缸里洗澡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're sick, then finding that farm should be the A number 1 priority.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你生病了，那么找到那个农场应该是头等大事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet they have a whole freezer full of Radaway, fuller than a tick on a coon dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢打赌他们有一个整整的冰箱装满了辐特宁，比浣熊猎犬身上寄生虫还要多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what's our next move?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么我们的下一步行动是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: In any case, looks like it ain't too far from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，看起来离这里不太远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I say we dress up as these poachers and see if we can get some fish to bite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说我们装扮成这些偷猎者，看看能不能引到些鱼儿上钩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your favorite song?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最喜欢的曲子是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, most songs I know are church ones. Amazing Grace, for instance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我知道的大部分歌曲都是教堂的。比如奇异恩典这种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you're talking about the radio, I've always had a soft spot for Marty Robbins.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你谈论的是收音机，那我一直对马蒂·罗宾斯情有独钟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like that he always got a story to tell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢他总是有故事要讲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I prefer Rock 'n Roll myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我自己更喜欢摇滚乐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and everyone under thirty. But I ain't much for dancing. My feet get drunker than a bottle of Jack whenever there's a beat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你跟三十岁以下的人一样。不过我不太会跳舞。每当有节拍的时候，我的脚步就像比喝了杰克丹尼酒还醉一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Marty Robbins is great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马蒂·罗宾斯很棒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're a fan too? I always say there's no better music to play by the campfire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你也是个粉丝吗？我总是说，在营火旁放音乐再适合不过了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But truth is, I can listen to Marty just about anywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但事实是，我几乎可以在任何地方听到马蒂的歌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Folk music is fine, but I like Sinatra and Dean Martin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 民谣不错，但我喜欢西纳特拉和迪恩·马丁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A lot of people like crooners. They're handsome, that's for sure, and their music's as clean as their look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多人喜欢歌唱家。他们很帅，那是肯定的，他们的音乐和他们的外表一样干净。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I don't know, I guess everyone's different. I just like folk and trail music better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我不懂这些，我想每个人都不一样。我只是更喜欢民谣和旅途音乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. You want a story, read a book. Music is about emotion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。你想要一个故事，就读一本书。音乐是关于情感的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you saying words don't have emotion? Cause I'll give you an earful if you keep saying bad things about Marty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在说词句没有情感吗？因为如果你继续说马蒂的坏话，我就给你一耳光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personally, I like all sorts of music.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就我个人而言，我喜欢各种音乐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well then, that means you like Marty Robbins too. Guess I know what we'll be listening to from now on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，这意味着你也喜欢马蒂·罗宾斯？我想我知道我们今后会听什么了！
