ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't really care much for music.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我其实不太关心音乐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great! Then you won't mind if I pick the songs we play when we're out wandering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了！那么你就不介意我挑选我们在外面漫游时挑选播放的歌曲了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your favorite Marty Robbins' song?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最喜欢马蒂·罗宾斯的哪首歌？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My favorite's "The Master's Call." It's got a lot of sin, but it's also got a lot of soul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最喜欢的是“主人的呼唤”。它有很多罪，但也有很多灵魂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can even sing it for you, so long as you promise to keep the matches from your ears. Be a shame if I burned 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我甚至可以给你唱一遍，只要你答应不把火柴塞进你的耳朵。如果我烧掉了它们就太可惜了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What sort of things do you find funny?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得哪些事情很有趣？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I got a real plain sense of humor. Most of the jokes I like are the kind that make other folks cringe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我有一种非常朴素的幽默感。我喜欢的大多数笑话都是让会其他人感到 尴尬的那种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's an easy one. I don't like jokes that are mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是个简单的问题。我不喜欢恶意的笑话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The world would be a whole lot better place if we stopped picking on people and learned to laugh at ourselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们停止刁难别人，而学会自嘲，世界会变得更美好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What sort of things do you not find funny?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得什么样的事情不好笑？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I better put away this book of racist jokes then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我最好把这本种族主义笑话书收起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, if you actually had something like that, I reckon both it and this little partnership would be going up in flames.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，如果你真的有那样的东西，那我觉得它和它的这个小同伙都要完蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that's what I like about you. We both got our ways, and while we may be two caps short of a six pack, somehow we manage to make change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这就是我喜欢你的地方。我们都有自己的方式，虽然我们可能都有点古怪，但不知道为什么我们还是设法做出了改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I should wallow in a prison of self-loathing. Got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我应该在自我厌恶的监狱里打滚。懂了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, well, I wouldn't go that far, and I'd say the last thing you're lacking is self-esteem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，好吧，我不会那么说，而且我会说你最不缺的是自尊心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that's what I like about you. We both got our ways, and while we may be two caps short of a six pack, somehow we manage to make change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这就是我喜欢你的地方。我们都有自己的方式，虽然我们可能都有点古怪，但不知道为什么我们还是设法做出了改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some would argue that's the best kind of humor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人会说那是最好的幽默。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'd say the best kind is whatever makes you laugh. Being mean just makes things awkward, don't you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我想说最好的幽默是那种能让你笑出来的。恶意只会让事情变得尴尬，你不觉得吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although I guess it's okay if it's all in good fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我想如果都好笑的话也没关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, we both got our ways, and while we may be two caps short of a six pack, somehow we manage to make change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟，我们都有自己的方式，虽然我们可能都有点古怪，但不知道为什么我们还是设法做出了改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I agree. Good thing I'm an easy target.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意。还好我是个容易的目标。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'm blind as a bat, slow as a snail, and I can't say two words before stepping on my tongue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我跟蝙蝠一样瞎，跟蜗牛一样慢，而且说两句话就会结结巴巴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you ain't the only one with a big red circle on their back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你不是唯一一个背上有个红色大靶子的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that's what I like about you. We both got our ways, and while we may be two caps short of a six pack, somehow we manage to make change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这就是我喜欢你的地方。我们都有自己的方式，虽然我们可能都有点古怪，但不知道为什么我们还是设法做出了改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if I stopped picking on people, how will I feel better about myself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果我不再刁难别人，我要怎么才能感觉到自己更好呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, now you're just teasin'. All you wanderer types are the same, just always hankerin' for some mischief.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，现在你开起玩笑来了。你们这些流浪者都是一个模子里刻出来的，总是想搞点恶作剧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that's what I like about you. We both got our ways, and while we may be two caps short of a six pack, somehow we manage to make change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这就是我喜欢你的地方。我们都有自己的方式，虽然我们可能都有点古怪，但不知道为什么我们还是设法做出了改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's hard to laugh about yourself when you're pretty much perfect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你非常完美时，你很难自嘲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, well, that proves you ain't. Cause if you were really perfect, you'd figure out a way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，好吧，这证明你不是非常完美。因为如果你是的话，你就会找到办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that's what I like about you. We both got our ways, and while we may be two caps short of a six pack, somehow we manage to make change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这就是我喜欢你的地方。我们都有自己的方式，虽然我们可能都有点古怪，但不知道为什么我们还是设法做出了改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Give me an example.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？给我举个例子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, how's this. "What's a brahmin's favorite drink?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这个怎么样。 “双头牛最喜欢喝什么？”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mooooo-ka cola.
ESP.TRADUIT: 牛口可乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, that's a good one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，那个还挺好笑的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, can't say it's original though. Most jokes I know were stuff that got passed around the campfire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，尽管不算是原创的。我知道的大多数笑话都是在篝火旁流传的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We may not have had food in our bellies, but all that laughter was food for the soul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可能没东西吃，但所有的笑声都是灵魂的食粮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh. Promise me you will never tell a joke again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊。答应我你再也不会讲笑话了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, and that ain't even the worst one I got. But all right, I'll try not to say anymore, although I can't make any promises.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，那甚至还不是我最烂的笑话。但好吧，我会尽量不说了，虽然我不作任何保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least none I aim to keep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反正我也没打算遵守这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Great joke. All it was missing was the drum and the snare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很棒的笑话。就只差鼓点和响弦了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you could always slap your knees, that usually gets the point across. Or you could just, you know, laugh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你可以拍拍膝盖，那一般能表达你的意思。或者你可以，你懂的，笑一笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you like that, you'll love this. Why did the farmer feed his brahmin caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你喜欢那个，那你就会喜欢这个。为什么农夫要给他的双头牛喂瓶盖？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why else? Cause he wanted rich milk! Haha, you're gonna have to do better if you wanna get a bad joke past me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有能原因呢？因为他想要丰富（Rich）的牛奶！哈哈，如果你想让一个烂笑话绕过我，还得再接再厉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I appreciate you trying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我还是要感谢你的尝试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What would you be doing if you weren't traveling the wastes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不去废土旅行，你会做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I've always loved working with kids. I reckon I'd be a teacher.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我一直喜欢和孩子们一起工作。我想我会当个老师。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't seen too many schoolhouses out in the wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在废土里没见过有太多校舍。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You make do with what you got. This one town I passed through, they were using the bar as a schoolhouse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得就地取材。我路过的一个镇子，他们把酒吧当做了校舍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kids were learning math by counting beers on the wall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 孩子们通过数墙上的啤酒学数学。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd be a good one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会是个好人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you sweet. My folks used to say flattery will get you to hell and back, although I don't know if that's a good thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你嘴真甜。我家里人过去常说，阿谀奉承会把你送到地狱，再把你带回来，虽然我不知道这算不算好事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Depends on who was saying it, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想，要看是谁说出来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Teaching is a noble profession.
ESP.TRADUIT: 教学是一项崇高的职业。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right. The way I see it, nobody lives forever, but knowledge never dies. Might as well pass it on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没事。在我看来，人终有一死，但知识永存。还是传承下去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most kids are home schooled. Might as well say you want to be an astronaut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数孩子都在家接受教育。不妨说你想当宇航员。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, maybe you're right. But Ma always said to shoot for the stars, and if you miss, don't get mad. Just reload.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，也许你说得对。但是妈妈总说要有雄心壮志，如果没达到目标，不要生气，再来一次就是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any pet peeves?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么烦恼吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say I do. I try not to let the little stuff get to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不算有吧。我尽量不让小事影响我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cause if you're paying attention to the little stuff, something big's gonna come around and kick you in the rear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为如果你留意小事，大事就会来找你麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about you? What sort of things grind your gears?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你呢？什么事情会把你惹烦？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the same. Small stuff doesn't bother me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也一样。小事烦不到我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. We got enough things to worry about in these wastes, can't be crying over hard beds and spoiled milk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。废土里的事情够让我们担心了，不能被硬床和变质的牛奶弄哭了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or was it spilled milk? See? That's the kind of thing that would bother some people - saying things wrong and stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者是打翻的牛奶？看到了吗？有些人会因为说错话之类的而烦恼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you just take it in stride. That's why I like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你只是坦然接受。这就是我喜欢你的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I get annoyed pretty easy, actually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，我很容易被惹恼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, you would've hated my Ma then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，那你肯定会讨厌我的妈妈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like a lot of southerners, the only thing bigger than her smile was her feet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像许多南方人一样，比她的笑脸还大的是她的脚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So even though she talked all friendly like, she was always stepping on your toes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以尽管她说话总是很友好，但她总是会踩到你的脚趾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bad habits. Chewing with your mouth open, that sort of thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 陋习。张着嘴咀嚼之类的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, they used to call them table manners. But then all the tables went away, and I guess they took the manners with 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，以前他们把这叫做餐桌礼仪。但是所有餐桌都不见了，我猜礼仪也随之消失了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poor listeners. People who talk over you, or try to top your story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听众有点差劲。总是插话，或着试图把你的故事比下去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know what you mean. You want to tell those people it ain't a contest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我懂你的意思。你想告诉那些人这不是在比赛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: People with bad grammar really piss me off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 语法不好的人真让我生气。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, if that were true, than your probably not gonna like me two much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，如果那是真的，你可能不会太喜欢我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But my thinking is, we ain't so different. So long as we understand each other, then we must be speaking the same language.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我的想法是，我们并没有那么不同。只要我们彼此互相理解，那我们说的肯定同一种语言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. Nothing really comes to mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。真没什么想法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that your way of saying you don't wanna tell me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是你说你不想告诉我的方式吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, I knew a fella like that - I'm sure the things I did drove him nuts, but he never told me what. Just too much of a gentleman to say it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，我认识一个像你这样的家伙 - 我确定我做的事让他抓狂，但他从来没告诉过我原因。他太绅士了，不愿意说出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I could do with a beer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我可以喝点啤酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hang out here for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里待一会儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Relaxing's easy. Just gotta decide on the drug.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。放松很简单。决定一下嗑什么药就行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take ten, Vincent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 文森特，休息十分钟。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing, just curious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么，只是好奇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? That stuff will kill you, you know. Worse than any chem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？你知道那玩意会害死你的，比任何药品都糟糕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, right now, I want to pop your kneecaps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，现在，我想打爆你的膝盖骨。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, no need to get rough. Isn't that what your shrink tells you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，没必要这么粗鲁。你的心理医生没告诉你那个吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I assume you got one, being crazy and all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我假设你有一个，毕竟你有点疯狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want your caps and your belongings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要你的瓶盖和你的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You right in the head, boy? Do I look like I have either?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你头脑清醒吗，小子？我看起来像是有吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: You right in the head, woman? Do I look like I have either?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你头脑清醒吗，姑娘？我看起来像是有吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry to bother you sir, just passing through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉打扰你了，先生，我只是路过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apology accepted. Just try and be less sneaky next time. Maybe carry a bell around your neck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接受道歉。下次尽量别那么偷偷摸摸。或许在脖子上挂个铃铛得了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Studying ants. Trying to figure out how they tick. If they tick. Or if they even have tickers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 研究蚂蚁。试着弄清楚它们是怎么运作的。它们是否在运作。或者它们是否甚至有专门的运作者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Long story. Long and boring. But if you like being bored, I used to work in agriculture.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很长的故事。又长又无聊。但如果你喜欢无聊，我曾经在农业部门工作过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soil, mostly. Tried to get grass to grow in places it plain didn't like, to feed the brahmin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主要是土壤。尝试让草在它不喜欢的地方生长，来喂养双头牛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why we made them the backbone of our society, I'll never know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我们把它们当作社会的支柱，我永远不会明白。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ants though, they can carry fifty times their own body weight. That's some sturdy backbone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过蚂蚁，它们能够搬运自己体重的五十倍。那种支柱可有点坚固了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why study ants?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么要研究蚂蚁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does grass grow on dirt? Of course not, not anymore, and that's why we need ants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 草会在沙子上生长吗？当然不会，现在不会了，这就是为什么我们需要蚂蚁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: They don't need acres of land to graze, and they can reproduce by the millions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们不需要广阔的土地来放牧，而且能数以百万计地繁殖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to herd ants like cattle?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想像驯服牛一样驯服蚂蚁吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What sort of research methods are you using?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在用什么类型的研究方法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My plan is to live among the ants as a worker drone, to understand their culture.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的计划是作为一只工蚁在蚂蚁中生活，来了解它们的文化。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: First though, I have to figure out how to communicate with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过首先，我得弄清楚如何跟它们交流。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got a plan. You see, ants communicate through some sort of telepathy. Just like Jesus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个计划。你知道，蚂蚁通过某种心灵感应来交流。就像耶稣一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's how they tell the colony where the food is, or sound the alarm when there's danger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是它们告诉蚁群食物在哪里，或者在有危险时发出警报的方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: How will you communicate with the ants?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打算怎么跟蚂蚁交流？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Simple. I turn my body into bait. I'm gonna turn myself into a delicious man roast, and get the ants shouting and screaming to all their friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简单。我把自己的身体变成诱饵。我要把自己变成一块美味的烤肉，让蚂蚁们大叫着告诉它们所有的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once I learn the ant word for "food," I'll be able to summon the colony at my leisure. Only this time, I'll have some real food set aside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦我学会了蚂蚁的“食物”这个词，我就能随意召唤蚁群。只不过这次，我会准备一些真正的食物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: From there, it's just a matter of putting myself in the assembly line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后，只要把自己放在生产线上就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what's this plan for communicating with the ants?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你跟蚂蚁交流的计划是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you experienced in this sort of research?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这类研究方面有经验吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No one is. This is an entirely new field. But I'm not unfamiliar with the, uh, scientific method.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人有经验。这是一个全新的领域。但我对，呃，科学方法并不陌生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know all about Sir Francis Bacon and John Q. Hamburger. But unlike those pork-brains, I've actually worked on a farm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对弗朗西斯·培根爵士和约翰·Q·汉堡都很了解。但和那些蠢货不同，我在农场实实在在地工作过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you experienced in this sort of research?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这类研究方面有经验吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you out here by your lonesome?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一人在这里吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course. I don't need a horde of Chinese graduate students mucking things up with their number porn. They'd just get in my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。我不需要一群中国研究生用他们的数字色情把事情搞得一团糟。他们只会妨碍我的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: My daughter disagrees with my hobby. She thinks we should farm geckos. Geckos! Have you ever heard of anything so ridiculous?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我女儿不同意我的爱好。她觉得我们应该养蜥蜴。蜥蜴！你听过有什么比这更荒谬的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does your family think of you being out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的家人对你在这里有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A million giant ants would overrun the wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一百万只巨型蚂蚁将会占领这片废土。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, and a brahmin would kill your sister if it could hold a gun. Animals in the wild don't have a moral compass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，如果双头牛能拿枪的话，它就会杀了你的姐妹。野生动物没有道德准则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there a way to domesticate them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有办法驯化它们吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't see why not. Ants are good at taking orders. Unlike say, bees.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不能呢。蚂蚁擅长接受命令。不像蜜蜂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: But Brahmins taste better than ants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是双头牛比蚂蚁好吃。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why on earth would you want to eat an ant? That's worse than cannibalism as far as I'm concerned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你到底为什么要吃蚂蚁？在我看来，那比吃人还要恶劣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ants don't produce milk. It's a staple of any breakfast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蚂蚁不产奶。这是任何早餐的主食。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't know gum about ants, do you. Ants are the ranchers of the insect kingdom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对蚂蚁一窍不通，对吧。蚂蚁是昆虫王国的牧场主。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: They can herd and milk aphids just as well as any cowboy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们可以像牛仔一样对放牧蚜虫和给它们挤奶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't try and build an ant farm. The ants are the farm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你建立不了蚂蚁农场。因为蚂蚁本身就是农场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I assume now people just throw tomatoes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想现在人们只会扔西红柿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, not when I'm on stage honey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，亲爱的，当我在舞台上时不会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened after they broke up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们分手后发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I figured he'd toss me out, but it turns out I was bringing in too many caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为他会把我赶出去，但结果发现我带来的瓶盖太多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess my cousin was the one doing the favor. Wasn't the first time, I'll tell you that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜是我表亲帮了我的忙。我告诉你，这可不是第一次了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you enjoy performing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你喜欢在这里表演吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. It pays the bills and the people are classy. A vibe like that is hard to find in a messed up world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。这份工作能支付账单，而且人们都很有品味。在一个混乱的世界里找到这样的氛围真是不容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pretty sure ants communicate via scent, not telepathy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很确定蚂蚁是通过气味而不是心灵感应来交流的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a load of bunk! You can't smell words! That's like trying to taste an idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那完全是胡说八道！你不能闻到文字！那就像尝试品尝一个想法一样荒谬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, ants have a language all right. I just need to transcribe it is all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，蚂蚁确实有一种语言。我只需要把它记录下来就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What makes you think they use telepathy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么让你认为他们使用心灵感应？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy, because they don't make a sound. It's like radio waves or skull termites. You can't see them, but they sure as shit exist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很简单，因为它们不发出声音。就像无线电波或头骨中的白蚁一样。你看不见它们，但它们确实存在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it possible for humans to speak telepathically?
ESP.TRADUIT: 人类有可能通过心灵感应说话吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, so long as you have a device, like a Pip-Boy or short wave radio.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，只要你有设备，比如哔哔小子或者短波收音机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't they teach you any of this in home-school?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们在家里从来没有教过你这些吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget the ants, I want to hear more about Jesus' telepathic powers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘记蚂蚁吧，我想更多地了解耶稣的心灵感应能力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You never been to church? They say he speaks to all of us, without so much as a word. Probably because he's an ant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从来没有去过教堂吗？他们说他对我们所有人说话，甚至没用一个字。可能是因为他是只蚂蚁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is quite frankly the stupidest plan I have ever heard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坦率地说，这是我听过的最愚蠢的计划。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course it's stupid. It's not rocket science. Anybody can do it, and that's why it's brilliant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然这很愚蠢。这不是火箭科学。任何人都能做到，这就是为什么它很棒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think learning the language will keep them from attacking you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为学习这门语言并不能阻止他们攻击你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course it will. Anyone who speaks the language is recognized as a member of the colony.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然能阻止。任何会说这种语言的人都会被认为是蚁群的一员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's like the rings the freemasons wore to identify each other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就像共济会成员戴戒指来相互识别一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't matter if you got six legs or ten toes, a mason's a mason and an ant's an ant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你有六条腿还是十个脚趾，共济会就是共济会，蚂蚁就是蚂蚁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turning yourself into bait is extremely dangerous. I can't allow it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把你自己变成诱饵太危险了。我不能允许。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And who elected you President? Was it Ted? Well you can tell him I'm keeping his sweaters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁选你当总统了？是特德吗？那你可以告诉他我还留着他的毛衣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care if his grandmother gave them to him. A bet's a bet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎是不是他的祖母给他的。愿赌服输。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck. I hope your research bears fruits and not your corpse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运。我希望你的研究结出硕果，而不是你的尸体。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you friend. Tell you what, if I ever figure out how to speak "ant," I'll teach you a few words, maybe even some naughty ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你，朋友。告诉你一个事，如果我有一天弄清楚怎么说“蚂蚁语”，我会教你几个词，甚至可能是些不礼貌的那种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yeah, ants got them words too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是的，蚂蚁也有这些词。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's your friend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你朋友是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Al? Don't pay him no mind. He ain't much for talkin'. But if you make trouble, he'll put two in your skull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 艾尔？别理他。他不善言辞。但如果你惹麻烦，他会给你脑袋来两枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want to do with him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想对他做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCD] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I say we cut him loose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我们应该释放他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you crazy? You saw what those fuckers did to Nipton!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你疯了吗？你看到那些混蛋对尼普顿的事了吗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCD] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I'm afraid of. The other option was to just cut him loose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这正是我担心的。另一个选择是干脆放他一马。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you want, you can talk to him first. See if you can't figure out what he's really up to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你愿意，你可以先和他谈谈。看看你能不能搞清楚他到底在搞什么鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He surrendered without a fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他没反抗就投降了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I'm afraid of. The other option was to just cut him loose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这正是我担心的。另一个选择是干脆放他一马。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you want, you can talk to him first. See if you can't figure out what he's really up to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你愿意，你可以先和他谈谈。看看你能不能搞清楚他到底在搞什么鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: For now, maybe. But what do you think is gonna happen when his friends show up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 暂时是这样。但你觉得他的朋友来了会发生什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCD] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: He says he ain't with the Legion no more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说他不再跟着军团了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jesus Christ man, if it walks like a gecko, and it talks like a gecko...well, I hate to spoil it for you, but it's probably a fucking gecko!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，伙计，如果它走起路来像蜥蜴，说话像蜥蜴...好吧，我不想毁了你的兴致，但它很可能就是只他妈的蜥蜴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCD] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, I don't know. Let's ask this guy. See what he thinks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我不知道。让我们问问这个家伙。看看他怎么想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, I don't know. Let's ask her. See what she thinks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我不知道。让我们问问她。看看她怎么想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the matter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My friend and I were on way south to Arizona when we stopped to make camp. Seemed like a good spot with the water and all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和朋友正要去亚利桑那南部的路上，然后我们停下来扎营。这地方水源充足，看起来挺好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thing is, we hadn't even filled up our canteens when this Legion fella just walks up to the pond like we ain't even here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是，我们连水壶都没装满，这个军团的家伙就直接走到水池边，好像我们不存在一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What were you planning to do with him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你打算对他做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was thinking of taking him to the NCR outpost, and let them figure out what to do with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在考虑把他带到NCR前哨站，让他们来决定怎么处理他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: My friend thinks its best to just shoot him dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我朋友觉得最好直接开枪打死他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What has he told you so far?
ESP.TRADUIT: 到目前为止他告诉了你什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much. Just that he ain't Legion. Used to be, but not anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不多，就说了他不是军团的人。过去是，但现在不是了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, most of what he says makes sense. The problem is, knowing what we know about the Legion, it makes a whole lot more sense for him to lie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，他说的大部分都合理。问题是，考虑到我们对军团的了解，他撒谎才更合理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: He just walked right past you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就从你身边走过？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yup, didn't say a word. Me and my friend just sat here with our jaws on the ground, watching him drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，一句话都没说。我和朋友就这么呆呆地坐在这里，看着他喝水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then it finally occurred to me to grab my gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后我才意识到该拿起我的枪了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's likely he didn't see you as a threat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他很可能没有把你们视为威胁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we may not be soldiers, but we still have guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们可能不是士兵，但我们仍然有枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Granted, me and my friend were shaking so bad I doubt either of us could shoot straight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实，我和我的朋友都抖得厉害，我怀疑我们都不能稳定射击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: My guess is he was hoping you wouldn't notice him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜他希望你们不会注意到他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hard not to with that getup. But if you ask me, it's more like he wasn't afraid. Not of us, and not of death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 穿成那样确实很难不这样想。但如果你问我，更像是他不害怕。不害怕我们，也不害怕死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill him and the Legion might come after you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀了他，军团可能会来追杀你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We considered that too. But we cut him loose and they might do that anyway, only now they have a witness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们也考虑过这一点。但我们把他放走，他们可能还是会这样做，只不过现在他们有一个目击者了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you can talk to him, let him know we didn't mean no harm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你可以跟他谈谈，让他知道我们并不是有意伤害他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Settler [11000DCA] (mod) Quest : ([11000DC9]x3dnpcLegionQuest) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me something interesting about ants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我一些关于蚂蚁的有趣的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear some ants can breathe fire. Which is scary, because ants don't run out of breath.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说有些蚂蚁能喷火。这很吓人，因为蚂蚁不会耗尽呼吸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: The beauty of ants is that they're smart, but they don't over-think things either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 蚂蚁的美妙之处在于它们很聪明，但它们也不会过度思考。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you know in the old world, ants made up twenty percent of the total biomass of animals?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道在旧世界中，蚂蚁占了总动物生物量的百分之二十吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right, if you put all the animals of the world on one side of the scale, and just pour ants on the other, it'd still be relatively close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，如果你把世界上所有的动物放在天平的一边，把蚂蚁倒在另一边，它们的重量还是相对接近的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hanstock [11000AE7] (mod) Quest : ([11000ADD]x3DNPCAntman) The Antman EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I was going to kill you, I wouldn't hesitate. But I'm not sure that's how this ends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我要杀了你，我会毫不犹豫。但我不确定事情就会以这样的方式结束。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you show more wisdom than your friends. They should have left well enough alone. Now both their lives hang in the balance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你比你的朋友更具智慧。他们本应该安安心心地离开。现在，他们的生命都岌岌可危。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fools often mistake caution for hesitance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 傻瓜常常把谨慎误认为是犹豫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And they also mistake advice for empty threats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们还把忠告当成空洞的威胁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no use for posturing. If I wanted you dead, I'd make it so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不需要虚张声势。如果我想要你们死，我会让它发生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then when the time comes, I'll do my best not to hesitate. In the meantime, I'd like to talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么当时机到来时，我会尽力不犹豫。与此同时，我想谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then talk. Make your case to spare my captor's lives. But mercy is not an acceptable argument.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就谈吧。说服我放过抓住我的人。但仁慈不是一个可接受的论点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you're as strong as I am, you have a margin for error.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你像我一样强大时，你就有犯错的余地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you're no different than the profilgates who took me prisoner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你和那些抓住我的放荡者没有什么两样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their guns make them feel safe. But in the end, I am the one who will decide their fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的枪让他们感觉安全。但最终，决定他们命运的将会是我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you saying you're going to kill those two settlers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说你要杀掉那两个居民吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their lives are already forfeit. Whether it's me that kills them or the desert is irrelevant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的生命已经注定了。不管是我杀了他们还是沙漠杀了他们都无关紧要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I will say this. If I'm their executioner, I can promise you it won't be painless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我会告诉你。如果我是他们的刽子手，我可以向你保证，那不会是无痛的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm an assassin. One of Caesar's best. But I'm not here on Legion business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是个刺客。凯撒最得力的手下之一。但我不是来执行军团任务的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In fact, I'm no longer part of their tribe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我已经不再是他们部落的一员了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was over a...disagreement with my superiors. The Decanus saw me without my armor and mistook me for something I'm not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是因为我和我的上级发生了...分歧。什长看到我没穿盔甲，把我误认成了我不是的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The argument ended with his death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 争论以他的死亡结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you leave the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么离开了军团？

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you join the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么加入军团的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My tribe was defeated by the vanguard of Caesar's army. The captured were then given a choice. Slavery, fealty or death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的部落被凯撒的军队先锋打败了。被俘虏的人被给予了选择。奴役、效忠或死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I chose to kneel. So they gave me a weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我选择了跪下。于是他们给了我一把武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In this world, we're born into lies told by an indifferent creator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这个世界里，我们出生在一个冷漠的造物者编织的谎言之中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: My tribe was not my family. They were weak. Pitifiul. When I watched them die, I felt only contempt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的部落不是我的家人。他们软弱。可悲。当我看着他们死去时，我只感到蔑视。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I joined the Legion, I was finally among my peers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我加入军团时，我终于在我的同类之中了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't hold any animosity toward the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对军团没有任何敌意吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where were you headed when these men confronted you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些人与你对峙时，你正要去哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does it matter? The Legion will overrun this entire land. All that's left to do is wander, and wait for Caesar's verdict.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么关系吗？军团将会征服这一整片土地。现在剩下的只有漫游，并等待凯撒的裁决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interesting. I'm not sure if you're a friend to Caesar or an enemy. In that regard, we're part of the same tribe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣。我不确定你是凯撒的朋友还是敌人。在这方面，我们是同一部落的一部分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. I'll join your pack. Time will tell if you're worthy of leading it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。我会加入你的队伍。时间会告诉我们，你是否配得上领导它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could follow me. I can give you direction and purpose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以跟着我。我可以给你方向和目的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What skills do you have?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么技能？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legionaries specialize in melee combat. Guns are slow and prone to failure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团士兵擅长近战。枪械缓慢而且容易故障。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever advantage they provide is made up for with cunning, speed, and most of all, courage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们能提供的任何优势，都能以狡诈、速度，以及最重要的，勇气来弥补。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You out of your mind? NCR has guns, Frank. Guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你疯了吗？NCR有枪，弗兰克。枪啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more than your sister charges.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没你姐妹招摇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut up Frank. We both know you take more pole than a street sign.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴，弗兰克。我们都知道你比街上的路标还招摇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's wrong with my nose?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的鼻子有什么问题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You almost sound like you respect those assholes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听起来就像是在尊重那些混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's more to war than guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战争不只是枪的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you finally made a friend Bill? How much are you paying her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你终于交了个朋友，比尔？你付了她多少钱？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you finally made a friend Bill? How much are you paying him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你终于交了个朋友，比尔？你付了他多少钱？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you've mistaken me for your mother. And we don't look nothin' alike.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把我当你妈了吧？我们可一点也不像。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I keep telling you, it's crooked. Doc can fix that for you, I seen him do it. It's just too bad he can't do something about the rest of your face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直告诉你，它是歪的。医生可以修好，我见过他做这个。只可惜他不能帮你把剩下的脸也修好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just got sense enough to fear them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是有足够的理智去害怕他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your memory's getting foggy Bill. I got up the last time. And the time before that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的记忆越来越模糊了，比尔。我上次起来了。还有上上次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that explains my headache, given how awful your taste in music is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到你那惨不忍睹的音乐品味，那解释了我的头痛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I remember? Frank, that happened like a week ago. And the both of us stayed inside the whole time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得吗？弗兰克，那就像是一周前发生的事。而且我们俩全程都呆在屋里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you talking about? Those Powder Gangers killed everyone in town!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在说什么啊？那些火药帮把整个镇子的人都杀了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? I must be thinking about some other time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？那我一定是想到别的时候了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! That's right. No way a bunch of nutjobs with swords and slingshots can stand up to a well trained soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！没错。一群拿剑和弹弓的疯子根本无法对抗训练有素的士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're gonna take his side? The man has half a brain and an ass full of dicks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要站在他那边？那人脑子只有一半，屁股里还插满了屌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Depends on what you're asking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 得看你问什么了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm asking who'd win in a fight. I'm saying NCR, hands down. This stubborn son of a bitch right here, he says Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在问打起来谁会赢。我说毫无疑问是NCR。那边那个固执的狗娘养的家伙说是军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Both of them can go to hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们两个都能下地狱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, but that's not what I'm asking. I'm saying if a dozen soldiers from each side get in a fight, mano a mano, who gets the best of it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，但是这不是我问的。我是说如果双方各出一队士兵打一场肉搏战，谁能赢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not if I kill you first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我先杀了你就不会。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can try.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你尽管试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then let the desert take them. No need to dirty your hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那让沙漠带走他们。无需弄脏你的手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: True. There's no point making an example of them when Caesar himself would deny my existence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实。当凯撒本人否认我的存在时，拿他们当典范就没有意义了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, kill them. I have no problem with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，杀了他们。我没意见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then it shall be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就这么办吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really don't care either way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么样我都真的不在乎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then as I said, the decision is mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就正如我所说，决定权是我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Why weren't the kids allowed to hang out at the toxic waste dump?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。为什么不运行孩子们在有毒废物堆里玩耍呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They just weren't ghoul enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为他们还不够凶残（Ghoul）。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me a joke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我讲个笑话吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last night I couldn't figure out where the sun went. Then it dawned on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 昨晚我想不明白太阳去哪了。然后我豁然开朗（Dawned）。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me a joke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我讲个笑话吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crows ain't got noses, so how do they smell? Pretty good, if you season 'em right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乌鸦没有鼻子，那么它们闻起味道怎么样？如果调味得当，它们闻起来味道就很好（Smell）。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me a joke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我讲个笑话吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How's this. A dwarf, a farmer, and a super mutant walk into a bar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个怎么样。一个侏儒、一个农民和一个超级变种人走进了一个酒吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the farmer walks into the bar. The dwarf walks under it, and the super mutant ducks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，农民走进了（Walks into）酒吧。侏儒走到了酒吧下面（Walks under），超级变种人躲开了门梁（Ducks）。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me a joke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我讲个笑话吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So a guy walks into his lawyer's office. He tells 'em his momma died and he wants to collect on the life insurance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以一个人走进了他律师的办公室。他告诉律师他妈妈去世了，想领取人寿保险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The lawyer asks him, "Does your policy contain an accidental death clause?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 律师问他：“你的保单中是否包含意外身故条款（death clause）？”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the guy says, "there were deathclaws, but there wasn't no accident."
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个人说：“有死亡爪（deathclaws），但并没有意外。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh, that was kind of bad, wasn't it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，这个有点烂，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me a joke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我讲个笑话吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, so a yao guai and a brahmin get into an argument. The yao guai says, "I'm gonna choke you with my bear hands!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，一只妖怪和一只双头牛发生了争执。妖怪说：“我要用我的熊手掐死你！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The brahmin says, "Don't you mean your paws?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 双头牛说：“你说的难道不是你的爪子（Paws）吗？”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the yao guai says, "You know damn well my Pa's dead."
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后妖怪说：“你明明知道我爸爸（Pa's）已经死了。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the brahmin goes, "Bull."
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后双头牛说：“废话（Bull）。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me a joke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我讲个笑话吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell if I know. You know how it is. The way they got the lights...it's always two hours to midnight in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不知道。你才知道是怎么回事。他们搞的灯光...这里总像是差两个小时就到午夜一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you think that is? They want us to keep drinking?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得为什么会那样呢？他们想让我们继续喝酒？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. And I completely agree with their strategy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。我完全同意他们的策略。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. When's the last time you brushed your teeth?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不懂。你上次刷牙是什么时候？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever think of shaving it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有想过剃掉它？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just saying, Bill. That other fella is awful handsome. If you got designs on keeping your lady friend...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是说说而已，比尔。那个家伙看起来非常帅。如果你打算保住你女朋友的话...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think I got the head for it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我适合吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave it alone, Frank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别管它了，弗兰克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't know. Might as well try it and see. Not like it won't grow back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道。或许可以试试看。反正它还会长回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是说说而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, but the good book says that ain't right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，但圣经上说那不对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ain't one for sinning, sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是个爱犯罪的人，抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That ain't something I can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是我能做的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Can't say I'd partake. You kiss one of 'em zombies Frank, and your lips will glow in the dark for about a week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？我可不怎么想参与。你要是亲了一个僵尸，弗兰克，你的嘴唇大概会在黑暗中发光一周。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've suffered worse in the name of love.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了爱，我受过更糟的折磨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you know it's morning?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么知道是早上了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know, I'm just saying. It could be. In which case, it'd behoove us to do as the natives do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，我只是说说而已。有可能是罢了。如果真是的话，我们最吼跟本地人一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be-hoove us? Since when did you learn to speak French?
ESP.TRADUIT: 最吼？你从什么时候开始学说法语了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just saying. It ain't proper to drink liquor at 8:30 in the morning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是说说而已。早上八点半喝酒可不合适。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not gonna stop drinking if that's what you're suggesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是在暗示我要戒酒，那我不会停的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have to. Just pour a little scotch into your cup. Act a little more civilized. You know, "when in Rome."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不用停。只是往你的杯子里倒点苏格兰威士忌。表现得文明一点。你懂的，“入乡随俗”（When in Rome）。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rome? Last I checked, this wasn't no Legion outpost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗马（Rome）？我上次检查的时候，这里可不是什么军团前哨站。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: The way you carrying on, drinking and whoring, you might be better off if it was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你再这样胡闹，喝酒、鬼混的话，去军团可能更适合你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's called being a gentleman, Bill. I ain't saying you need to buy yourself a suit like some stuck-up Vegas cat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这叫做绅士风度，比尔。我不是说你要像什么自命不凡的维加斯小伙一样买套西装。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what, I come in here with some pomade in my hair, and I'm neck deep in caps? That ain't how it works, Frank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那又怎样，我头上抹点油，然后就能发大财了？那不是这么回事，弗兰克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe so. But the way I see it, you ain't doing so hot now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许是。不过在我看来，你现在也不怎么样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, you mean those wooden carvings?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的是那些木雕吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. You sell 'em as toys, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对啊。你把它们当玩具卖，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Selling? Ha, at the prices I charge, I'm pretty much giving them away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卖？哈，以我收的价格，基本上是白送了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not raise your prices then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那为什么不涨价？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I raise the prices, they won't buy 'em. They don't buy 'em, I don't eat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我涨价，他们就不买了。他们不买，我就没饭吃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, you got one?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么，你搞到一个了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, but say I dug one up. What would it be worth on the black market?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有，但假设我挖了一个出来。在黑市上会值多少？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You asking for a friend?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是给朋友问的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm asking for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，是给我问的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you did find one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你真的找到了一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I didn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you're asking me, in the off chance that you do, whether I can find you a buyer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是你正在问我，如果你真的找到了，我能不能帮你找个买家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamnit Frank, it's just a hypothetical. No "wink-wink I got one in my pocket," just a pure, what if scenario, okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的弗兰克，这只是一个假设而已。不是“眨眨眼暗示我口袋里有一个”，只是纯粹的设想，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, all right. Just making sure. Wagner. He that guy who played for the Congressman?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧。只是确认一下。瓦格纳。他是那个为国会议员打球的家伙？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck if I know. I hate baseball.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈的都不知道。我讨厌棒球。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, it's barely past eleven. We still got plenty of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，现在刚过十一点。我们还有充足的时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么知道的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because I got money in my pocket and I ain't kneeling over a toilet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我口袋里有钱，而且我没跪在马桶前面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you could stand to show a little more care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是你可以表现得更关心一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't get it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Given my features, some might mistake me for a woman. Perhaps your eyes see what the Legion couldn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鉴于我的外貌，有些人可能会误以为我是女人。也许你的眼睛看到了军团看不到的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, it all makes sense now. The Legion mistook you for a woman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，现在一切都说得通了。军团误认为你是女人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yet I was born a man, and I will die as one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，我生来就是一个男人，我也将以男人的身份死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the Legion claims I betrayed them, it's only because their eyes betrayed them first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果军团声称我背叛了他们，那只是因为他们的眼睛先背叛了他们自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, now I'm confused. Are you a man or a woman?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，现在我很困惑。你是男的还是女的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was a born a man, and I will die as one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我生来就是一个男人，我也将以男人的身份死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the Legion claims I betrayed them, it's only because their eyes betrayed them first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果军团声称我背叛了他们，那只是因为他们的眼睛先背叛了他们自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to prove your humanity, you'll have to do more than show me your face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想证明你是人类，你要做的不只是露脸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have nothing to prove. I know what I believe, and I believe what I know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无需证明什么。我知道我相信的，相信我知道的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion believes that the best fighters are men. What they fail to see is that I'm the proof they seek.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团相信最好的战士是男人。他们未能看到的是，我就是他们寻找的证据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's fine, I prefer the company of men anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，反正我更喜欢跟男人在一起。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then we have an understanding. Good. Showing you now was just to make sure there's no confusion between us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么我们达成了共识。很好。现在向你展示只是为了确保我们之间没有误解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion's response was predictable. It was foolish to think otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以预见军团的反应。蠢蛋才会觉得有其他结果。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps. I only know the word of Caesar. He called on the men of his tribe to serve, and so I did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许。我只知道凯撒的言语。他号召他部落的男人去服役，所以我就去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In any case, I don't wish to dwell on this. Showing you now is just so there's no confusion between us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，我不想深究这个。现在向你展示只是为了确保我们之间没有误解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I don't have a problem with you being a man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我对你是个男人没有意见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then we have an understanding. Good. Showing you now was just to make sure there's no confusion between us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么我们达成了共识。很好。现在向你展示只是为了确保我们之间没有误解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if I disagree with your version of truth?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是我不同意你对常识的看法呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care. If you tell me the sky is green, I'll simply think you mad. It has no bearing on how you fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎。如果你告诉我天空是绿色的，我只会认为你疯了。这与你如何战斗无关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You calling me a woman is no different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你称呼我为女人也是一样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you bathe without them discovering your secret?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么在他们没发现你秘密的情况下洗澡的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The honorable don't ogle the bodies of their comrades.
ESP.TRADUIT: 荣耀之人不会注视同僚的身体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: The brothers I killed acted with dishonor. But so did I when I betrayed them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀死的兄弟们行为不端。但是当我背叛他们时，我也同样行为不端。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, I don't want to dwell on the particulars. The only reason we're even discussing this is so there's no confusion between us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，我不想深究细节。我们讨论这个问题的唯一原因是为了确保我们之间没有误解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are your views on the arts?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对艺术有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: For a Legionary, life is short. And the less you train, the shorter it will be. So we don't have time for much else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于一个军团士兵来说，生命是短暂的。而你训练得越少，你的生命就会越短。所以我们没有太多时间去做其他事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: But yes, there are things I like more than others, art included. I just don't have a good grasp on what they are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，是的，我确实有一些比其他东西更喜欢的东西，包括艺术。我只是还没有很清楚地认识到它们是什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: What would you say are the advantages Legion rule?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为军团统治有什么好处？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Latin. Those who are willing to learn are given the opportunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉丁语。愿意学习的人会得到机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Usually it's tribal initiates like myself who are the most eager to rid ourselves of the savage tongue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常像我这样的部落新人是最渴望摆脱野蛮语言的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the language the Legion speaks?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于军团所说的语言，你能告诉我些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Order. Discipline. And honor. Things the NCR's so-called military fail to provide in their own house.
ESP.TRADUIT: 秩序、纪律和荣誉。这些是NCR所谓的军队无法在他们自己的队伍中提供的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: They pollute their bodies with chems and poison their minds with lust.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们用毒品污染他们的身体，用欲望毒害他们的思想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They abide by no moral code. They are unfit to rule even their own bodies. Instead, their bodies rule them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不遵守任何道德准则。他们甚至支配不了自己的身体。相反，他们的身体支配着他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A conquered tribe becomes part of the Legion. Those who refuse Caesar's rule are the ones who are disloyal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 被征服的部落成为军团的一部分。那些拒绝凯撒统治的人是不忠诚的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the Legion values loyalty, how do they reconcile conscripting those who fought against them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果军团重视忠诚，他们如何协调征募那些曾经跟他们对抗的人呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are your thoughts on the Legion's treatment of women?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对军团对待女性的做法有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every member of the Legion is there to serve Caesar, and each role is given for a reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团的每个成员都是为了服务凯撒，每个角色都有其存在的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't pretend to speak for him, but I will say this. Women have the power to give birth, and wars are won with numbers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会假装替他说话，但我会说这个。女性有生育的能力，而战争是靠人数赢得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The word slavery is only a negative when spoken by profilgates and dissolutes. We are all servants of Caesar, and we each have a role to play.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奴役制这个词在放荡者和浪荡之辈口中只是个贬义词。我们都是凯撒的仆人，每个人都有自己的角色要扮演。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestas, Industria, Prudentia. Honesty, Industry, and Prudence.
ESP.TRADUIT: Honestas, Industria, Prudentia。诚实，勤奋，和谨慎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: These are the virtues that motivate servants of the Legion, and not the whip at our back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些是激励军团仆人们的美德，而不是我们背后的鞭子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral
