ESP.ORIGINAL: What about the Legion's views on slavery?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么军团对奴隶制的观点呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think Caesar knows what you did?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得凯撒知道你做了什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: My thoughts...are that I belong there with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的想法...是我跟他们同属于那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the Burned Man failed at Hoover Dam, the thought of running never occurred to him. He returned and accepted his fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当浴火者在胡佛大坝失败时，他从未想过逃跑。他返回并接受了他的命运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I, on the other hand, am a coward for evading Caesar's judgment, and every time I kill one of my brothers, I only further my cowardice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而我，却是一个逃避凯撒审判的懦夫，我每次杀死我的兄弟，都只会进一步加深我的懦弱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You saw what happened to Nipton. What are your thoughts when you see people put on the cross?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到了尼普顿发生的事情。当你看到人们被钉在十字架上时，你有什么想法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. It's not unusual for an assassin to die, but four in one night is another story. Time will tell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。刺客死掉并不罕见，但一晚上死掉四个人是另一回事。时间会说明一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caesar's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's strange. I expected to feel regret. I was afraid I'd feel joy. But all I feel is...relief.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很奇怪。我原本以为会感到后悔。我害怕自己会感到快乐。但我唯一感到的只是...解脱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not surprising. Caesar recognizes deeds, and loyalty. In my time with you, you've shown both.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这并不奇怪。凯撒认可行动和忠诚。在我和你在一起的时候，你展现出了这两者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've joined Caesar's Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经加入了凯撒的军团。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well...to be honest, I don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...说实话，我不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never lied about who I am, but I never made it a point to show it either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从未对自己的身份说谎，但我也从未刻意展示过它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe they knew all along. Maybe in the end, it was my cowardice that offended them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许他们一直知道。也许最后，是我的懦弱冒犯了他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess we'll never know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们永远都不会知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you were in the Legion, did you ever feel any pressure to hide your identity?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你在军团时，你有没有感到过任何隐藏你的身份的压力？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We could try the radio, see if there's a song you like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以试试收音机，看看有没有你喜欢的歌曲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We had music in the tribes. Drums and rhythms mostly, but it was the one thing I missed when I joined the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们部落里有音乐。主要是鼓声和节奏，而当我加入军团时，这是我唯一失去的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps the radio will play something similar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许收音机会播放类似的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we look around the wastes we could probably find some Pre-War paintings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们在废土四处转转，可能会找到一些战前的绘画作品。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It depends what you mean by Pre-War. I've seen pictures in books from eras gone by, paintings that would steal your breath away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这取决于你所说的战前是什么意思。我在书中看过过去时代的图片，那些画作能夺走你的呼吸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you won't find them on any billboard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你在任何广告牌上都找不到它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Has there been anything on your travels that you liked?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你的旅行途中有什么让你喜欢的东西吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to see an example of what the Legion finds humorous, then you only need look at the profilgates who oppose them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想看看军团觉得幽默的例子，那么你只需要看看那些反对他们的放荡者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their entire army is a joke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们整个军队都是一个笑话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about humor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 幽默呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Again, nothing I can quantify. Art of a style I can't describe. Music with textures that have no words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同样，我无法量化。我无法描述艺术风格。音乐有着无法言表的质地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess the best answer I can give you is, I'll know it when I feel it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我能给你的最好答案就是，当我感受到它时我就会知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about food? You certainly must have eaten a variety of things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 食物呢？你肯定吃过各种各样的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a matter of fact, I do have a favorite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我确实有一个最喜欢的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of the traders brought over a casserole once. It was filled with the poison gland of a radscorpion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一个商人曾经带来过一道煲菜。里面装满了一只辐射蝎的毒腺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I liked the idea that something could get its revenge long after its death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢这样的想法，某物能够在死后很久得以复仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you talking about the radscorpion, or yourself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在说辐射蝎，还是你自己？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps both. Although I have no ill will toward Caesar, if he comes after me, then I'll have no choice but to fight back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许两者都是。虽然我对凯撒并没有恶意，但如果他来找我麻烦，那么我将别无选择，只能还手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Given I've been shot in the head and left for dead, I suppose I can relate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到我曾被击中头部，丢在坑里等死，我想我能理解。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We both share a similar tale of death and survival. But I have no ill will toward Caesar. If I am dead to him, all the better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都分享着相似的死亡和生存的故事。但我对凯撒没有恶意。如果我对他来说已经死了，那就更好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's because it's finally over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为终于结束了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion is not so weak that it won't survive the loss of its Caesar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团还没脆弱到失去凯撒就无法生存。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the one who knew about my past is dead. And with it, any connection I have to his legacy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但知晓我的过去的那个人已经死了。随之而来的是，我与他的一切联系都变成了遗产。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps not in name, but I will fight for your cause. In a strange way, it almost feels like a pardon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许不是以自己的名义，但我会为你的事业而战。这几乎感觉像是一种奇怪方式的赦免。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Imagine that. Caesar, the man who burned his right hand and left him to die, showing a traitor mercy. And I have you to thank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想象一下。凯撒，那个烧伤他右手并让他自生自灭的人，竟然显示出对叛徒的仁慈。我得感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's too bad you can never be one of us again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你再也无法成为我们其中的一个，这太糟了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Relief is a good feeling to have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如释重负的感觉真好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps. It's not something I've ever felt before, but it feels like something I can get used to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许吧。这不是我以前感受到过的，但感觉我可以慢慢适应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe he's forgotten. I certainly don't recognize myself some days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许他已经忘记了。有些日子，我甚至都认不出自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, if it's not an approval, at the very least it feels like a pardon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，就算没有批准，也至少感觉像是一种宽恕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Imagine that. Caesar, the man who burned his right hand and left him to die, showing a traitor mercy. And I have you to thank.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想象一下。凯撒，那个烧伤他右手并让他自生自灭的人，竟然显示出对叛徒的仁慈。我得感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least you feel something. All I feel is apathy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少你能感觉到一些东西。我所感受到的只有冷漠。

ESP.ORIGINAL: For a long time I felt that as well. Then I joined the Legion, and that apathy turned to focus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很长一段时间，我也有同样的感觉。然后我加入了军团，那种冷漠变成了专注。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I feel neither. But at the same time, it's a feeling I can get used to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我两者都感觉不到了，但与此同时，这种感觉又可以慢慢适应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If so, you've fooled Caesar himself, and that is no small feat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是这样，你甚至欺骗了凯撒本人，这可不是小事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It appears you've even managed to grant me some sort of pardon. And for that I thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你甚至设法给了我某种程度的赦免。对此我表示感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've shown neither. I'm just a damn good liar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我两者都没表现出来。我只是个很会说谎的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't relax just yet. Another Caesar will take the mantle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在还不能放松。另一位凯撒会继承他的衣钵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: True. But it was this Caesar who brought me into his tribe. And with his death, any connection to his legacy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实。但是正是这位凯撒把我引入了他的部落。随着他的死亡，我与他的一切联系都变成了他的遗产。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's a radscorpion casserole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有个辐射蝎煲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh, so you remembered. I feel like I should say the Latin word for thanks, but I don't know it. There was never a need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵，所以你还记得。我觉得我应该说一声拉丁语的感谢，但我不知道怎么说。从来没有过这种需求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: In fact, showing gratitude of any kind feels strange on the tongue, but thank you nonetheless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，任何形式的感激之情在口中都感觉很奇怪，但尽管如此，谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这等着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Following.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正在跟着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([1100110E]x3DNPCFollowers) Quest to Handle Followers EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. It's time I fess up. Best I start from the beginning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对。我该坦白了。最好从头说起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I left home, Pa made me promise to do right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我离开家的时候，爸爸让我承诺要行事正直。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't matter if I kept the good book with me, don't matter if I remembered the words, so long as I stayed true to their spirit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管我有没有随身带着圣经，不管我是否记得那些话，只要我能忠于它们的精神就好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: And for the most part I did, until the day I met Cole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大部分时候我做到了，直到我遇到科尔那天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we're heading somewhere dangerous, I think it's time you tell me what this is all about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们要去一个危险的地方，我觉得是时候告诉我这一切到底是怎么回事了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The name's Hope. Hope Lies. Funny name, I know. German, I think. The lying part, not the hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫霍普。霍普莱斯（Hope Lies）。这个名字很有趣，我知道。我想是德语。指存在（Lies）的部分，不是希望（Hope）。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't believe we've met.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们还没见过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know how it is. The owner spent all his caps classing the joint up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道是怎么回事。老板花光了他的所有瓶盖来装饰这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, like grenades and explosives. NCR's got those too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，就像手榴弹和炸药。NCR也有这些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: But what about heart, Bill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是心呢，比尔？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You leave Nessie alone. She's got the shellshock from seeing you naked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别管尼西了。看到你裸体她都吓坏了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion ain't got no heart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团没有心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's exactly what I'm saying. They're crazy, heartless bastards, and they'll kill you and your family before you even think to shoot it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正是这么说的。他们是疯狂、无情的混蛋，会在你还没想到开枪之前就杀了你和你的家人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shoot what, Frank?
ESP.TRADUIT: 开枪打什么，弗兰克？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their hearts, Bill. Their hearts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打他们的心，比尔。他们的心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh I don't know...maybe the mayor had a sense of humor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我不知道...也许市长有幽默感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh I'm sure it was full to burstin'. Every stool filled with one of them pin-up girls you see in the old magazines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我敢肯定这地方曾经爆满。每个凳子上都坐着你在老杂志上看到的那些海报女孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shame it ain't like that now. All them girls are up with the angels, and now I have to look at your ugly ass every day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可惜现在不是那样了。那些女孩都在天上，现在我每天都得看着你这张丑脸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't hate me because I'm beautiful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别因为我漂亮就恨我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm serious though Frank, why us? Why does it seem like every decent person that ever lived died in that war, and bums like us are still here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我是认真的，弗兰克，为什么是我们？为什么似乎每个曾经活过的正派人物都死在那场战争里，而我们这样的流浪汉还在这里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Matthew 5:5.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马太福音第五章第五节。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's that? A Bible verse?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是什么？圣经上的一句话？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Blessed are the meek, for they shall inherit the earth."
ESP.TRADUIT: “温柔的人有福了，因为他们必承受地土。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Hey Trudy, what do you say? You think those skirt-wearing pansies could take out a squad of highly trained rangers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。嘿，特鲁迪，你怎么说？你觉得那些穿裙子的娘们能干掉一队训练有素的游骑兵吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody knows who's gonna win, Legion or NCR. Might not make much of a difference around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁也不知道是会军团还是NCR会赢。也许这对这里来说没多大区别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Trudy [00104C6C] (file) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now that's a smart answer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是个聪明的回答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: See? What did I tell you Frank? This mope agrees with me. NCR, all the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到了吗？我跟你说什么来着，弗兰克？这个家伙同意我。NCR，肯定的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bill [11000802] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! That's uncalled for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！这话可不应该说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only one stubborn here is you Bill. Like how you won't let Doc Mitchell fix your nose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 固执的只有你，比尔。就像你不让米切尔医生修好你的鼻子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why you wasting this poor soul's time? We all know the Legion would win.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么浪费这个可怜人的时间？我们都知道军团会赢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well buckaroo, I was just on my way out of town. And here you are to take my place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧哥们儿，我正打算离开这座小镇。你却在这里，来接替我的位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't have a job for you. But that great chief in the sky, he's got us all working.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我没有工作给你。但是天上的大首领，他让我们都在忙活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, I was just about to leave town, and in you come to take my place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我正准备离开小镇，而你却进来接替我的位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, you got a job for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么，你有工作给我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that's why it's so impressive. You don't see the gears moving, taking us round and round.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这正是它让人印象深刻的地方。你看不到齿轮在转动，但它们确实带着我们一圈一圈地转。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Circle of life, is what it is. That's why whenever I kill a man, I don't feel right until I knock up a girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是生命的轮回。所以每次我杀了一个人，我都觉得必须让一个女孩怀孕，才能感觉好点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, just to help keep the ride moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，这只是为了让这轮回继续下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's just a coincidence. And a boring one at that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只是个巧合。而且是个无聊的巧合。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you're special. Normal folks can't see how the machine is made. But if you do figure it out, you'd be smart not to fuck up the gears.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你就特别了。普通人看不出这机器是怎么运转的。但如果你真能搞明白，你最好不要搞坏齿轮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Circle of life, is what it is. That's why whenever I kill a man, I don't feel right until I knock up a girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是生命的轮回。所以每次我杀了一个人，我都觉得必须让一个女孩怀孕，才能感觉好点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, just to help keep the ride moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，这只是为了让这轮回继续下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something about this meeting does feel different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次的会面确实感觉不太一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whiskey, right? The very drink I would've ordered, had I stayed. You see how it all balances out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 威士忌，对吧？正是如果我留下来会点的那种酒。你看到这一切如何平衡起来的了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Circle of life, is what it is. That's why whenever I kill a man, I don't feel right until I knock up a girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是生命的轮回。所以每次我杀了一个人，我都觉得必须让一个女孩怀孕，才能感觉好点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, just to help keep the ride moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，这只是为了让这轮回继续下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't come to take anyone's place. All I want is a drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是来取代任何人的。我只想要喝杯酒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No need to tell me what I was already doing. Cuz the man with the plan, the Big Cheese, the Ayatollah of Rock 'n Rolla, he's got it all figured out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用告诉我我已经在做什么。因为有计划的人，大人物，摇滚之王阿亚图拉，他已经把一切都安排好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Circle of life, is what it is. That's why whenever I kill a man, I don't feel right until I knock up a girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是生命的轮回。所以每次我杀了一个人，我都觉得必须让一个女孩怀孕，才能感觉好点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, just to help keep the ride moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，这只是为了让这轮回继续下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're talking nonsense. Get away from me, you drunken lout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在胡说八道。离我远点，你这醉鬼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The name's Vincent. Vincent Vincent. Second verse, same as the first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫文森特。文森特·文森特。第二段跟第一段一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你叫什么名字？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right. Named after the famous Vincent Somebody. Or Somebody Vincent. Both of those people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，以某个著名的文森特为姓。或者某个文森特的名。两者都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vincent...Vincent?
ESP.TRADUIT: 文森特...文森特？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not just a little. Extremely redundant. Which is what makes it unique.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不只是有点冗余。而是非常冗余。这正是让它独特的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That seems a little redundant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这似乎有点冗余。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yet the Legion's code won't allow you to be yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，军团的规矩不允许你做自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not the code that's the problem. In my case, it was the men who failed to uphold it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题不在于准则。对我来说，在于那些未能坚守准则的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: They failed to accept me as a warrior. I failed to serve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们未能接受我作为一个战士。我也未能尽职。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I agree. A land led by profilgates will only dive further into chaos.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意。由放荡者领导的土地只会陷入更深的混乱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad to see you're on the side of reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴看到你站在理性的一边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They may not accept me as one of their own, but the fault is mine. Legion rule will bring about a golden age.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们或许不会接受我作为他们的一员，但这是我的过错。军团的统治会带来一个黄金时代。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about freedom?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那自由呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is the trader who gets ransacked by raiders free?
ESP.TRADUIT: 被掠夺者洗劫的商人是自由的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion protects its people from the outside world, and frees them from their own incompetence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团保护它的人民免受外界侵害，并使他们摆脱自身的无能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about freedom?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那自由呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR isn't perfect, but they don't mistreat women, and they don't have slaves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管NCR并不完美，但他们不虐待女性，也没有奴隶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I once had the freedom to choose my own path, and I became a savage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾有选择自己道路的自由，但我成了一个野蛮人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was Caesar who taught me to be a warrior and a man. The NCR does nothing to save you from yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是凯撒教会了我如何成为一个战士和一个男人。NCR并不会拯救你脱离自身。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: East, maybe. Or West. Shit, wherever they got killers, cunts, and caps, that's where I'll be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 东边吧，或者西边。妈的，只要哪里有杀手、混蛋和瓶盖，我就去哪里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are you headed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要去哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what I said, one for each man I've killed, spread out from coast to coast like an army of ugly little bloatflies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是我所说的，我杀过的人，像一支丑陋的小苍蝇军队一样散布在整个大陆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you seriously have children?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的有孩子吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you fucking kidding? What kind of father would I be if I let someone like me hang around my kids?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的在开玩笑吗？如果我让像我这样的人待在孩子身边，我会成什么样的父亲？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you visit your children?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去看过你的孩子吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'll tell you a story. I once owned a pet cockroach. Figured if it could survive a nuclear holocaust, it could survive my parenting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我给你讲个故事。我曾养过一只宠物蟑螂。我想，如果它能在核毁灭中幸存下来，它就能在我的养育下生存。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I put it in a glass jar, but sure enough, it died a few days later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我把它放在玻璃罐里，但果然，几天后它就死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone told me it's because I didn't give it any airholes. But I remember sticking the needle in its back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人告诉我那是因为我没有打通气孔。但我记得我用针给他背上扎进去了几下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What makes you think you'd be a bad parent?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么认为你会是个糟糕的父亲？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh, that's pretty good. You got a license to practice bullshit? I can sell you one if you don't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，那可真不错。你有胡扯的熟练执照吗？如果没有，我可以卖你一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: A good one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个笑话不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure it does. As much sense as gills on a dolphin. Don't try to think about it, just let that one soak in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然有道理。就像给海豚装上鳃一样有道理。别尝试去想，让它自己沉淀下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oddly enough, that makes perfect sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说来也怪，这反而非常有道理。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But they have a father. Me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他们有父亲。我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Growing up with no father is much more traumatizing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有父亲的成长会更受到精神创伤。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Believe it or not, I used to be a courier. You need something delivered fast and cheap, I was your man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 信不信由你，我曾经是个邮差。如果你需要快速便宜地送东西，我就是你的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what do you do to make ends meet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你靠什么谋生？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Simple. I can't sneak worth shit, so whenever I did a job, I'd spent a lot of time getting in fights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很简单。我根本不会偷偷摸摸，所以每次我接活儿，总是花很多时间在战斗上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually, I got pretty good at it. Not the job, but the fights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终，我做得越来越好。不是工作，而是战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I figured I could make a lot more caps if I stopped delivering shit altogether. Besides, well, you know, the pain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想，如果我完全不送东西，专门战斗，我可以赚更多的瓶盖。再说，好吧，你懂的，那些痛苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you quit being a courier?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不当邮差了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, at least you finally admitted it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，至少你终于承认了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have never shied away from who I am. I am a traitor and a coward, and I will be punished as one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从不逃避自己的身份。我是一个叛徒和懦夫，我将受到应有的惩罚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to be put on the cross?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想被钉在十字架上吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I want and what I deserve are two separate things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要的和我应得的是两回事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: The way you fight, I'd hardly call you a coward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从你的战斗方式来看，我很难说你是个懦夫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are different kinds of cowardice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 懦弱有不同的形式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes it's easier to fight an army of strangers than to disappoint the one person they respect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候，去和一支陌生人的军队作战，要比让他们尊敬的那个人失望更容易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I need you to be the most cowardly man in the world, because we have Legionnaires to kill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么我需要你成为世界上最懦弱的人，因为我们有军团士兵要杀。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. When my brothers betrayed me, I paid them in kind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。当我的兄弟们背叛我时，我会以牙还牙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: So long as you remain loyal, I will serve your needs. I will fight my brothers until the bitter end, no matter the cost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你保持忠诚，我就会满足你的需求。我会跟我的兄弟们战斗到底，不惜一切代价。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you afraid to die?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你害怕死吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't fear death. I don't even fear Caesar's retribution. What I fear is his disapproval.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不怕死。我甚至不怕凯撒的报复。我害怕的是他的失望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes ma'am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，女士。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. And while you're at it, try and keep those hands close together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。趁着这个机会，尽量把你的手放近一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last guy who robbed me put his hands so far apart I couldn't see one without losing the other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上次抢劫我的家伙把手分得太开，不让他失去一只手我就看不见另一只。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thing is, that was the one holding the gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是，那是拿枪的那只手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Calm down, I mean you no harm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静点，我无意伤害你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's exactly what a raider would say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这正是一个掠夺者会说的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's like "Hey can you help me out, I got this cut on my hip" and then boom! Party's over. I'm not falling for that again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像：“嘿，你能帮帮我吗，我的屁股被割伤了”，然后砰！派对结束了。我不会再上当了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should try being nicer to a potential customer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该对潜在顾客更友好一点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tried being nice. But I can't afford to be. Not anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尝试过友好相处。但我不能再那样做了。再也不能了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although you look friendly enough. Which is exactly why you're so goddamn suspicious!
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然你看起来足够友好。但也正因为这样你才这么让人起疑心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will put my hands wherever I please. Usually in my pants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把手放在我想放的地方。通常是在裤子里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do that and I start shooting. And don't think I'll hesitate to shoot a woman in the fly-trap! Not after the last time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你那样做我就开始开枪。别以为我会犹豫不决地对着一个陷阱里的女人开枪！上次之后我绝不会再犹豫了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do that and I start shooting. And don't think I'll hesitate to shoot a man in the jing-jang! Not after the last time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你那样做我就开始开枪。别以为我会犹豫不决地对着一个陷阱里的男人开枪！上次之后我绝不会再犹豫了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can tell me their names. The Hippocratic Oath is not that rigid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以告诉我他们的名字。希波克拉底誓言并不那么严格。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But it's an oath. You can't break an oath! Or else what's the point?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这是一个誓言。你不能违背誓言！否则还有什么意义？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't trust you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不信任你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What sort of medical training do you have?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你接受过什么样的医学培训？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I've studied medical terminals and books from all over Nevada.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我研究过内华达各地的医疗终端和书籍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for field work, most of my experience comes from all the times I've been robbed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于实地工作，我大部分经验来自于我被抢劫的经历。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've performed six surgeries on myself in the past three months, and I've got the scars to prove it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在过去的三个月里，我给自己做了六次手术，我有疤痕作证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem a little apprehensive. What's the matter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你似乎有点担忧。怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just trying to make a living, same as you, same as everyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想谋生，就像你一样，像所有人一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before, all I wanted was to treat the sick and make a few caps. But it turns out some people are just sick in the head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以前，我只想治病救人，赚点瓶盖。但事实证明，有些人就是脑子里有病。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, bonkers, nutty, cuckoo for Cola.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你懂的，疯疯癫癫，神志不清，为了可乐发狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: They come by and ask me to fix them, but they don't pay. In fact, they steal. And some of them aren't even ill!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们来找我治病，却不付钱。实际上，他们还偷东西。有些人根本就没病！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd tell you their names if it weren't for goddamn Doctor-Patient Confidentiality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不是该死的医患保密，我会告诉你他们的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean, sick in the head?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的脑子里有病是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about yourself. Why become a doctor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我关于你自己的事情。为什么当医生？

ESP.ORIGINAL: For the caps. The wastes are dangerous, and there's a need for doctors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了瓶盖。废土很危险，需要医生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stimpaks are great, but they can't heal everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 治疗针很好，但它们并不能治愈所有疾病。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't fuck with me lady. Put the gun down or I put you down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别惹我了，女士。放下枪，否则我就要动手了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, this is my store. And if you want to make a deal, we play by my rules.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，这是我的店。如果你想做交易，就得按我的规则来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although it's not a game, so there aren't any rules. It's more like a contract. Hands up if you wanna sign it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过这不是游戏，所以没有规则。更像是合同。想签约就举起手来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: So now you're taking measures to defend yourself. Smart move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你采取了防卫措施。明智的举动。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course it's smart. I'm a doctor! I didn't study medicine for eight years because I'm stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然很聪明。我是医生！我学医八年不是因为我蠢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I did it because I was starving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而是因为我快饿死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about hiring a bodyguard?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那雇一个保镖呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bodyguards are expensive. Arming them is expensive. Giving them lunches and days off and sick leave is expensive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保镖很贵。武装他们很贵。给他们提供午餐、休假和病假也很贵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: It might be cheaper getting robbed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能被抢劫还更便宜些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I hate to break it to you, but I've been known to steal a few things myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我不想打破你的幻想，但我也有偷过一些东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No! Hands off! Or I swear to god I'm gonna shoot them!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不！手放开！不然我发誓我会开枪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: In that case, you can relax. I'm not a thief.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果那样的话，你可以放心了。我不是小偷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do I know that? It's not like you can prove it. Maybe if you buy something and leave quietly, I might believe you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么知道？你又不能证明。也许你买点东西然后安静地离开，我可能会相信你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, they can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，它们可以。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a doctor I'm obliged to tell you I disagree with your opinion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为医生，我有义务告诉你我不同意你的观点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I encourage you to purchase all the stimpaks I have in order to prove my point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我鼓励你买下我所有的治疗针来证明我的观点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't think stimpaks work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得治疗针没效果吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe that a lot of the effects are placebic. Which is a fancy way of saying it's all in your head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信很多效果都是安慰剂效应。简单来说，就是你心理作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go ahead, buy them and see for yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 继续吧，买下来自己看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I agree. All you really need is alcohol, glue, and duct tape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意。你真正需要的只是酒精、胶水和胶带。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That, and extensive medical training. Tools aren't enough. Believe me, I've tried. Lucky for me, those patients are too dead to complain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有，广泛的医学训练。光有工具是不够的。相信我，我试过。幸运的是，那些病人都死了，抱怨不了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's also why I make sure to get their caps up front.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这也是为什么我确保先收瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you treat people just for the caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你只是为了瓶盖来给人治病？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me tell you a story. I once knew a man who killed his own wife by giving her too much Med-X.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我给你讲个故事。我曾经认识一个人，他因为给他妻子注射了过量的吗啡针-X而杀了她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could argue that his heart was in the right place - although technically it wasn't because he needed surgery to fix a loose valve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以说他的出发点是好的 - 尽管技术上来说不是，因为他需要手术来修复松动的心脏瓣膜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, my point is, motivations mean nothing. Are my thoughts a little sketchy? Sure. But is what I do unethical? Of course not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，我的意思是，动机毫无意义。我的想法有点不靠谱？当然。但我做的事不道德吗？当然不是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'm addicted to something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我对某种东西上瘾了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's probably from carrying around too many caps. Those things are a magnet for germs. Give a hundred to me, and it's a cure and a a vaccine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可能是因为携带了太多瓶盖。那些东西是吸引病菌的磁铁。给我一百个，这就是疗法和疫苗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you have for sale?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么东西出售？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything. RadAway, Med-X, Stimpaks, you name it. But only for paying customers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所有东西。辐特宁、吗啡针-X、治疗针，应有尽有。但仅限付费客户。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got chems, but I'm not responsible if you try and abuse them. The instructions are on the packages and they're very clear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有药品，但如果你滥用它们，我不会负责。包装上有清晰的使用说明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, if you do abuse them, come here if you need to detox!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，如果你真的滥用了，想解毒就来找我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got anything for sale?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么要卖的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That depends. Do you have caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那得看情况。你有瓶盖吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got anything for sale?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么要卖的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you patch me up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能给我治疗一下吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Money first, the patching up comes after. Price is one hundred caps, no refunds, no exceptions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先付钱，再治疗。价格是一百瓶盖，不予退款，无一例外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hundred caps and I'll do it, but any sudden movements and I'm sticking my scalpel where the sun don't shine. Front and back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一百瓶盖，我就干，但你要是有任何突然动作，我就用手术刀捅你个前后通透。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Money first. The patching up comes after.
ESP.TRADUIT: 先付钱。再治疗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you heal my radiation?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能治愈我的辐射吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got RadAway for sale, having me stick the needle in you costs extra. One hundred caps, up front.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有辐特宁卖，打针另收费。一百瓶盖，先付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's fine. Do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，就这么办。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 成交。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like you're a little short. Oh god, you aren't here to rob me, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来你有点不够。天啊，你不是来抢劫的，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: No thanks, I think I'll pass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用了，我觉得算了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Was the price too high?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？是价格太高了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes! Mom always said being a doctor would make me rich.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的！妈妈总说当医生会让我发财。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like you're a little short. Oh god, you aren't here to rob me, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来你有点不够。天啊，你不是来抢劫的，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay. Patch me up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。给我治疗一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This will only take a second. Well, that's a lie, it'll probably take all night. But it's not my fault you can't lay off the chems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只需要一秒钟。好吧，这是谎话，可能要一整夜。但这不是我的错，是你自己离不开那些药品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like you're a little short. Oh god, you aren't here to rob me, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来你有点不够。天啊，你不是来抢劫的，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Xiaojian [11001F35] (mod) Quest : ([11002214]x3DNPCXiao) Xiao EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about your family? Did they survive the war?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的家人呢？他们在战争中幸存下来了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even in my old tribe, I was an outcast. I despised them for it, when I should've been thanking them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使在我原来的部落，我也是个被排斥的人。我本应该感谢他们，但我却为此憎恨他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: A wolf has no place among sheep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狼在羊群中没有容身之地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about the training. How does one become a full-fledged Legion warrior?
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我关于训练的事情。一个人要怎么成为一名成熟的军团战士？

ESP.ORIGINAL: From the moment we pledge our lives to Caesar, we are thrown into fire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从我们以命向凯撒宣誓的那一刻起，我们就被投进了火中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The training is strict. Not everyone survives. Those who do become Legionaries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 训练非常严格，并不是所有人都能活下来。那些活下来的人就成为军团士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about those who can't fight?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些不能战斗的人呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then they are given tasks that suit their skills. Some train the hounds, others repair weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那他们会被分配到适合自己技能的任务上。有些人训练猎犬，有些人修理武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the instructor's job to mold each initiate into the proper tool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 教官的职责是将每个新兵塑造成合适的工具。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about the armor though? Not many places in the Mojave are friendly to the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是盔甲呢？莫哈维的很多地方都不对军团友好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The armor I'd like to keep, but the shirt and the Legion colors, that I can change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 盔甲我想留下，但衬衫和军团的颜色我可以改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, I've lost the right to wear them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟，我已经失去了穿它们的资格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I respectfully disagree. Seems to me if it's a good name, it doesn't matter what comes after.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我恭敬地不同意。在我看来，如果名字好，后面加什么都无所谓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally Vincent's a fine name. Save for if your last name is Vincent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一般来说，文森特是个好名。除非你的姓也是文森特。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could, but do I want to? That's your question right there. In case you still haven't figured it out, the answer's "No."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以，但是我想吗？那是你的问题。如果你还没明白，答案是“不”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can change your name, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以改名字，你知道吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks. Not everyone thinks so. But those people are dead. Dead wrong! Everything else about them is still alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。不是每个人都这么认为。但那些人已经死了。死得很冤！跟他们有关的其他一切都还活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vincent Vincent. It's a fine name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 文森特 文森特。是个不错的名字。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A blank movie screen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 空白的电影屏幕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well yes, that goes without saying. The greatness of an artist is directly proportional to his poverty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，毋庸置疑。一个艺术家的伟大与他的贫穷成正比。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all, only a handful of people are intelligent enough to recognize his talent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟，只有少数人足够聪明，能够认识到他的才华。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course you don't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然你没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what a movie is, but it sounds incredibly tedious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道电影是什么，但听起来相当乏味。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, what you see is a canvas. All it needs is someone to paint it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你看到的是一块画布。它只需要有人来画！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see the worst place for a playground in the history of city planning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到了城市规划史上最糟糕的游乐场位置。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right. As you can see, we don't have that either. Besides, our time is too valuable to be spent lifting weights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错。你看，我们连那个也没有。此外，我们的时间太宝贵了，不能浪费在举重上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't need money if you have muscle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有肌肉，就不需要钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, yes, I realize that, but above it, what do you see!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，是的，我明白，但是在它之上，你看到了什么！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A canvas, am I right? A blank canvas just waiting to be painted!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一块画布，对吧？一个空白的画布就等着被画！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see the word "Duh" scribbled in the corner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到了在角落里“Duh”这个词的涂鸦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: True. In fact, I know of a place to the south of here that has what we need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错。事实上，我知道这附近南边有个地方有我们需要的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Trouble is, my time is far too valuable to waste on such things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是，我的时间太宝贵了，不能浪费在这些事情上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps you'd be willing to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你愿意帮忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's plenty of supplies out in the wastes if you know where to scavenge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在废土里有很多物资，只要你知道哪里可以搜刮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well yes, but pretend that's not there because it's terrible and makes me embarrassed for whoever wrote it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，不过假装它不存在，因为它很糟糕，让我为写这段话的人感到尴尬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Erase that, and what do you have? That's right, a canvas just waiting to be painted!
ESP.TRADUIT: 擦掉那一段，你还剩下什么？没错，一个等着被画的画布！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only space I see is the massive hole between your ears.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我唯一看到的空地就是你双耳之间的巨大空洞。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you can donate paint, then yes, we'll take it. Caps, on the other hand, are useless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能捐赠颜料，那么是的，我们会接受的。另一方面，瓶盖是无用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not unless you have paint to sell us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非你有颜料要卖给我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can help you out if you need a donation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要捐赠，我可以帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that was from a radscorpion sting, and purely cosmetic, I assure you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那是被辐射蝎蜇了，纯属外伤，我向你保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, the blank space you see is a canvas, one that begs to be painted!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你看到的空白空间是一块画布，一个迫切需要被画的画布！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you an artist?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是艺术家吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Am I an artist? Ha-ha-ha, do bloatflies eat shit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是个艺术家吗？哈哈哈，苍蝇会吃大便吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, really, do they? I feel like given their size they would have moved on to better smelling prey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，真的，它们吃吗？我觉得，考虑到它们的体型，它们应该已经转向更好闻的猎物了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you hanging out at the Drive-In?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么在汽车电影院待着？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We heard this place used to house a lost technology.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们听说这个地方曾经藏有一项失传的技术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something that could take pictures and make them...move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一种能拍照并让照片...动起来的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Knowing this, a lesser artist might try to recreate what was lost. But I propose something else entirely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道了这一点，一个次等的艺术家可能会试图重新创造失去的东西。但我提出完全不同的想法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because first, we need a vision...we need inspiration...we need...
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为首先，我们需要一个构想...我们需要灵感...我们需要...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why haven't you started painting yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你还没开始画呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I do to help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能做什么来帮助你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're eager to assist us. Good. To start, we'll need paint. See if you can find a bucket at the old rest stop on Nipton Road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你渴望帮助我们。好。首先，我们需要颜料。看看你能不能在尼普顿路的旧休息站找到一个桶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: And to finish?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样结束了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, let's not jump the gun just yet, my protege. Bring us the paint first, and then we'll talk about the grand finale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，我们先不要急于行动，我的徒弟。先把颜料带给我们，然后我们再谈论压轴戏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you proposing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么建议？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if the pictures were like these cars? What if instead of moving, they stood in place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果照片像这些车一样呢？如果它们不动，而是呆在原地呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wouldn't that be the perfect metaphor? Am I not a genius for thinking it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不正是个完美的比喻吗？能想到这一点，我不正是个天才吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: To be honest, you're kind of an idiot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说，你有点儿白痴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're a critic. And apparently not a very good one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你是个批评家。而且显然不是很好的那种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: But don't worry, I shall make it my mission in life to show you true art.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但别担心，我会把向你展示真正的艺术作为我一生的使命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a genius of the highest form.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是最高形式的天才。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I know. But hearing others say it is definitely good for the ego.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我知道。但听别人说还是挺有助于自我满足的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. It's a metaphor for the end of mankind's progress.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了。这是对人类进步的终结的比喻。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exactly! Time itself has stopped, and that's what this piece will convey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错！时间本身停止了，这件作品将传达这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a deep thought for a twelve year old. But someone your age should be past such nonsense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对十二岁小孩来说这是个深刻的想法。但你这个年龄应该会不在意这样的胡说八道了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The depth of genius does not change with age. Only your willingness to fall in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天才的深度不会因年龄而改变。变的只有你愿意沉浸其中的程度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need paint.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要颜料。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gumdrop [11002DF0] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, that too. We don't have any paint.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，也对。我们没有颜料。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nipton Road, fetch the bucket. Got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尼普顿公路，拿来桶子。明白了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fetch? You make it sound like a menial task. I assure you, something this important would not be left to some mangy dog.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿来？你让它听起来像是个卑微的任务。我向你保证，这样重要的事情不会留给一条癞皮狗去做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean really, have you ever tried to train one? They don't really have a grasp of the language.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说，你真的试过训练一只吗？它们不太理解语言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, this task is just the first step in creating a true masterpiece. When you complete it, you'll understand why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这个任务只是创造真正杰作的第一步。当你完成它时，你会明白为什么的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know enough about art to tell you one way or the other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对艺术的了解不够，给不出你或是或非的答案。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We all have to start from somewhere, friend. But when you see my masterpiece, you'll be starting from the top.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都必须从某个地方开始，朋友。但当你看到我的杰作时，你会从顶端开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you an artist like Pollock?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是像波洛克那样的艺术家吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, there's only one artist here, and it's Chainsaw. Pollock is more of an "idea" guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，这里只有一个艺术家，那就是钱恩斯。波洛克更像是一个“理念”人物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : 1EJunkieFaction Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me, I just hang out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我呢，只是在这里晃荡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Faction : 1EJunkieFaction Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, he's the artist. I just paint.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，他才是艺术家。我只是负责画画的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chainsaw [110030DB] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, he's too creative to waste his time with that. So it's up to me to try and take what's in his head and make it real.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，他太有创意了，不会浪费时间在那种事情上。所以我要努力把他脑海里的想法变成现实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chainsaw [110030DB] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pollock doesn't paint?
ESP.TRADUIT: 波洛克不画画吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do they call you Gumdrop?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么他们叫你刚德普（软糖）？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because I like to chew 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我喜欢嚼它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gumdrop [11002DF0] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're kind of bad for you though. I think that's why my hair's starting to fall out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过它们对你不太好。我想这就是为什么我的头发开始掉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gumdrop [11002DF0] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: The three of used to be jackal gangers, but it turned out none of us like killing folks all that much, let alone eating them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们三个以前是豺狼帮成员，但后来发现我们都不太喜欢杀人，更别提吃人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chainsaw [110030DB] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In fact, if this painting thing doesn't work out, I'll probably head up to Goodsprings, see if I can't find some honest work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，如果画画这件事不成功，我可能会去清泉镇找些踏实的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chainsaw [110030DB] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did the three of you meet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们三个是怎么认识的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about painting this screen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对在这个屏幕上画画有什么想法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. I think Pollock was secretly hoping we'd get to watch some moving pictures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我觉得波洛克暗地里是希望我们能到看些动态影像。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gumdrop [11002DF0] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: So turning it into a painting is almost like sour grapes, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以把它变成一幅画差不多就像是吃不到葡萄说葡萄酸，你懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gumdrop [11002DF0] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like a "Fuck you, I didn't want watch your movie anyway" kind of deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 像是“操你妈的，反正我也不想看你那电影”的那种感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gumdrop [11002DF0] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, it'll be fun to see what you guys come up with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，看看你们会想出什么东西也挺有趣的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gumdrop [11002DF0] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm no artist, so I'll leave the thinking to Pollock. I'm just trying not to mess up his vision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是艺术家，所以我会把思考交给波洛克。我就尽量不要搞乱他的构想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chainsaw [110030DB] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got your paint.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有你要的颜料。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fantastic! I'll have Chainsaw begin work immediately! Well, as soon as he gets over his fear of heights.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了！我会让钱恩斯立刻开始工作！不过，等他克服了恐高症再说吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you let me worry about that. You've got more important things to take care of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这件事就交给我吧。你有更重要的事情要处理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we have the paint, thanks to you, and we have the vision, thanks to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们有了颜料，多亏了你，我们有了构想，多亏了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But to finish...to truly make this a masterpiece...we need to make this more than a commentary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但要完成这件作品，要真正让它成为杰作，我们要做的不只是评论。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you need me to do next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来你需要我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: By making it a piece of living history. A monument to the end of empires, old and new.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让它成为一段活生生的历史。一座新旧帝国终结的纪念碑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: What we need is the blood of a king.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要的是王者之血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do we do that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们该怎么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, this is the best part! You get to choose!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这是最棒的部分！你得自己选择！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's two of them vying for the throne as we speak. President Kimball of the NCR, and Caesar of the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们说话时，正有两位在争夺王座。NCR 的金博尔总统，以及军团的凯撒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where would I get the blood of a king?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要去哪里得到王者之血？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fantastic! I can almost smell the fascism! That is, if it weren't in a sealed plastic bag.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了！我差不多能闻到法西斯主义的味道了！当然，要是它不是装在一个密封的塑料袋里的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyways, this is just what we need to give our centerpiece the visceral component it deserves!
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，这正是我们需要的，给我们的核心带来应有的直观感受！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got the blood of kings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得到王者之血了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, I don't think I can help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，我想我帮不了你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course. Not everyone has the...uh...how do I put this gently...mental capacity to understand what we're trying to do here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。并非每个人都有...呃...我该怎么委婉地说呢...理解我们这里的意图的心智能力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I do like the idea of leaving this work unfinished. It's no different than the people who died here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我确实喜欢让这件作品未完成的想法。这和死在这里的人没什么不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You leaving unfulfilled is its own ending.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你未完成地离开就是它自己的结局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: And when you return, we'll splatter their blood on the screen and turn this painting into a true historical landmark.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你回来时，我们会把他们的血液喷洒在屏幕上，把这幅画变成一个真正的历史地标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Behold! A mushroom cloud stained with the blood of a slain king!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看啊！一朵蘑菇云染上了被刺王者的鲜血！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lay your eyes on this piece, and bear witness to the end of empires!
ESP.TRADUIT: 注视这件作品，见证帝国的终结吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any thoughts now that the work is finished?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在工作已经完成了，有什么想法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The piece is magnificent. Well, at least the one in my head is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这件作品真是太棒了。至少，我脑子里的是这样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for the one up there, I think Chainsaw mixed in a little too much white into the blood. It almost looks pink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于上面的那个，我觉得钱恩斯在血液里混进的白色有点太多了，看起来几乎变成粉红色了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's got a heart in it, which I like. And it's got some dead ruler's blood, which is pretty cool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，它里面有颗心脏，我喜欢这个。还有些死去统治者的血，这也挺酷的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gumdrop [11002DF0] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, enjoy it while it lasts. I'm sure Pollock will get tired of it in about a week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，趁它还在的时候好好欣赏吧。我敢肯定波洛克大概一星期后就会厌倦它了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gumdrop [11002DF0] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly, most of the time I was just scared shitless being up so high.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说实话，大部分时间我在这么高的地方都吓得要命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chainsaw [110030DB] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I messed up so many times it just ended up being a splatter job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我搞砸了很多次，最后变成了乱洒一通。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chainsaw [110030DB] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: But Pollock doesn't seem to mind, so who am I to judge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是波洛克似乎不介意，所以我也不好说什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Chainsaw [110030DB] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want me to kill the President?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想让我刺杀总统吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, him or Caesar. Or just get them to donate the blood, it doesn't matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，他或者凯撒。只要让他们献血就行，都没关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: We can always say you killed him later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以一直等你晚点再杀他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do I get for doing this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能为这得到什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Art isn't about financial rewards. It's about creation, and expression, and...well you get the idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 艺术不是关于经济报酬的。它是关于创造和表达的...好吧你明白我的意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Point is, you won't get caps, but you will get a sense of accomplishment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 重点是，你不会得到瓶盖，但你会有一种成就感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're crazy if you think I'm doing this for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你认为我会为了你做这件事，那你就疯了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You aren't doing it for me, you're doing it for art! Besides, I'm not saying you have to assassinate them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是为了我做这件事，你是为了艺术！此外，我并不是说一定要你本人刺杀他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just be there with a needle in case somebody else does.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要在有人刺杀他们时拿着针头在旁边等着就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Consider it done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the spirit! No mountain is too high, no throne is too guarded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就对了！没有翻不过去的山，没有搞不定的守卫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: And when you return, we'll splatter their blood on the screen and turn this painting into a true historical landmark.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你回来时，我们会把他们的血液喷洒在屏幕上，把这幅画变成一个真正的历史地标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pollock [11002AF3] (mod) Quest : ([11002DD2]x3DNPCPollockDialogue) Moving Pictures EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mean Dinky?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说丁奇？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So it has a name. And when people come to see it, do they come to gawk or admire?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以它有名字。当人们来参观时，他们是来瞧热闹的还是来欣赏的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not buying you one of those stupid toys, if that's what you're asking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是在问我会不会给你买一个那样蠢的玩具，那答案是否定的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My interest isn't in the toys so much as the reason for them. Do people...respect this dinosaur? Or do they fear him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对这些玩具本身不太感兴趣，而在意它们背后的原因。人们...尊敬这只恐龙吗？还是害怕它？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you ask?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么问？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It just occurred to me that people accuse the Legion of being dinosaurs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我突然想到人们指责军团为恐龙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder if they view me the same way. A fossil unfit for the earth.
