ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道他们是否也以同样的方式看待我。一块不适合这个世界的化石。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or if it's possible they see me like they see this "Dinky." A curiosity. A marvel. Maybe even a friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者他们是否可能像看待这只“丁奇”一样看待我。一个引起好奇心的事物。一个奇迹。甚至是一个朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if it means anything, that's the way I see you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，如果这有什么意义，那就是我看待你的方式。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that would imply we're equals. Or perhaps you're saying friendship can't be explained by a simple hierarchy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这意味着我们是平等的。或者你可能是说友谊不能用简单的等级制度来解释。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, it's good to know that I still have a place in this world. Just as this dinosaur has his.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，很高兴知道我在这个世界上仍有一席之地。就像这只恐龙一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dinky is a much better friend than you'll ever be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丁基是一个比你永远都要好的朋友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no doubt he's a better listener, but that's beside the point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我毫不怀疑他是个更好的倾听者，但这不是重点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If this monster can earn your trust, then perhaps there will come a time when I do the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这个怪物能赢得你的信任，那也许有一天我也能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just think it's funny you're choosing a forty foot plastic dinosaur as your role model.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是觉得你选择一个四十英尺高的塑料恐龙作为你的榜样有点好笑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was likely as fearsome a predator as any. Now it's...something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它曾经可能是一个像其他捕食者一样可怕的存在。现在它...变成了别的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: And it makes me wonder if he feels out of place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这让我想知道它是否感到格格不入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're over-thinking this. It's just a tourist attraction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在想得太多了。这只是一个旅游景点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Perhaps. But it's hard not to see the parallels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许吧。但很难不看到其中的相似之处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wonder if I will find my place in this world, the way this dinosaur found his. And I wonder if it will be just as strange.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想知道我能否会在这个世界上找到自己的位置，就像这只恐龙的找到了他的位置一样。我也在想，那会不会同样奇怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Velius [11000DC2] (mod) Quest : ([11000E08]x3dnpcLegionDialogue) x3dnpcLegionary Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problemo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Roger that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes ma'am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，女士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never know how much I love you, never know how much I care, when you put your arms around me I get a fever that's so hard to bear, you give me fever!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从不知道我有多爱你，从不知道我有多在乎你，当你把我抱在怀里时，我就像发烧一样难以忍受，你给了我发烧的感觉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you kiss me, fever when you hold me tight, fever in the morning, fever all through the night!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你亲吻我时，我浑身发烫，你抱紧我时，我发烧难耐，早上如此，整夜也是如此！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sun lights up the daytime, moon lights up the night, I light up when you call my name, and you know I'm gonna treat you right, you give me fever!
ESP.TRADUIT: 太阳点亮白天，月亮照亮黑夜，当你叫我名字时，我就像它们一样亮了起来，你知道我会好好待你，你给了我发烧的感觉！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you kiss me, fever when you hold me tight, fever in the morning, fever all through the night!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你亲吻我时，我浑身发烫，你抱紧我时，我发烧难耐，早上如此，整夜也是如此！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everybody's got the fever, that is something you all know, fever isn't such a new thing, fever started long ago!
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都狂热起来，每个人都知道这事，发烫不是新鲜事物，发烧很久以前就开始了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Romeo loved Juliet, Juliet, she felt the same, when he put his arms around her, he said, "Julie, baby, you're my flame," thou giveth fever!
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗密欧爱上朱丽叶，朱丽叶也爱他，当他把她抱在怀里时，他说：“朱莉宝贝，你就是我的火焰，”你让我发烧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "When we kisseth, fever with thy flaming youth, fever, I'm afire, fever, yea, I burn, forsooth!"
ESP.TRADUIT: ”当我们亲吻时，在闪耀青春下的焰火，多么的热啊，我真的要燃烧起来了！“
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cap'n Smith and Pocahontas had a very mad affair, when her daddy tried to kill him, she said, "Daddy, oh, don't you dare," he gives me fever!
ESP.TRADUIT: 史密斯船长和波卡洪塔斯疯狂爱上彼此，当她发父亲要杀他时，她说：“你敢？”他让我发烧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: With his kisses, fever when he holds me tight, fever, I'm his missus, "Daddy, won't you treat him right?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的吻让我发烫，当他抱紧我时我发烧，我是他的缪斯，“爸爸，你能对他好些吗？”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you've listened to my story, here's the point that I have made, chicks were born to give you fever, be it Fahrenheit or Centigrade!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你已经听了我的故事，我已经表明心意，女孩们天生就是要让你发烧，无论是华氏度还是摄氏度！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They give you fever, when you kiss them, fever if you live and learn, fever, till you sizzle, what a lovely way to burn...
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你吻她们时，她们让你发烧，仅仅活着就能感受到灼热，发烧直到你沸腾，燃烧情火多么美妙...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a lovely way to burn...what a lovely way to burn...what a lovely way to burn...
ESP.TRADUIT: 燃烧情火多么美妙...燃烧情火多么美妙...燃烧情火多么美妙...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are the stars out tonight? I don't know if it's cloudy or bright, cause I only have eyes for you, dear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是晚上闪耀的星星吗？我看不清多云还是晴天，但我却能看清你啊，亲爱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: The moon may be high, but I can't see a cloud in the sky, cause I only have eyes for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 月亮高高在上，但在我眼中天空却空无一物，因为你是我唯一能看见的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if we're in a garden, or on a crowded avenue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道我们现在是身在花园，还是在拥挤的街道上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are here, so am I, maybe millions of people go by, but they all disappear from view, and I only have eyes for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这，所以我也来了，也许身边经过无数陌生人，但他们也是我眼中的过客罢了，因为我眼中只有你啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are here, so am I, maybe millions of people go by, but they all disappear from view, and I only have eyes for you
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这，所以我也来了，也许身边经过无数陌生人，但他们也是我眼中的过客罢了，因为我眼中只有你啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Love me or leave me and let me be lonely, you won't believe me that I want you only, rather be lonely than happy with somebody else!
ESP.TRADUIT: 爱我或者离开，让我孤单一人，你不会相信你是我的唯一，我宁愿孤单一人也不会另寻他欢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might find the night time the right time for kissing, but night time is my time for just reminiscing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你或许选择在夜晚，那个偷情的好时间，但夜晚是我追忆的时间！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regretting instead of forgetting with somebody else!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我放不下你，也没有另寻他欢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want no one unless that someone is you, you, you! I intend to be independently blue, blue, blue!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我再也容不下任何人，除了你，你，你！我想要解放自我，自我，自我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want your love but I don't want to borrow, I have it today and give back tomorrow, my love is your love there's no love for nobody else!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要你的爱，但不需要你的施舍，我的失去与得到总是交至着，爱你是我的全部，我已再也容不下任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Love me or leave me, rather be lonely than happy with somebody else!
ESP.TRADUIT: 爱我或者离开，宁愿孤单一人也不会另寻他欢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Love me or leave me, my love is your love and no love for nobody else!
ESP.TRADUIT: 爱我或者离开，爱你是我的全部，我已再也容不下任何人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want no one unless that someone is you, you, you! I intend to be independently blue!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我再也容不下任何人，除了你，你，你！我想要解放自我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want your love but I don't want to borrow, have it today, give back tomorrow, my love is your love there's no love for nobody else...nobody else...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要你的爱，但不需要你的施舍，失去与得到总是交至着，爱你是我的全部，我已再也容不下任何人...任何人...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They call me coquette, and mademoiselle, and I must admit I like it quite well; It's something to be the darling of all the Grand Femme Fatale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们叫我卖弄风情的姑娘，我必须承认我很喜欢；成为众人的挚爱真的很了不起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's nothing as gay as life in Paris, there's no other person, I'd rather be, I like what I do, I like what I see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 巴黎的生活无与伦比，我不想变成别人，我喜欢我所做的，我喜欢我所看到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But where is the schoolgirl that used to be me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可那个女学生在哪里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll see me in Cape D'Antibes or in Spain, I follow the sun by boat or by plane, it's any old millionaire in a storm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会在安提布海角或西班牙看到我，我乘船或坐飞机追随太阳，就像身处狂风暴雨中的百万富翁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: For I've got my mink to keep my heart warm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我有我的貂皮大衣来保持温暖我的心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And sometimes I drink too much with the crowd, and sometimes I laugh a little too loud, my head may be aching, but it's unbowed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时我喝太多酒，有时我笑得太大声，我的头可能会痛，可我从未屈服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And sometimes I see it all through a cloud.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时我透过云层看透一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, the apple trees, and the hive of bees, where we once got stung.
ESP.TRADUIT: 苹果树，和一群蜜蜂，我们曾经在那里被蜇过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Summers at Bordeau, rowing the bateau, where the willow hung, just a dream ago, when the world was young.
ESP.TRADUIT: 夏日时光在波尔多度过，在游艇上划船，垂柳垂挂的地方，只是一场梦，这世界还很年轻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: For my love sickness, there's no physician, what could he tell me to use?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得了相思病，无医可治，无药可医。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No liquid or pill, I'm sure, ever did or will cure, a woman alone with the blues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有任何药，能够治好，一个独自忧郁的女人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Burning memories of, the man that I love, crowd all my mental revues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 燃烧的回忆，心爱的男人，充满了我的心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: For all of the pain I feel, his two loving arms could heal, a woman alone with the blues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我感到的所有痛苦，只有他充满爱的双手能治愈，一个独自忧郁的女人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: To a blue melody, warm and human I could pour my soul out in song.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在蓝调旋律中，温暖又充满人性，我在歌中把灵魂倾诉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the words would be, about a good woman, who believed in her man, right or wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而歌词将是关于一个好女人，她信任她的男人，不论对错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He'll come back someday, begging forgiveness, blushing way down to his shoes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总会有一天他会回来，乞求宽恕，羞愧难当。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No man in this world can find, happiness or peace of mind, and break any heart he may choose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有人能找到，幸福或内心的平静，和他选择打破的心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And leave his woman alone with the blues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 留下他的女人独自忧郁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm feeling mighty lonesome, haven't slept a wink, I walk the floor and watch the door and in between I drink...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我感觉无比孤独，彻夜未眠，我一边走一边看着门，在中间喝了一杯...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Black coffee, love's a hand me down brew, I'll never know a Sunday in this weekday room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 黑咖啡，爱情是二手货，在这平日的房间里，我永远无法感受到星期天的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm talking to the shadows one o'clock to four, and Lord, how slow the moments go when all I do is pour...
ESP.TRADUIT: 从一点到四点，我与影子对话，天啊，当我在倒黑咖啡时，时间过得多么慢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Black coffee, since the blues caught my eye, I'm hanging out on Monday my Sunday dreams to dry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 黑咖啡，自从忧郁蒙蔽我的双眼，我整天泡在星期一里，晾晒我星期天的梦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now a man is born to go a lovin' a woman's born to weep and fret to stay at home and tend her oven...
ESP.TRADUIT: 男人天生为了爱情而生，女人天生为了哭泣和忧虑，留在家中照看炉火...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And drown her past regrets, in coffee and cigarettes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在咖啡和香烟中，淹没她过去的遗憾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm moody all the morning, mourning all the night, and in between it's nicotine, and not much heart to fight...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我整个早晨情绪低落，整个夜晚心情哀伤，中间靠尼古丁支撑，几乎没有力气去斗争...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Black coffee...feelin' low as the ground...It's driving me crazy just waiting for my baby to maybe come around...
ESP.TRADUIT: 黑咖啡...心情无比低落...等着我的爱人回来，这让我快要发疯...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, girl's gotta have her secrets. But I tell you what, you help me find it, and I'll spill it all. Beans, pork, you name it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，女孩子总得有自己的秘密。但我告诉你，你帮我找到它，我就把秘密都说出来。豆子、猪肉，都随你的便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Until then, let's just say it's worth your weight in caps to find it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那之前，我们就说它值得你尽力去找吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's so important about this plant?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个植物有什么重要的地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does it look like? I fix things that are broke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这像是干嘛的？我修理坏掉的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you repair my gear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能修理我的装备吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm off work. Come see me in the morning if you got things need fixing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我下班了。如果你有东西需要修理的话，明早来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, if you got the money. Doesn't have to be caps, but we ain't running a charity here, so it can't be nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，如果你有钱的话。不一定非要是瓶盖，但我们这里不是做慈善的，所以不能什么都不付。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, what needs fixing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，需要修理什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like something repaired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要修理一些东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you come to work here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么来到这里工作的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just followed the smell of tires and gasoline.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是跟着轮胎和汽油的味道走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eventually I come to this garage and find old man Johnson working on this here motorcycle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，我来到这个车库，发现老约翰逊在修这辆摩托车。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: He asked me if I could give him a hand. I told him "Shoot, I'll give you two."
ESP.TRADUIT: 他问我能不能帮一把手。我告诉他：“当然，我可以帮你两把手。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: That would be the old man I told you about. He runs the store on account of his elbows being all out of grease.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是我跟你提过的那个老人。他负责运营店铺，因为他的胳膊已经没力气了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's in charge of the station?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个站点是谁来负责的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Volt's an unusual name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伏特这个名字可不常见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's just a nickname. The boss said it was that or "wrench," so it shouldn't be much of a shock which one I chose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那只是个外号。老板说要么用这个，要么用“扳手”，所以我选了哪个你应该不会太惊讶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, but no thanks. I ain't one to get help from folks like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，但不用了。我不会从像你这样的人那里得到帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything I can do to help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么我能帮忙的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're a mechanic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你是个技工。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only when we got work. Most days, I'm just a girl with a wrench.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有在有工作的时候是。大多数日子，我只是个拿扳手的女孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Expertise varies. Not all repairmen can fix energy weapons and armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 术业有专攻。并不是所有的修理工都能修理能量武器和护甲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got it backwards, actually. High-end tech is easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，你搞错了。高端技术很简单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try fixing an Adams-Farwell with nothing but a socket wrench and a screwdriver. Now that's talent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试试只用一个套筒扳手和一把螺丝刀修理一台亚当斯-法威尔发动机。那才叫本事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: My mind is broken. Can you fix that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的心碎了。你能修复吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, did the doc say you got a screw loose?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么，医生说你螺丝松了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I hate to break it to you, but a screwdriver ain't gonna fix it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我不想告诉你，但是螺丝刀修不好它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh good, I need help fixing my marriage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，太好了，我需要帮助来修复我的婚姻。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry hon, sounds to me like you ain't got the tools.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，亲爱的，听起来你没有解决问题的工具。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the way you carry yourself. You wander around this wasteland like you were made for this world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为你表现出来的样子。你在这片废土上游荡，就好像你天生就属于这个世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmph, but what does that say about you? I ain't about to ask the devil for no favors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼，但这说明了什么？我可不会向恶魔求助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Volt [11003A38] (mod) Quest : ([11003AA1]x3DNPCVoltDialogue) Volt EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you have for sale?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么东西卖？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have anything for sale?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么要卖的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Already? If I done messed up somehow, you'd tell me right? Well, I guess I better get going then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已经到这种地步了？如果我哪里搞砸了，你会告诉我的，对吧？好吧，我想我最好赶紧走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it's time we part ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们是时候分道扬镳了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right then. You need me again, you know where to find me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。如果你又需要我了，你知道可以哪里找到我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it's time we part ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们是时候分道扬镳了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like they say, "Mi Casa Su Casa." You know who says it? Mexicans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像他们说的：“我家就是你家（西班牙语）。”你知道是谁说的吗？墨西哥人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Consider this your new home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把这里当作你的新家。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll have a martini with an olive kilt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要一杯带橄榄裙子的马提尼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Carmen sent you didn't she. All right, but tell her to go easy on the stuff, she's gotta another set coming up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡门派你来的，对吧？好吧，不过告诉她别太着急，她还有一轮要上呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: And she if loses her pipes, then I'm out of work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果她把她喉咙弄没了，那我就失业了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that what those stains on the floor are? Class?
ESP.TRADUIT: 地板上的那些污渍是什么？人呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: He had the caps to spruce up the joint. Not to keep it clean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有瓶盖把这个地方好好打扮一番，而不只是保持干净。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, I never pegged you as the gossiping type, hon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈，我从没把你当成过爱八卦的人，亲爱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I didn't mean anything by it. It's just that there's a lot of rumors going around, and I want to get it straight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我没有恶意。只是有很多谣言在传，我想把它弄清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't surprise me. It's an old story. People have been telling it since Adam and Eve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不奇怪，这个是个老故事了。自从亚当和夏娃以来，人们就一直在讲了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you want to get it straight sugar, then you shouldn't ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你想弄清楚，甜心，那你不该问我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right. A regular beauty and the beast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，一个标准的美女与野兽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, I do admit sugar, I fit the part. But you're going to have to get a touch more feminine before we can call you a beauty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈，我承认，甜心，我很适合这个角色。但你得再多点女性气质，我们才能称你为美女。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like something to drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要喝点东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, just what you see here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，就这些，随便挑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Coming right up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马上就来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope you're thirsty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你渴了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looking to drown your sorrows, huh? I hear ya.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想借酒浇愁吗，嗯？我懂你意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk about Carmen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈卡门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That bird can sing, can't she? Makes doing the job easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那只鸟儿唱得真好，不是吗？让干活变轻松了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you get this job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么得到这份工作的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was favor for the owner. I got a club foot you see, and he said he wanted someone with a handicap. I said he was loony.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是老板帮的忙。你看，我有一只脚是跛的，而他说他想要个残疾人。我说他疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I said you want to draw these cats in, not scare them away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说你是想吸引这些人进来，而不是把他们吓跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, his thinking was, the people who come to this club have it rough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，他的想法是，来这个俱乐部的人过得很艰难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're sad, lonely, and feeling bad about life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们悲伤、孤独，对生活感到失望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I ask him, what's that got to do with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我问他，这跟我有什么关系？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: And he says, "Seeing me hobble around bar makes them feel better about themselves!" Ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后他说，“看到我一瘸一拐地在酒吧里走动，让他们觉得自己好受些！”哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did your boss want to hire a handipcapped person?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你的老板想雇一个残疾人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's right. The more I look at you, the better I feel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说得对。我看着你越久，我就感觉越好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, then stick around and have a drink. By morning, you'll be feeling like a person again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，那就留下来喝一杯吧。到早上，你会觉得自己又像个人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's fucked up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那可太乱搞了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, we're still in business, so I can't say he's wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我们还在营业，所以我不能说他错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that why most of the chairs are pointed at the stage?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是不是因为大多数椅子都对着舞台？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might be on to something. But I think that's less about me and more about her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能说对了点。但我觉得那跟我关系不大，跟她关系更大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you're rather handsome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你挺帅的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, you've got a lot of class. my friend, or a little too much to drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，你真有品位，我的朋友，或者只是有点喝多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, in that case, have another one on the house. Maybe by morning we'll have my face on a pin-up, hahaha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，既然这样，那再来一杯，这杯算我的。也许到早上，我们会把我的脸贴在墙上，哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I reckon I haven't. Like Ma, I mostly use a shotgun. Got bad eyes, so the spray helps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我没有。像妈妈一样，我主要用霰弹枪。我视力不好，所以用这种喷射武器很有帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pa used to say the blurry vision's a blessing. Some days I can't tell a ghoul from a gecko, and that's why I treat everyone the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爸爸曾经说过，视力模糊是一种祝福。有些日子，我分不清尸鬼和蜥蜴，这就是为什么我对待每个人都一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You still haven't told me what you can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还没有告诉我你能做什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything you won't do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么你不会做的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you got to promise not to laugh but....I'd rather not get in a tussle with one of them tin men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你得保证不笑...但我真不想跟那些铁皮人起争执。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill Switch
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀戮时刻
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : 3dnpc Radio [1100159B] (mod) Quest : ([1100159D]x3DNPCPerformances) Blue Note Performances EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever thought of performing on the strip?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有想过在长街表演？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not for a second, honey. Those aren't my people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 绝对不行，亲爱的。他们不是我的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you're feeling good, you want the bright lights to shine on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你感觉良好的时候，你想要明亮的灯光照耀着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got a drink in your hand and girl in your arm, and you want everyone to know you're the pick of the litter, a real high roller.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你手里有酒，怀里搂着姑娘，你想让所有人都知道你是人群中的佼佼者，真正的风云人物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But when you've lost it all and don't have a cap to your name, then you come here. You come to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但当你失去了一切，身无分文时，你就会来这里。来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean by that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你那是什??么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I try to familiarize myself with all weapons. Out here, you need to be good at everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尽量让自己熟悉所有武器。在这里，你需要精通一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most times, the only weapon you got is the one the dead guys drop.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数时候，你唯一的武器就是那些死人掉下的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about you? How do you kill folks? Blade, bomb, or bullet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你呢？你怎么杀人？刀、炸弹还是子弹？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What sort of skills do you have?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么技能？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good choice. Always fun to dial up that long-distance death call.
ESP.TRADUIT: 选得好。拨打长途死亡电话总是很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Hello operator? Yes I'd like you to place a bullet in my friend over there. Tell him the reaper's calling collect."
ESP.TRADUIT: “你好，接线员？是的，我想请你把一颗子弹送到我那边的朋友身上。告诉他死神在收费呼叫。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I prefer precise, long range weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我偏好精准的远程武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you like getting your hands dirty. The only question is, are you a surgeon, or a butcher?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你喜欢把手弄脏。唯一的问题是，你是外科医生还是屠夫？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I guess it doesn't matter. Both know how to spill the blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我猜这不重要。这两者都知道怎么见血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: Melee, whenever I get the chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 近战，只要有机会我就上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: True enough. Just shoot everything that moves and let karma sort out the rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实如此。只管射击所有移动的东西，让因果报应去决定剩下的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes I trust karma more than I trust myself. My foot can attest to that. I've shot it more times than I care to count.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候我更相信因果报应而不是我自己。我的脚可以证明这一点。我不止一次把子弹射到自己脚上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Automatic rifles. In battle, you don't get time to aim.
ESP.TRADUIT: 自动步枪。在战斗中，你没有时间瞄准。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a cowboy then. Big iron on your hip. I can respect that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你是个牛仔啊。臀部上挂着大手枪。我尊重这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pistols can pretty much do it all. They're light, got range, and they're easy to smuggle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 手枪几乎能应付一切。它们轻便，有射程，而且容易藏匿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And when you'e out of bullets, they make for excellent boomerangs. At least, in theory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你打完子弹时，它们也可以当作很好的飞镖。至少理论上是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mostly pistols and stuff like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主要是手枪之类的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a cowgirl then. Big iron on your hip. I can respect that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你是个女牛仔啊。臀部上挂着大手枪。我尊重这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pistols can pretty much do it all. They're light, got range, and they're easy to smuggle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 手枪几乎能应付一切。它们轻便，有射程，而且容易藏匿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And when you're out of bullets, they make for excellent boomerangs. At least, in theory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你打完子弹时，它们也可以当作很好的飞镖。至少理论上是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mostly pistols and stuff like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主要是手枪之类的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, blowing shit up is always fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，炸毁东西总是很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You toss a grenade here, launch a rocket there, and all of the sudden you got dirt and flesh coming down like confetti.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这里扔个手榴弹，那里射个火箭弹，然后突然之间，尘土和血肉就像五彩纸屑一样洒落下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: With you, every day's a parade. I'm just along for the ride.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和你在一起，每天都是游行庆祝。我只是来搭个顺风车。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Explosives. I like to blow shit up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爆炸物。我喜欢炸毁东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right. You're a Swiss Army Knife. You'll kill a man with a fork if you have to. I like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错。你是个瑞士军刀。必要时你会用叉子杀人。我喜欢这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like the idea that whatever you got in your hand can be a weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢任何手里的东西都能成为武器的想法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Out here, you gotta be ready to fling your goddamn cum in someone's eye and blind them if need be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里，你必须准备好把你的精液甩进某人的眼睛让他们失明，如果需要的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So next time you see me tossing around something sticky, that's why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以下次你看到我扔一些粘乎乎的东西，那就是原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm like you. Whatever works.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和你一样，什么都行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I've lost someone. Someone very close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我失去了某个人。一个非常亲近的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then we share something. I find that helps sometimes. Just talking, and sharing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们分享些东西。我发现有时仅仅是交谈和分享就很有帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: A man in a checkered suit, but I'll find him soon enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个穿着格子西装的男人，但我很快就会找到他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't mean it that way, but I wish you luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是那个意思，但我祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm sorry, I don't know what you mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，抱歉，我不懂你在说什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, my mistake then. Sometimes you feel so lonely, you start clinging to the strangest hopes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，那就是我错了。有时你会感到非常孤独，以至于开始抱有最奇怪的希望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the matter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: See that grave over yonder? That's where I buried my son.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看见那边的坟墓了吗？那就是我埋葬我儿子的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't call it pain. It's more like...emptiness. Like a piece of you is missing. Like you ain't whole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会称之为痛苦。更像是...空虚。就像是你身上有一部分消失了。就像是你不完整了一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: And yet here I am, a whole person, talking to another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而我就在这里，一个完整的人，与另一个人交谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does the pain ever go away?
ESP.TRADUIT: 痛苦会消失吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A stroke. Died right in his chair. We just finished burying him next to his son. It's what he would've wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 中风。就在他的椅子上去世了。我们就把他埋在了他儿子旁边。那会是他想要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Goodsprings Settler [1100494F] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: We still haven't carved his name into the cross though. Not sure if we should go with Art, or Arthur Seager.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还没在十字架上刻他的名字呢。不确定我们应该用亚瑟还是亚瑟·西格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Goodsprings Settler [1100494F] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry for your loss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 节哀顺变。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No need to apologize. But I thank you for the kind words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不需要道歉。但我感谢你的善意话语。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right, he did say that. So "The Father of Alban Seager." Thanks, that's what I'll do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对，他确实说过那话。"奥尔本·西格之父"。谢了，那就是我会做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Goodsprings Settler [1100494F] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Neither. He wanted to be known as Alban's father.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都不是。他想要被称为奥尔本的父亲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did he die?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是怎么死的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We thought it was shingles. But the Doc said it was cancer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们以为是带状疱疹。但医生说是癌症。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's funny. I spent my life training him to kill everything from roaches to radscorpions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很有趣。我花了一辈子的时间训练他，从蟑螂到辐射蝎，什么都杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought I was teaching him to be a man, preparing him for this world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为我在教他做一个男人，为这个世界做准备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: But all the guns and muscle in the wastes didn't stop the Lord from calling him home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但废土里的所有枪支和肌肉都没有阻止上帝把他召唤回家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we better go with Arthur then, just to be safe. I'm assuming that's the name god gave him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们最好还是用亚瑟，为了安全起见。我认为那是上帝给他的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Goodsprings Settler [1100494F] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't matter to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我来说无所谓。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about your son.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我关于你儿子的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He had the brightest smile, and the funniest walk. He always knew how to break the tension, and keep a promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有着最灿烂的笑容和最有趣的步态。他总是知道如何消除紧张的氛围，还有信守承诺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: He wasn't his father, and he wasn't his mother. He was the best of both of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不全像他父亲，也不全像他母亲。他是我们俩的精华。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that why you don't go by your first name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么你不用自己的姓氏吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right. People ask me all the time, why don't you go by Art?
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错。人们总是问我，为什么不用亚瑟呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I tell them, there's only one thing I want to be known for. Being Alban's father.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉他们，只有一件事我想要被人知道。就是作为奥尔本的父亲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not my name, not any of the deeds I've done, but just that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是我的名字，也不是我所做的任何事情，而只是那个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because being his pa was the single proudest moment of my entire life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为做他的爸爸是我一生中最骄傲的时刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alban's Father [11004934] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say I have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, first you'll need to put the caps in my pocket baby. But I suggest you hurry. This pony is ready to giddy-up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，首先你得把瓶盖放进我的口袋里，宝贝。不过我建议你赶紧点。这匹小马已经准备好要出发了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's ride.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们出发吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. Strange isn't it? I didn't expect this whole thing to be so troublesome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。很奇怪是吧？我没料到这整个事情会这么麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, he's over there somewhere. Beat it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他就在那边某处。马上走开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only thing you'll be catching is a fever for more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你唯一能染上的东西就是更多的热情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me a moment to find a radiation suit. Don't want to catch something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我一点时间找个防辐射服。我可不想染上什么东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Over...where? If you could just point me in his direction I-
ESP.TRADUIT: 在...哪儿？如果你能告诉我他在哪个方向那我...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you're being facetious. Ahem. Well then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你是在开玩笑。呃哼。那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a mystery to everyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这对每个人来说都是个谜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can be whatever you want me to be. Maybe you prefer I ride you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想让我做什么都行。也许你更喜欢我骑在你身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure what you're implying. Are you a horse?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定你在暗示什么。你是马吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me most of all. I've been at this for nearly a week, mind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尤其是我。你要知道，我已经这样做了将近一个星期了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're looking at him. In case you haven't heard, I pretty much own all of Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你正在看着他。以防你还没有听说，我基本上拥有整个维加斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: In that case, you're just the person I...oh, wait...you're talking about muscle, aren't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然如此，你就是那个我...哦，等等...你在说武力，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahem...well...while I appreciate your skillset, I'm looking for the person with the deed, and not the gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼...好吧...虽然我欣赏你的技能，但我要找的是有产权的人，而不是有枪的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're looking at her. In case you haven't heard, I pretty much own all of Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你正在看着她。以防你还没有听说，我基本上拥有整个维加斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: In that case, you're just the person I...oh, wait...you're talking about muscle, aren't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然如此，你就是那个我...哦，等等...你在说武力，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahem...well...while I appreciate your skillset, I'm looking for the person with the deed, and not the gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼...好吧...虽然我欣赏你的技能，但我要找的是有产权的人，而不是有枪的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what are you here for cutie? Believe me when I say I can do just about anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你来这里是为了什么，小可爱？相信我，我几乎可以做任何事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not here for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是为了那个来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you looking for the owner?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么在找这个夜总会的老板？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm interested in buying this nightclub.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对买下这家夜总会很感兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been meaning to make the owner an offer for some time, but every time I ask about his whereabouts I get rebuffed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直打算向业主提出报价，但每次询问他的行踪都被拒绝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: At first I thought it was the staff playing coy, but I now I wonder if they really are in the dark.
ESP.TRADUIT: 起初我以为是员工在玩弄我，但现在我开始怀疑他们是不是真的一无所知。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: How long have you been waiting here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里等了多久了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nearly an entire week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将近整整一周。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: In that time, I've seen patrons and workers alike shuffle in and out of this establishment and not one of them seems to pay each other any mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这段时间里，我见到过顾客和工作人员进进出出这家场所，但他们似乎都不太关心彼此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: So either this man is a fantastically good sneak, or he's gone altogether.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要么这个人很能藏，要么他已经彻底消失了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: True, but I never pass up a bargain, and outside of the location, this place is incredibly undervalued.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，但我从不放弃便宜货，而且除了地理位置外，这个地方的价值被严重低估了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it has to do with the atmosphere. It's incredibly depressing. No wonder it has trouble attracting customers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得这跟氛围有关。这里的气氛非常令人沮丧。难怪吸引不了顾客。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But it's nothing I can't overcome with a little bit of patience. And if I get tired of waiting, I'll just drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但只要我有点耐心，这些都不是我无法克服的。如果我等得不耐烦了，我就喝酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you stay here that long? Do you have other business to attend to?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能在这里等那么久吗？你还有其他事情要处理吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I can help you find him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我可以帮你找到他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hm...It would help to have a second set of eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...有第二双眼睛会有帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I wait for him here and...ahem...turn on a few lights...what if you were to contact one of his associates?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我在这里等他的同时，嗯哼...打开几盏灯...如果你能联系到他的一个同伴怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not people who work with him, but actual friends and family. Or even better yet, a lover.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是和他一起工作的人，而是真正的朋友和家人。或者更好的是，一个情人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's in it for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我有什么好处？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A finder's fee is fairly standard, I think, although the percentage will depend on how well you do, and how much I've had to drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得支付中介费是相当正常的，但支付比例取决于你的表现以及我喝了多少酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: But don't worry, if its caps you're after, you'll be well compensated for your efforts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但不用担心，如果你追求的是瓶盖，你会为你的努力得到丰厚的回报。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any word on my request?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的请求有消息了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry sir, but he's a private man, and the truth is, I haven't seen him in weeks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉先生，但他是一个注重隐私的人，而且事实上，我已经好几个星期没见过他了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't you the least bit worried? What if something happened to him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一点都不担心吗？如果他出了什么事怎么办？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the owner of this nightclub?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于这家夜总会老板的情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much. He wasn't one talk, honey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么可说的。他不爱说话，亲爱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not even Alice knew him all that well, even if she could tell you where the moles were on his back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就连爱丽丝也不是很了解他，尽管她能告诉你他背上的痣在哪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd introduce you, but he hasn't been around lately. But Jack's doing a good job running the place in his stead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想介绍你认识他，但他最近不在。不过杰克在他不在的时候把这个地方运营得很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure sugar, but I don't think you're her type. She likes them small, dark and brooding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然亲爱的，但我觉得你不是她喜欢的类型。她喜欢那种小巧、黑暗和忧郁的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me where to find Alice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我去哪找爱丽丝吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure sugar, but I don't think you're her type. She likes them small, dark and brooding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然亲爱的，但我觉得你不是她喜欢的类型。她喜欢那种小巧、黑暗和忧郁的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mentioned your cousin was with some high roller. Can you tell me where to find her?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你提到你表亲和某位大人物在一起。你能告诉我去哪找她吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last I heard sugar, Alice moved up in the world. Shacked up with some old gambler on the west end of the Strip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据我上次听说，亲爱的，爱丽丝身份地位提升了。她和长街西边的一位老赌徒同居了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen to me talk. Show me a mirror hon and I'd probably look four shades of green.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听我说话。给我一面镜子，亲爱的，我的脸可能看上去会绿上四个度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: But envy be damned, this is my home. I can't see myself as anything but blue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但让嫉妒见鬼去吧，这是我的家。我不会把自己看成除了蓝色外的别的颜色。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where can I find your cousin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哪里可以找到你的表亲？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, not you too. I've already got Mister Grant on my case, and half the guards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你也来了。我已经被格兰特先生和一半的警卫盯上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's not here. And if I knew where, I'd drag him back here myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不在这里。如果我知道他在哪，我会亲自把他拖回来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Buddy, I'm terrified. With him gone, I'm in charge. I give us another month before the entire place collapses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，我害怕了。他走了，我就接管了。我估计我们再坚持一个月，这整个地方就会崩溃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if he does show up, let him know I'm here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果他真的出现了，告诉他我在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be sure to pass it along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会确保传达的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anyone like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认识像那样的人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose I don't. But I'm sure someone as affable as yourself will figure it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我不知道。但我相信像你这样随和的人会找到办法的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if he has no loved ones?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他没有情人呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everyone has loved ones, don't they? Even raiders need someone to confide in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每个人都有情人，不是吗？就连掠夺者也需要有人可以倾诉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I refuse to believe the world has gone that far down the gutter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不相信世界已经沦落到那个地步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I know just the person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我知道该找哪个人了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? But you just got here! Hm, maybe you are the right person for the job. Well then, don't let me stand in your way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？但你才刚来啊！嗯，也许你就是这项工作合适的人选。那好吧，不要让我挡着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're just going to sit here and drink while I do all the work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你就只坐在这里喝酒，等我去做所有的工作吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we're both better suited to the tasks we have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我们都更适合各自的任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am all of those things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有的全是这些了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I guess I was mistaken hon. Besides, none of it matters if you've got the caps to fill the blanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我猜是我搞错了，亲爱的。此外，如果你有足够的瓶盖填满空白，那一切都无所谓了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Two out of three ain't bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 三个里有两个也不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No it isn't. And besides if you've got caps sugar, it's more than enough to fill the leftovers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并不是这样。而且此外如果你有瓶盖，亲爱的，那就足够填满剩余的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outlandish. I am everyone's type and you know it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 异想天开。我是每个人喜欢的类型，你知道的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I stand corrected. But then again hon, maybe she isn't yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我承认错误。但话说回来，亲爱的，也许她并不属于你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, can't win them all, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，我猜我们赢不了他们所有人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess not hon. But she's been known to make exceptions, depending on your bankroll.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜不是，亲爱的。但据说她会根据你的存款情况作出例外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever do that thing where you're like, replaying past events in your head? And you're like "Fuck! Fuck! Why did I say that!?!?!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有那种时候，会在脑海中重播过去的事？然后你会想，“操！操！我为什么要说那个！？！？！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I think I'm having one of those moments.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我觉得我正在经历这样的时刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got this odd-shaped mole on my arm. My guess is, it's probably nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我手臂上有个奇怪形状的痣。我猜，应该没什么大不了的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if it is something, let the record show that I'm a terrible fucking doctor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果有什么问题，让记录表明我他妈的是个烂到爆的医生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood of Steel. I heard about these guys. They got a real hard-on for hi-tech shit. Lasers, implants, the works.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钢铁兄弟会。我听说过这些家伙。他们对高科技真是痴迷到勃起。激光，植入物，样样都有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't see the point. Bullets do the job for a fraction of the cost. But again, a hard-on's a hard-on. No stopping the dick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看不出有什么意义。子弹只要花费一小部分成本就能完成任务。但再说一遍，勃起就是勃起。不要阻止老二。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can always tell which bars are respectable by the number of bullet holes in the wall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你总是能通过墙上的子弹洞数来判断哪些酒吧比较体面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, this place is scary. I think my balls just went on strike.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，这地方真吓人。我觉得我的蛋蛋刚刚罢工了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can see the future, my friend, and I'm telling you, it's somewhere in this building.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能看见未来，我的朋友，我告诉你，它就在这栋楼里的某处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Holy fucking shit. This is what they call a "white knuckle" moment. Well, I don't know if my knuckles are white but I know my undies ain't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你妈逼的。这就是他们所谓的“惊心动魄（white knuckle）”时刻。好吧，我不知道我的指关节是不是白的，但我知道我的内裤肯定不是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some fat people, when they run, it looks like there's an invisible refrigerator strapped to their back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些胖子跑步时，看起来就像背上绑了个隐形冰箱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like, I see them running as hard as they can but they ain't going nowhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看见他们尽力奔跑，但却一点都没动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you know there was this chick who played baseball and she was really fucking good at it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道有个小妞打棒球，而且她打得真他妈的好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, they called her "The Babe."
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，他们叫她“全垒打王”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Another thing we don't see enough of in the post-war apocalypse is carnival people. You know, bearded ladies, albinos, midgets!
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一件在战后末世，我们看得太少的东西，就是嘉年华的人。你懂的，有胡须的女人，白化病患者，侏儒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feel like the future that was promised to us never happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得承诺给我们的未来从来没有实现过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I made a record once. Put it on holodisk. Sold copies out of the trunk of some car. Wish I could remember where that was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经录过一张唱片。把它放在全息盘上。从某辆车的车尾箱里卖了点副本。但愿我还能记得那是在哪儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: With sentry bots, my strategy is to shoot their wheels before running like hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于铁卫兵，我的策略是先打它们的轮子，然后拼命跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the old world, I bet these "Mister Handys" were marketed to housewives to, you know, help around the house. Mostly the bedroom I take it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在旧世界里，我敢打赌这些“巧手先生”被市场宣传给家庭主妇，你懂的，帮忙做家务。我想到的大部分是卧室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn. Look at that shit. Science is one hell of a chem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死。看看那玩意儿。科学真是个奇妙的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, I see. Well, he was never really the formal type, so it's best to go with plain old Art.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，我懂了。好吧，他从来都不是那种正式的人，所以最好还是简单地用老亚瑟来称呼他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Goodsprings Settler [1100494F] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I don't wouldn't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我不知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Well that isn't very neighborly. Still, far be it for me to deny a dying man's last wish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？那可不太友善。但是，我也不忍心拒绝一个垂死之人的最后愿望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Goodsprings Settler [1100494F] (mod) Quest : ([11004937]x3DNPCArtSeagerQuest) Alban's Father EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe he wanted something along the lines of "Fuck Goodsprings."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得他想要的是“去他妈的清泉镇”之类的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are the show hours?
ESP.TRADUIT: 演出时间是几点？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Show kicks off around 5pm, and goes on until morning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 表演大约在下午5点开始，一直持续到早晨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You come back any other time, Carmen will be parked right on that stool over there, usually getting busy with a bottle of scotch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你再来的话，卡门通常会坐在那边的凳子上，通常会忙着喝苏格兰威士忌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd better get out of here if you know what's good for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好滚蛋，别惹麻烦！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Omerta Thug [11004CFB] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm telling you, I didn't touch the bitch! She's lying damnit! She's a lying, no good whore!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉你，我没碰那个婊子！她在撒谎！她是个骗子，恶毒的贱人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angry Patron [11004CFD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep moving!
ESP.TRADUIT: 走开！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Omerta Thug [11004CFB] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine! I'll take my business to Freeside then! Fucking Omerta assholes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧！那我去自由城！操你妈的黑手党混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Angry Patron [11004CFD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: How much for your services?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的服务要多少钱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just a hundred caps sexy. A small price to pay for seeing the top of the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要一百瓶盖，宝贝。为了看到世界之巅，这点小钱不算什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then let's find a bed baby. Oh, and you won't be needing any spurs. I say when we heel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，让我们找个床吧，宝贝。哦，而且你不需要穿马刺。我是说在我们用脚后跟的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last time was fun. But I've got some new ideas, and all night to show you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上次很有趣。但是我有一些新点子，可以展示给你一整晚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your loss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的损失。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not pay the debtors out of your own pocket? From what I hear you have the caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不自掏腰包还债呢？据我所知，你是有瓶盖的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you...urgh...look, maybe I have the caps. But loaning them to Charlie is like throwing them in the ocean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么...呃...你看，也许我有瓶盖。但把它们借给查理就像把它们扔进海里一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not gonna do it, even if it means losing the club.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会这么做，即使这意味着失去俱乐部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: How much for your services?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的服务要多少钱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? You still want to do it? Shit, maybe I don't need that whole bullshit act.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？你还想做这事？该死，也许我不需要演那套假把戏了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. A hundred caps ought to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。一百瓶盖就够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. A hundred caps and we fuck. No kissing or falling in love.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。一百瓶盖，我们来干吧。不许接吻，也别动真感情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks. This way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢了。这边走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks. This way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢了。这边走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: No thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. It'd be weird now anyway. Feel like it was us fucking and not "Alice," you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。现在反正也怪了。感觉像是我们在干，而不是“爱丽丝”，你懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you related to the singer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和歌手有关系吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, Carmen sent you? Fuck. Does she know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，卡门派你来的？操。她知道了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I mean...well...I don't know. It's not like she'd abandon me or shit like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我的意思是...我也不清楚。她不会抛弃我之类的破事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the girl's got enough on her ass already without my problems strapped to her back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算不加上我的问题，那个女孩已经有的受了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would Carmen have a problem with what you're doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡门会对你正在做的事情有意见吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing hon. What is it you want to talk about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，亲爱的。你想谈什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk about your cousin Alice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈你的表亲爱丽丝。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You knew her too? The poor thing. Her and Charlie both. The two of them always chasing a dream with eyes closed shut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也认识她？那可怜的人。她和查理都是。这两个人总是闭着眼睛追逐梦想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk about your cousin Alice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈你的表亲爱丽丝。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say the Mejia brothers walked into Gomorrah and...I don't want to get into it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人说梅希亚兄弟走进了蛾摩拉，然后...我不想谈这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Point is, she got mixed up in something bad. I just know there isn't enough scotch in this bottle to make it all go away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关键是，她陷入了一些麻烦事。我只知道这瓶苏格兰威士忌不够让我忘掉这件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Knew her? What happened to Alice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 认识她？爱丽丝怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then maybe this world has some justice in it after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那也许这个世界还是有些正义的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Truth is, Alice had a lot of people in her life, but none that she could ever count on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实是，爱丽丝生命中有很多人，但没有一个是她可以依靠的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad that toward the end, she finally got to meet one. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴在最后，她终于遇到了一个可以依靠的人。谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Mejia Brothers are dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 梅希亚兄弟死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not go back to Freeside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不回到自由城呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you. No seriously. Fuck. You.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你妈。我认真的。操，你妈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told Carmen you were a prostitute.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉了卡门你是个妓女。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's that easy for you, huh? Just walk in and out of the Strip like it's nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对你来说很简单吧，嗯？就这么进出长街，像什么都没发生一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it ain't like that for the rest of us. I leave Vegas now and I'll never get back in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，对我们其他人来说可不是这样。我现在就离开维加斯，再也不回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: The last asshole?
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后的混蛋？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Two of them actually, although you know how it is with assholes. They're all covered in shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实有两个，虽然你知道那些混蛋是怎么样的。他们都浑身是屎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is Charlie the name of the club owner outside the North Gate?
ESP.TRADUIT: 查理是北门外的俱乐部老板吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's him. I left that limp dick capless fuck and came here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是他。我离开了那个没用的废物混蛋，来到了这里。
