ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to Charlie?
ESP.TRADUIT: 查理怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the story is Charlie spent all his caps on that fucking piece of shit nightclub.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，故事是查理把所有的瓶盖都花在那个他妈的破夜总会上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that ain't it. I mean, that's the story, but it ain't the whole story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但事情不止是这样。我的意思，那只是故事的一部分，而不是全部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Charlie didn't have the scratch to build that place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查理没钱来建那个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He had to borrow a lot of dirty money from some real shady motherfuckers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不得不从些真正阴险的王八蛋那里借很多黑钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the whole story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 整件事是什么样的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a lot of dirt and shade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那可有不少丑闻和阴暗面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, you're telling me. Charlie was like a greased up pig rolling around in their shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，你告诉我。查理就像一头满身是油的猪，在他们的烂泥里打滚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now to get his ass clean, he's off looking for some Pre-War gold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在为了让自己清白，他正出去寻找一些战前的黄金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you can't hop in a tub and hope to wash off this stink. That shit is balls deep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你不能指望洗个澡就能冲掉这种臭味。那玩意已经深入骨髓了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is he making any attempt to pay the collectors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有尝试还钱吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does a raider pierce his dick? Shit, Charlie was always trying to walk before he could crawl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 掠夺者会把自己老二刺穿吗？该死，查理总是试图走路，但却连爬都不会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: He bought the club when he was piss broke, so he's trying to pay it back the same way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他在身无分文的时候买了那家俱乐部，所以他也想用同样的方式把钱还上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last I heard he was going treasure hunting or some other crazy shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最后听说他去寻宝了，或者去干其他疯狂的破事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like the guy ran and hid away somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来那家伙跑了，躲到了某个地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, that'd be the smart thing. But that ain't Charlie's style.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，那是聪明的做法。但不是查理的风格。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: That dumb piece of shit always thought too big for his britches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个蠢货总是自以为是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last I heard he ran off to the desert, chasing some treasure that's probably cunt deep in deathclaws to pay it back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最后听说他跑到沙漠里，追寻可能藏在死亡爪群里的宝藏来还钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you know he's out searching for treasure?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么知道他在外面寻宝？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because he told me. Said that's what was going to win me back. Fuck if I didn't already move on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为他告诉我的。他说这就是要把我赢回来的方法。操，我早就已经放下了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now he's gone and got himself stuck in some hole, trying to save a club that's done the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在他跑去让自己陷入困境，试图挽救一个同样情况的俱乐部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's a hundred caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一百瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal. He went to some place called the Prospector Saloon. Stupid fuck thinks the name is proof that there's a cache of gold nearby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 成交。他去了一个叫淘金客沙龙的地方。这个蠢货以为名字就能证明附近有一堆黄金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you see him, take my advice and don't let him talk. Just kill the son of a bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见到他的时候，听我的建议，别让他说话。直接干掉那个狗娘养的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or I could tell Carmen what you're doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者我可以告诉卡门你在做什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a surprise, another asshole. It's like there's a sign outside telling people this is a toilet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是意外，又一个混蛋。就好像门外有个标志告诉人们这里是厕所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. We got a deal. My cousin doesn't need to know about any of this shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们成交。我表亲不需要知道这些破事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: He went to some place called the Prospector Saloon. Stupid fuck thinks the name is proof that there's a cache of gold nearby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他去了一个叫探矿者沙龙的地方。这个蠢货以为名字就能证明附近有一堆黄金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you see him, take my advice and don't let him talk. Just kill the son of a bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见到他的时候，听我的建议，别让他说话。直接干掉那个狗娘养的。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会回来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry then. My memory tends to get real spotty the longer I wait.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就快点。我等得越久，记忆越模糊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: She knows enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她知道的已经够多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what the fuck is that supposed to mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那他妈的是什么意思？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry. I just don't want her thinking I need help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起。我只是不想让她以为我需要帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a shame sugar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真遗憾，甜心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because knowing her, I bet she didn't want you to tell me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为了解她，我确信她不想让你告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's become a prostitute in Gomorrah. I thought you should know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她在蛾摩拉成了妓女。我觉得你应该知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Two gunslinging vaqueros from down south, right out of a western.
ESP.TRADUIT: 两个从南方来的牛仔，就像西部片里的那种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Word around town is they did Charlie in Goodsprings. Why they had to take Alice too, I don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 城里的传闻是他们在清泉镇干掉了查理。为什么还要连爱丽丝也杀了，我就不知道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Mejia brothers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 梅希亚兄弟？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think so. She said you were shacked up with a high roller.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不这么认为。她说你和一个大人物住在一起。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's all she knows. Truth is he dumped me for some blonde bitch and left me to fend for myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，那就是她所知道的全部。事实是，他为了某个金发贱人把我甩了，让我自己照顾自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Happy to hear it hon. Just hope she doesn't forget the little people on her way to the top.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听到这消息我很高兴，亲爱的。只希望她在成功之路上不会忘记那些无名小卒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's doing well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她过得很好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somebody did mention they were living in one of those old houses near the clinic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人提到他们住在诊所附近的一座老房子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's up to you hon. I won't lose any sleep over their deaths. But it's not them I'm worried about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这取决于你了，亲爱的。我不会因为他们的死而失眠。但我担心的不是他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could track them down for you if you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想的话，我可以找到他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: She'll know when I tell her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉她时她就会知道了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, you can't! Not for me, who gives a fuck about that. It'll break her heart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你不能！不是为了我，谁在乎那些。这会伤透她的心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not what I meant hon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是那个意思，亲爱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've heard about the men she's ran with. That girl doesn't have a soul in this world she can trust. I thought maybe you'd be different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过她交往的那些男人。那个女孩在这个世界上找不到一个可以信任的灵魂。我本以为你会不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, it's a shame what's happened to her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，她遭遇的事情真是遗憾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know that honey. We can't drink away the blues, but it won't stop me from trying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，亲爱的。我们不能用酒来摆脱悲伤，但这不会阻止我尝试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, but there's nothing that can be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉，但没有什么可以做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: She said to come back and buy her a drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她说让你回来请她喝一杯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What that girl needs is people she can trust. I broke that once, and now so have you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个女孩需要的是可以信任的人。我曾经破坏过一次，现在你也是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: And after what she's been through, she's not the kind who can afford to give second chances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 经历了那些事之后，她不是那种能够给第二次机会的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I thought maybe you could help her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我还以为也许你可以帮帮她。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, so she really thinks I made it, huh? She wouldn't be asking that shit if she knew whose dick I had to suck to buy it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，所以她真的以为我成功了，是吗？如果她知道我为了买它得舔谁的老二，她就不会问这个问题了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, I've got an idea I'd like to run by you. Now, I know what you're gonna say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我有个想法想跟你商量一下。我知道你要说什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110051B7]vvVincentFGCazadors) FG Cazadors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're thinking, "Vincent, you're crazy smart and a snappy dresser, I already agree with whatever you want to say."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能会想，“文森特，你聪明绝顶又时髦到爆，我已经同意你要说的话了。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110051B7]vvVincentFGCazadors) FG Cazadors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well sure, there's no denying that. But please, just hear me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，当然，这是毋庸置疑的。但请听我说完。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110051B7]vvVincentFGCazadors) FG Cazadors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Weaponized Cazadors. We steal a bunch of eggs, then dress up like their mothers. Instant army.
ESP.TRADUIT: 武器化猎蜂。我们偷一堆蛋，然后装扮成它们的母亲。马上就是一支军队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110051B7]vvVincentFGCazadors) FG Cazadors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. What's the idea?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。什么想法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told you you'd like it. Now all we gotta do is find some eggs, and resist the temptation to eat 'em. But if you got the power, I got the will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就知道你会喜欢。现在我们只需要找到一些蛋，还有忍住吃它们的诱惑。但如果你有能力，我就有决心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110051B7]vvVincentFGCazadors) FG Cazadors EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. I think that's an amazing idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对。我觉得那是个了不起的主意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that happens. It's called the "Vincent Effect." Named after the famous scientist, what's his name, Jean-Bapt-Penis or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，出现了，这就是“文森特效应”。以那个著名的科学家命名的，他叫什么来着，吉恩-巴普-老二什么的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110051B7]vvVincentFGCazadors) FG Cazadors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The more I talk to you the stupider I feel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟你说话越多，我就感觉越笨。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck, you've got a point. We could try making a suit out of a dead one. But that sounds like a lot of work. I'll leave that part to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操，你说到点子上了。我们可以试着用死掉的做一套。但那听起来像是要花很多功夫。我把这部分留给你吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110051B7]vvVincentFGCazadors) FG Cazadors EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think you've thought this through. Where do we get the costumes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你还没想清楚。我们从哪里弄到这些服装呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, they'll just be after our nipples. I think that's how motherhood works.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，它们只会追求我们的奶头。我觉得那就是母性的工作方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110051B7]vvVincentFGCazadors) FG Cazadors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But don't worry, I already thought of a solution. A milk-dispensing fully automated Cazador nipple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但别担心，我已经想出解决办法了。一个能自动分泌奶的猎蜂奶头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110051B7]vvVincentFGCazadors) FG Cazadors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got the blueprint in my head, because, you know, in case someone tries to steal it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我脑子里有蓝图，因为，你懂的，以防有人尝试偷走它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110051B7]vvVincentFGCazadors) FG Cazadors EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The larvae will probably just try to eat us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幼虫们可能只会试图吃我们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for a man named Charlie. Do you know him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个叫查理的人。你认识他吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I? Hells yeah I know Charlie! That's my old drinking buddy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道吗？哦是啊我知道查理！那可是我的老酒友了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'd come here every night and pound the beers! And sometimes, on a good night, we'd even drink 'em! Ha-ha-ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们每天晚上都来这里痛饮啤酒！有时候，要是日子好，我们甚至把它们都喝光！哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, they all look the same to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，他们对我来说看起来都一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did anyone from Freeside visit this town as of late?
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近有没有自由城的人访问这个镇？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry. We don't waste time talking to strangers, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我们不浪费时间和陌生人说话，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Trudy [00104C6C] (file) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did anyone from Freeside visit this town as of late?
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近有没有自由城的人访问这个镇？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You two would make quite the pair I bet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢说你们两个应该很搭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, you're telling me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，这是你告诉我的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait...are you asking, or telling? Shit if I can tell!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等...你是在问，还是在告诉？该死，我搞不清楚！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Isn't it bit too early to be drinking?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这时候喝酒不是有点太早了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean? It's not even midnight!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是什么意思？现在连午夜都还不到！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although secret is, whatever time it is, it's always before midnight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但秘密是，无论几点，它总是午夜前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you've had a little too much to drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你喝得有点太多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, are you gonna arrest me, sheriff?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么，你要逮捕我吗，警长？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even when you drink them, I imagine most of it gets spilled on the floor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使你喝了，我想大部分都会洒在地板上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, the floor's gotta drink too. It's tough work, getting stepped on all day!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，地板也得喝点。被人踩了一整天，这工作太艰难了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, Charlie's dead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，查理死了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh shit! You didn't know? Oh yeah, dead as a doornail. Been that way for ages.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，该死！你不知道吗？哦，是的，一命呜呼。那可是好久以前的事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, one night in the Saloon, he got in an argument with his girl, Alice I think, and hit the piss out of her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，有一天晚上在沙龙里，他和他的女孩吵架了，我想是爱丽丝，然后把她打的屁滚尿流。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then she comes back and stabs him with a broken whiskey bottle!
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后她回来，用一个打碎的威士忌瓶刺了他一下！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh shit! You didn't know that either? Fuck...
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死！那个你也不知道？操...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I'm full of surprises tonight!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我今晚充满了惊喜！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did he die?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是怎么死的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why Jack?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么是杰克？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, supposedly this Jack never spends his money, on account of being a cripple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，据说这个杰克从来不花钱，因为他是个跛子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: And Charlie couldn't pay his debts, on account of being a broke son of a bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而查理因为身无分文而无法偿还债务，真是个破产的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So she says they should partner up or something. But you know Charlie. He doesn't work with no one but himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以她说他们应该合作或者什么的。但你知道查理。他只和自己合作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me where he is?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我他在哪里吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell you, sheeeeit, I'll introduce you! Come on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你，狗屁，我会介绍你给她认识的！来吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't seem too broken up about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你似乎对这并不感到难过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Au contraire, my friend. I'm downright melancholy. But right now, I'm too drunk to be pissed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相反，朋友，我可是忧郁至极啊。但现在，我喝得太醉了，没法发火（Pissed）。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm guessing because all the piss is too busy running down my leg! Ha-ha-ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜是因为尿（Piss）都忙着流到我腿上去了！哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not surprised. You hit a woman, you get what you deserve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我并不惊讶。你打了女人，该有报应了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, he had it coming, no doubt about that. Truth be told, she done saved me the trouble, ha-ha-ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，他活该，毫无疑问。说实话，她还省了我个麻烦，哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've seen too much death to worry about a single man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我见过太多的死亡，不会为了一个人而担心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was still a tragedy nonetheless. And you know what's even more tragic? This asshole still owed me twenty caps! Ha-ha-ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管如此，这还是个悲剧。你知道更悲剧的是什么吗？这混蛋还欠我20个瓶盖呢！哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alice didn't tell me he was dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爱丽丝没有告诉我他死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That girl is no angel, that much is for sure. She might've even done it on purpose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那女孩不是天使。这一点毫无疑问。她甚至可能是故意的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I remember they were arguing over some guy named Jack taking over the nightclub.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得他们在争吵某个叫杰克的家伙接管夜总会的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! I didn't know this was a party! Hola muchachos! Donde esta...beer-o!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！我不知道这是一个派对！你好啊老铁们！啤酒在哪儿呢（西班牙语）！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess they don't speak Spanish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜他们不会说西班牙语。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for information on a nightclub owner in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在找自由城的一个夜总会老板的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh for fuck's sake. You too?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，操他妈的，你也是？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'll tell you what I told the last asshole who came around asking about Charlie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会告诉你我对上一个来问查理的混蛋说的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: It doesn't matter what you want. It all costs something. Either pay up or get lost.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要什么不重要。一切都得付出代价。要么付钱，要么滚蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the problem is I've got a pretty shitty memory. Comes and goes, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，问题是，我的记忆力相当差。时好时坏，你懂的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I bet if you give me 100 caps it'll be right on your fucking doorstep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我敢说，如果你给我100个瓶盖，答案就会送到你妈的门口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know where Charlie ran off too?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道查理跑到哪儿去了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah well, guess it's just you and me tonight. Back to the saloon!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊好吧，我猜今晚只有你和我了。回沙龙去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hal [110058DD] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to speak to you about Charlie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要和你谈谈查理的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I hope you know where he is. I've got debt collectors telling me they're gonna shut this place down if he doesn't pay what he owes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我希望你知道他在哪里。收债人告诉我，如果他不还欠的钱，他们就要关闭这个地方！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could let Mister Grant take over. He seems to have the wherewithal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以让格兰特先生接管。他似乎有必要的资金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure? That asshole wants to turn this place into a casino. But I suppose that's better than being kicked out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定吗？那个混蛋想把这个地方变成赌场。但我想那总比被赶出去好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still, that isn't my decision to make. It's Charlie's nightclub.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，这不是由我来做决定。这是查理的夜总会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I guess I can trust you. It's not the plants so much as what's in them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我想我可以相信你。不是植物本身，而是植物里面的成分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doc says they feed on rads like bees to honey. You get sick, and a plant like that'll flush it right out of your system.
ESP.TRADUIT: 医生说它们像蜜蜂对花蜜一样吸收辐射。你生病了，那种植物就会把它从你的体内清除干净。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that's what I need it for. A friend of mine, his wife...she's dying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而这正是我需要的。我的一个朋友，他的妻子...她快要死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's so special about this orchid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这朵兰花有什么特别之处吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, good timing. I was talking to the bartender just now and got something good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，时间正好。我刚才和酒保聊了一会儿，得到了点好消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Said some fellow came here the other day talking about this old cave, dark as death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说几天前有人来过这里，谈论这个又黑又深的古老洞穴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you keep walking, you'll find this one spot, where the light comes through like a kiss from heaven.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你继续往前走，会找到一个地方，那里的光就像天堂的亲吻一样穿透洞穴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: And beneath it is a field of plants whiter than angel wings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那下面是一片比天使翅膀还白的植物园。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any leads on that orchid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于那朵兰花有什么线索吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not on the cave, but I did get a beat on the fellow who seen it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 洞穴的线索没有，但我找到了一个看见过它的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: A guy by the name of Gomez who hangs out at the Big Horn in Boulder City. I say we go pay him a visit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个叫戈麦斯的家伙经常在巨石城的大角酒吧里出没。我觉得我们应该去拜访他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11000DBB]aaaHopeDialogue3DNPC) Intro and General Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you get a lead on where this cave might be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有找到这个洞穴可能在哪里的线索？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid Charlie's dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我恐怕查理已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dead? Are you sure? Huh...and he doesn't have any kin either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 死了？你确定吗？嗯...而且他也没有任何亲属。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I don't know. All this responsibility...it's not something I ever wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我不清楚。这全部责任...这可不是我想要的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: People need this place. It's important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们需要这个地方。这很重要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Charlie used to say the same thing. He'd always be talking about chasing your dreams.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查理以前也说过同样的话。他总是在谈论追逐梦想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: But he also said it was important to have a place for the people who woke up. That's what this club was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他也说过，为那些醒来的人提供一个地方是很重要的。这就是这个俱乐部的意义所在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what will happen to Carmen if the nightclub closes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果夜总会关门，卡门会怎样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. She'd have to go to the Wrangler, and sing in the lobby for tips...and do god knows what else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对。她得去原子牛仔，在大厅里唱歌，靠小费过活...天知道还会做什么事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe, but what the fuck else are you gonna do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许，但你他妈还能做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh, you got a point. I may not want to be the boss, but I sure as shit like being the bartender.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，你说得对。我也许不想当老板，但我绝对喜欢当酒保。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then let Mister Grant take over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就让格兰特先生接管。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. He seems like a nice cat, don't get me wrong, but he has a different vision than Charlie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。他似乎是个好人，别误会，但他和查理的愿景不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Charlie hated casinos. He said that's where dreams went to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查理讨厌赌场。他说那是梦想的坟墓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if he's really dead, I guess it doesn't really matter what he wants. His dream died with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果他真的死了，那我觉得他想要什么也不重要了。他的梦想随着他一起消失了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're buying the place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你要买下这地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I guess I am. It's pretty wild to think about it, me owning the club...but I guess nothing much will change.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想我会的。想想我拥有这家俱乐部，真是太不可思议了...但我想不会有太多变化。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll talk to the debtors and see if we can't square this away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会和债主谈谈，看我们能不能解决这个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because I don't think these cats give a hoot whether Charlie's alive or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我觉得这些家伙根本不在乎查理还活不活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, I think you should have this. It's the least I can do. If you hadn't found Charlie, this club would be a goner for sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，我想你应该拿着这个。这是我起码能做的。如果你没有找到查理，这个俱乐部就肯定完蛋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you'll talk to Mister Grant?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你会和格兰特先生谈谈吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I'll have him meet with the debtors and see if he can't square this away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我会让他和债主见面，看看能不能解决这个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hopefully he can talk them down before anyone gets hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望他能在有人受伤之前说服他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Make sure you come back and check with him later. He'll probably want to give you a reward for your work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确保你稍后再来找他。他可能会想给你一份奖励以对你做的工作表示感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, you'll probably want to see what he does with the place. I'm glad at least somebody will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此外，你可能会想看看他对这个地方做了什么。我很高兴至少有人会来看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of the new ownership?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得新的所有权怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, where else was I gonna go, honey? Mister Grant doesn't like my particular brand of blues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我还能去哪儿呢，亲爱的？格兰特先生不喜欢我这种特殊的布鲁斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: In fact, he doesn't like the blues at all. The only thing that man is interested in is green.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，他根本不喜欢布鲁斯。那个人唯一感兴趣的就是钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say the Garret's are any different. But at least they had enough sense to put the card tables away from the stage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 加勒特一家也不例外。但至少他们有足够的理智让赌桌离舞台远点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't expect to find you here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没想到会在这里遇到你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the same owner, honey. Now it just says so on the papers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老板还是同一个人，亲爱的。现在只是书面上这么写。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But a wise bird once told me to never mistake change for progress. I'd say I agree.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但有个聪明人曾经告诉过我，永远不要把变化误认为是进步。我想我同意这个说法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You never told me Charlie was dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从来没有告诉我查理已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, you asked me where he was. I told you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，你问我他在哪里。我告诉你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: So yeah, now you know. I fucking killed that son of a bitch. So what? He had it coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦是啊，现在你知道了。我他妈的杀了那个狗娘养的。那又怎么样？他罪有应得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if you're his family or whatever, but I've got the Omertas protecting me now, so don't even think of trying me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你是不是他的家人，但是现在有黑手党保护我，所以别想试探我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Alice [11004FE2] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: It looks great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它看起来很棒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't it? I have to say the designer I brought in from back east did a tremendous job. Well worth the fee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吧？我得说，我从东部找来的设计师做得非常出色。这笔费用绝对物有所值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But first things first. I believe I owe you a finder's fee!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但最重要的先做。我想我欠你一笔中介费！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you are. One thousand caps. Don't spend it all in one place, unless that place is here! Ha-ha-ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你。一千瓶盖。别把它全都花在一个地方，除非那个地方是这里！哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not my cup of tea, but what does it matter? I fucking hate tea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然不是我的菜，但有什么关系呢？我他妈讨厌吃菜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exactly. You're in it for the wealth, as am I. It doesn't matter what you or I think. We're not the ones who are going to live here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实。你追求的是财富，我也一样。你我觉得怎么样并不重要。我们不是要在这里生活的人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But enough about that. I believe I owe you a finder's fee!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是够了。我想我欠你一笔中介费！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you are. One thousand caps. Don't spend it all in one place, unless that place is here! Ha-ha-ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你。一千瓶盖。别把它全都花在一个地方，除非那个地方是这里！哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's exactly what I expected from you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这正是我对你的期望。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do take pride in my work. And from what I understand, so do you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对我的工作感到自豪。从我所了解的情况来看，你也是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, for your trouble. One thousand caps. Don't spend it all in one place, unless that place is here! Ha-ha-ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你，作为你的麻烦费。一千瓶盖。别把它全都花在一个地方，除非那个地方是这里！哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's terrible and I feel terrible about helping you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这太糟糕了，我对帮助你感到很糟糕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'm sure you'll feel a whole lot better when I give you your finder's fee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我相信当我给你你的中介费时，你一定会感觉好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, for your trouble. One thousand caps. Don't spend it all in one place, unless that place is here! Ha-ha-ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你，作为你的麻烦费。一千瓶盖。别把它全都花在一个地方，除非那个地方是这里！哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's Carmen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡门在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who? Oh, you mean the singer. I'm sure she'll find her way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁？哦，你是说那个歌手。我相信她会自己找到出路的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: But don't worry I've brought in one of the best comedians in all of Barstow to take her place!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但别担心，我已经找来了巴斯托最好的喜剧演员来接替她的位置！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: When's the Grand Opening?
ESP.TRADUIT: 开业的时间是什么时候？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'd open up today if I felt the security was adequate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果我觉得安全措施足够的话，我会立即开业的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've even had to retain the former owner's guardsman, uncouth as they are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我甚至不得不留下前任老板的警卫，虽然他们有些粗鲁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I suppose they're not without their charm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我想他们也有他们的魅力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you keep any of the staff?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你留下了任何员工吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I poached them from the Strip, of course. We have dancers from Gomorrah and dealers from the Tops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我是从长街挖来的。我们有来自蛾摩拉的舞者和来自九重天的荷官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turns out their loyalty went only as far as their employers were willing to pay them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果他们的忠诚只在雇主付得起的范围内。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is only a temporary solution of course, until I can bring in my own people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这当然只是一个临时解决方案，等到我能带来我自己的人时就会换掉他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever, when can I start gambling?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我什么时候可以开赌？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon, soon my friend!
ESP.TRADUIT: 很快就好，我的朋友，很快就好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But first things first. I believe I owe you a finder's fee!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但最重要的先做。我想我欠你一笔中介费！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you are. One thousand caps. Don't spend it all in one place, unless that place is here! Ha-ha-ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你。一千瓶盖。别把它全都花在一个地方，除非那个地方是这里！哈哈哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mister Grant [110049E0] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's because she takes after her dad. Lazy as a preacher on Monday morning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是因为她像她爸一样。懒得像个周一早晨的传教士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E98] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that depends on how far you're willing to go. I'm sure there's a chem that'll fix her up just as good as any shrink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那取决于你愿意走多远。我敢肯定有一种药物可以像任何精神科医生一样治好她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E98] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you suggesting I get my daughter, my pride and joy, hooked on drugs? I'd say if there was a line, you'd just about crossed it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在说我让我的女儿，我的骄傲和快乐，吸毒成瘾吗？我得说，如果有底线的话，你差不多越过了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E97] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: The day we met I hit on your wife, killed your brahmin, and got you so drunk you nearly shot your little girl while she was still in your balls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们认识的那一天，我搞了你的老婆，杀了你的双头牛，还把你灌醉，你差点把还在你蛋蛋里的小女儿在出生前就射出来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E98] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you had a line, we wouldn't be friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有底线的话，我们就不会成为朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E98] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it would be fine if it was just that. But she didn't send me NCR bills. She sent me fucking caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果只是那样就好了。但她没给我寄NCR的账单。她给我寄了他妈的瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E97] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you gotta make a decision. Go for the power play, or sit in the penalty box.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你必须做出决定。是采取强硬手段，还是呆在禁区里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thug [110072E8] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not doing anything! Look, Charlie will be here, all right! He's just got some things to take care of! But you'll get your caps, I swear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我什么都没做！看，查理马上就会到了！他只是有一些事要处理！而你会得到你的瓶盖，我发誓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scared, huh? You should be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 害怕了，嗯？你应该害怕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thug [110072E8] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: The dead don't make decisions. They typically just rot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 死人不会做决定。他们通常只会腐烂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dead? Are you sure? Huh...and he doesn't have any kin either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 死了？你确定吗？嗯...而且他也没有任何亲属。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I don't know. All this responsibility...it's not something I ever wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我不清楚。这全部责任...这可不是我想要的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Charlie will have a hard time paying back anyone from beyond the grave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 查理很难在坟墓之外还清任何人的债务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you saying Charlie's dead? Are you sure? Huh...and he doesn't have any kin either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说查理死了？你确定吗？嗯...而且他也没有任何亲属。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I don't know. All this responsibility...it's not something I ever wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我不清楚。这全部责任...这可不是我想要的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, then you have a problem. Because Charlie is a corpse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那么你有麻烦了。因为查理是个死人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dead? Are you sure? Huh...and he doesn't have any kin either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 死了？你确定吗？嗯...而且他也没有任何亲属。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I don't know. All this responsibility...it's not something I ever wanted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我不清楚。这全部责任...这可不是我想要的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jack [110029DC] (mod) Quest : ([110049CC]x3DNPCQuest99) The Blue Note EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey everyone, my name's Laura Lafferty, and yes, I have a name right out of a comic book.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大家好，我叫劳拉·拉弗蒂，没错，我的名字就像漫画里的角色。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Which makes sense because I'm technically a comic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是有道理的，因为从技术上讲，我就是一本漫画。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a book that you give to your kids, mind you, but the kind of comic that goes on stage and gets tomatoes thrown at her for a living.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是你给孩子们的那种书，提醒你一下，而是那种站在舞台上被扔番茄的漫画。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's how we eat, you know. You think I'm being unfunny on purpose but nope. Just hungry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我们的生计，你知道的。你可能以为我是故意不好笑，但并不是。我只是饿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome, my name is Laura Lafferty, and I'll be your entertainment this evening. Yeah, I know. Sucks for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎，我的名字是劳拉·拉弗蒂，今晚我将为您带来娱乐。是的，我知道，对你来说很糟糕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came down from New Reno as a favor for Mister Grant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是为了格兰特先生的一个请求而从新里诺来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You all know the esteemed Mister Grant, right? Founder of this lovely...whatever the hell it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们都认识尊敬的格兰特先生，对吧？这家可爱的...不管它到底是什么地方的创始人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: No really, I want to say it's a casino, but you got naked dancers in the corner, me on stage, and well...it's more like a buffet, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不开玩笑，我想说这是个赌场，但角落里有裸体舞者，舞台上有我，好吧...这更像是个自助餐厅，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: A confused, horrible, messed up buffet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个困惑、可怕、混乱的自助餐厅。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm beginning to think Mister Grant doesn't really know what he wants out of this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我开始觉得格兰特先生其实并不知道他想从这个地方得到什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, besides your money, but you knew that already.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，除了你们的钱，但你们已经知道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Strip is pretty crazy. A little too crazy, if you ask me. Ever been to Gomorrah? Wow. That place is wild.
ESP.TRADUIT: 长街太疯狂了。如果你问我的话，有点太疯狂了。去过蛾摩拉吗？哇。那个地方太狂野了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't even stay that long. In fact, I took two steps in, got kicked out by the Omertas and still ended up pregnant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我甚至没待太久。实际上，我刚进去两步，就被黑手党踢出去了，最后还怀上了孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yeah, true story. I even went to the clinic to confirm. Ever been to the New Vegas medical clinic? They're good people over there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，是的，真实故事。我甚至去了诊所确认过。你去过新维加斯诊疗所吗？那里的人都很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I go in there, and I tell the Doc, "I think I'm pregnant. Only, I don't know how it happened. I just went in and out real quick."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我去那里，告诉医生：“我想我怀孕了。但是，我不知道怎么回事。我只是进出得很快。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: And she tells me, "Yeah, so did my ex-husband."
ESP.TRADUIT: 她告诉我：“是啊，我前夫也是。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's try that again. Ahem. Hello, my name is Laura Lafferty, and I'll be your waiter this evening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们再试一次。嗯哼。你好，我叫劳拉·拉弗蒂，今晚我将为您担任服务员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be your waiter...Jesus. Would you like a bag of flubs to go with your soup tonight, sir?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我将担任服务员...天啊。您今晚的汤需要一袋失误（Flubs，谐音麦片Flakes）吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't mind me. I'm just gonna stand here chain smoking until I figure this out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要在意我。我只是要站在这里不停地抽烟，直到我搞清楚这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi, I'm Laura Lafferty, and I'm here to make you laugh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨，我是劳拉·拉弗蒂，我在这里让你发笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do I know? Well, it says so right in my holy fucking shit that's awful. Scratching that intro.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么知道的？好吧，俗话说的好，我了个大操，太糟糕了。删掉那段介绍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dated a raider once. Yeah, true story. He was my second boyfriend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经和一个掠夺者约会过。是的，真事。他是我第二个男朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: My first was a suburban boy who turned out to be a cannibal, so I thought, "Maybe it's time to see what else is out there."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的第一个男朋友是个郊区男孩，结果竟然是个食人族，所以我想，“也许是时候去外面开开眼界了。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't make very good choices in life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在生活中做的选择并不好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyways, for our first date, this raider boyfriend of mine took me to his hideout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论如何，我们的第一次约会，我的掠夺者男友带我去了他的藏身处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if you've ever seen one of their hideouts, you'll notice they like to hang body parts all over the place like chandeliers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你见过他们的一个藏身处，你会发现他们喜欢像吊灯一样挂满了人体部位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: So this guy, he's talking about how all these corpses are gonna scare away intruders, and all this macho killer talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以这个家伙，他在说这些尸体会吓跑入侵者，还说一直在说些“硬汉杀手”的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: And he's going on and on about fear and intimidation, but at no point does he address my first and only question:
ESP.TRADUIT: 他滔滔不绝地讲着恐惧和威慑，但从来没有都没有回答我的第一个也是唯一的问题：
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: "What do you do about the smell?"
ESP.TRADUIT: “气味你要怎么办？”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: And he looks at me, looks back at the corpse, scratches his neck a few times and says..."What smell?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 他看着我，又看了看尸体，抓了几次脖子，然后说...“什么气味？”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Needless to say that was pretty much the nail in the coffin of that relationship.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用说，这几乎就是那段感情的丧钟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say what you will about cannibals, but at least they shower and know how to cook.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你怎么说食人族，至少他们会洗澡而且会做饭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk more about Mister Grant, shall we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们多谈谈格兰特先生，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard he's so cheap, he lets his hair fall out so he could save on the haircuts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说他非常吝啬，以至于让头发掉光而省钱不剪头发！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: No? No? Okay, how's this. He's so cheap, he doesn't even pay attention! I mean, how else do you think I can keep ragging on him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不行？不行？好吧，这样怎样。他非常吝啬，甚至连注意力都集中不了！我的意思是，你还能想到其他什么理由让我一直挖苦他？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing? Really? Man, tough audience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有？真的吗？哎呀，难搞的观众。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever hear of the The Thorn? Supposedly it's this underground arena over in Westside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过荆棘街吗？据说它是西区的一个地下竞技场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's run by a really scary woman named Red Lucy. That's a frightening name, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 由一个非常可怕的女人管理，她叫血手露西。这是一个可怕的名字，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Her parents were smart to let her run the arena instead of her brother, Pink Marcus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她的父母很聪明，让她去管理竞技场而不是她的兄弟，粉手马库斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're like "We think it's best to let Red Bloody Lucy handle the cage-fighting cazadors, Marcus, you go dwell in a vault."
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们就像这样说：“我们觉得最好让血手露西来处理笼中搏斗的猎蜂，马库斯，你去避难所里住吧。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't mean to stereotype though. My friend John was a vault dweller and he spent his workouts bench pressing deathclaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我不是要搞刻板印象。我的朋友约翰是个避难所居民，他的锻炼是用死亡爪做卧推。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: John was a scary guy to have in your house. Mostly because our family didn't own a home, so...bazing! He's there to rob yoooooou.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约翰在你家里是个可怕的家伙。主要是因为我们家没有房子，所以...逗你玩的！他来抢劫你啦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crap, that joke sucked hard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀，那个笑话真是糟透了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Laura Lafferty [11007309] (mod) Quest : ([1100383B]x3DNPCCarmenPerfs) I Only Have Eyes For You EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why? Is she one of those "special" types? Or is she trying to get us to use her money?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么？她是那种“特别”的类型吗？还是她想让我们用她的钱？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E98] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't know. She'd be insulted if I even asked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道。如果我问她，她会觉得受辱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E97] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just some of the boys out letting off some steam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是一些男孩在外面发泄点情绪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E9A] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you know it wasn't coyotes? Or raiders?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么知道不是郊狼？或者掠夺者呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E99] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably cause I was out there with 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能是因为我和他们在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E9A] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good as can be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽善尽美了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E98] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And your kid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你孩子呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E97] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't even ask. He joined some gun-toting crazies out east.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别问了。他加入了东边一些拿着枪的疯子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E98] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Simon isn't old enough to even hold a rifle, let alone shoot one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？西蒙甚至还没大到能拿起枪，更别说射击了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E97] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Simon? Ohhhhh, you mean the kid I had with my wife, as opposed to you know, yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 西蒙？噢，你是说我和我妻子生的孩子，而不是，你懂的，你的孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E98] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 滚开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E97] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wyatt Earp was a real person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怀亚特·厄普是真实存在的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Chaplain [11006A29] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. Hung out with a cyborg doctor and solved mysteries out of a van or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了。和一个机器人医生一起待在一辆货车里解决谜团或者什么的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Chaplain [11006A29] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, that sounds like fun. I oughta replace you with a cyborg John. It might make for better company.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，听起来很有趣。我应该用一个机器人约翰来代替你。也许会更好相处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11006D0B] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish you would. It'll be nice to preach to someone who'll actually listen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你这么做。对一个真正愿意听的人传教会很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Chaplain [11006A29] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't know, Dale. Life expectancy tends to jump all over the place when the world's gone to hell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道，戴尔。当世界陷入混乱时，人的预期寿命往往变化无常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Chaplain [11006A29] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, sure, we aren't out taking baths with mirelurks or anything, but danger can find you easy enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，当然，我们不会和泥沼蟹一起洗澡，但是危险很容易找到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Chaplain [11006A29] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, look on the bright side. If I die, it'll mean I'll finally know if God is real or you're a liar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，看看光明的一面。如果我死了，那就意味着我终于知道上帝是否存在，或者你是个骗子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11006D0B] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Probably, Dale. Unless you've been seeing another priest behind my back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能吧，戴尔。除非你背着我见了另一个牧师。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Chaplain [11006A29] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that what you are, my priest? Cause according to Candance, you're my second wife.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是你是我的牧师吗？因为根据坎丹斯的说法，你是我第二任妻子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11006D0B] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Said he can't. Said he was going to the doc to donate some blood for the troops.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说他不能去。他说他要去医生那献点血给军队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Chaplain [11006A29] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's admirable. Never could do it myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那很令人钦佩。我自己从来做不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11006D0B] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Chaplain [11006A29] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. I just can't imagine my blood swimming around in some other guy's dick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我就是无法想象我的血会在别人的老二里游泳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly, I realized I was hanging around the wrong people and decided I needed to make it right with God.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说，我意识了到我在和错误的人在一起，我决定要跟上帝弄清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Chaplain [11006A29] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you were hanging around me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你一直和我在一起啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11006D0B] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exactly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正是如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Chaplain [11006A29] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It doesn't matter if we're friends Dale. Confessions are spoken only to God.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们是不是朋友又怎样，戴尔。忏悔只说给上帝听。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Chaplain [11006A29] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'll be fine. After all, I'm an atheist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没事的。毕竟，我是无神论者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11006D0B] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, as a soldier you could die at any moment. A lot of people have questions about the afterlife.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，作为一名士兵，你随时都可能死去。很多人对来世都有疑问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Chaplain [11006A29] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you have the answers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有答案吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11006D0B] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can call me whatever you want. Both are correct.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以随便怎么叫我都行。两种说法都对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Chaplain [11006A29] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're a chaplain and a John. Seems like that's a bit of a conflict, don't you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你是牧师还是约翰。看来这有点矛盾，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11006D0B] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have the answers. I just point them to the right page.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有答案。我只是把他们指向正确的页码。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Chaplain [11006A29] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11006D0B] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't think I get scared? I'm a woman. The Legion will just cut your head off. God only knows what they'lll try to do to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你以为我不害怕吗？我是个女人。军团会直接砍掉的头。只有上帝知道他们会对我做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E9A] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's even worse. I don't want to think about you dying too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那更糟了。我不想想象你也会死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E99] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you better have my back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你最好帮助我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E9A] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! I heard about the little show you put on at the shooting range. Didn't know you were a marksman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！我听说了你在射击场上的小表演。没想到你曾是个射手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E9A] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, but I've never actually killed anyone before. I can't imagine it's the same. What if I flinch?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，但我从来没有真正杀过人。我无法想象这会是一样的。要是我手抖呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E99] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got family back home Jenkins?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在家有家人吗詹金斯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E9A] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. A girlfriend and maybe a baby on the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有。一个女朋友，也许还有一个即将出世的孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E99] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then that's who you think about when some Legionnaire is coming for your throat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是当有军团士兵来夺你的性命时你该想的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E9A] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anywhere else? Why, what do you do for fun?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有别的地方吗？为什么，你做什么事来取乐？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E9A] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. I just sort of sit and think about how I'm gonna fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我只是坐着想怎么战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E99] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not healthy. Play some cards, have a drink, loosen up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那样不健康。玩点牌，喝点酒，放松一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E9A] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: But what if the Legion attack? I want to be ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果军团进攻呢？我想要准备好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E99] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wind yourself up the way you're doing, and you'll kill yourself first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你像现在这样把自己搞得那么紧张，你会先累死自己的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E9A] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you hear what happened to Linda?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说琳达出了什么事了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E98] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. She was a tough son of a bitch too. But Super Mutants are on another level.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说了。她也是个坚强的家伙。但超级变种人可是另一个层次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E97] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't I know it. I arm wrestled a mutant once, and it was like trying to bench press a truck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我深有体会。我曾经和一个变种人比过臂力，感觉就像在试着推举一辆卡车。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E98] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that isn't a load of horse shit, I'm going to have to ask why there's so many flies around your mouth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这不是一派胡言乱语，那我就得问问你嘴巴周围为什么有这么多苍蝇了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E97] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmph, says the guy who told me he once kept a yao guai as a pet. Face it, you lie so much you're basically a rug.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼，这话来自那个告诉我他曾经把一只妖怪当宠物养的家伙。说实话，你撒谎的次数已经到了能叠成毯子的程度。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E98] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, fair enough asshole. So who won this fictional arm wrestling match of yours?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，这倒挺公平的，混蛋。那么你这场虚构的臂力比赛谁赢了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E97] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you even have to ask?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你居然还要问吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E98] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I've seen your arms. So no, I guess I don't. What I can't figure out is, how they're still attached to your body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我见过你的胳膊。所以不，我猜我不用问了。我搞不懂的是，它们怎么还连接在你的身体上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E97] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sure you want to head this way? Heard there's deathclaws around these parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定要往这个方向走吗？听说这附近有死亡爪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11014770]aaaHopeLocationComments) Location Comments for Hope EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best we don't get too big for our britches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们最好不要得意忘形。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11014770]aaaHopeLocationComments) Location Comments for Hope EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deathclaws. Well, Johnny, fuck me with a guitar and call me Peggy. Because we're about to get raped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 死亡爪。好吧，约翰尼，拿吉他干我吧，然后叫我佩吉。因为我们马上就要被强奸了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right then. You need me again, you know where to find me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。如果你又需要我了，你知道可以哪里找到我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like you to go back to the Lucky 38.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你回到幸运38去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 了解。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to change your combat style.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你改变你的战斗方式。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有其他事情吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your tactics are fine. Let's change the subject.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的策略还不错。我们换个话题吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all. Let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatcha need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about how close you're following me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来讨论下你我之间的距离。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. What's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。你有什么想法？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about how close you're following me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来讨论下你我之间的距离。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's enough about tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战术方面谈论够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatcha need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来谈谈策略吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. What's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。你有什么想法？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来谈谈策略吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A bounty hunter once told me there's two things you can't escape. Death and taxes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个赏金猎人曾经告诉我，有两件事你是逃不过的。死亡和税收。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why he always asked for receipts. Cause when you kill for a living, the bullets are tax deductible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么他总是要求收据的原因。因为当你以杀人为生，子弹是可以抵税的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有些什么想法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know how fucked up this country is? We once elected a guy named "Dick Richardson" President.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这个国家有多混乱吗？我们曾经选举了一个叫做“迪克·理查森”的家伙当总统。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right, the guy's name was literally "Penis Cockboy" and we thought he'd make a good leader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，那家伙的名字就是“阴茎·鸡巴男孩”，而且我们竟然觉得他会是个好的领导者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么想法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Law and order is like that old Indian proverb. The enemy of my enemy is my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 法律与秩序就像那句古老的印度谚语。我敌人的敌人就是我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: At heart, maybe I'm a raider. But you live by their rule, and you'll be swimming in karmic quicksand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或许我本质上是个掠夺者。但你按照他们的规矩行事，你就会陷入因果的泥沙中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are your thoughts on the law here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对这里的法律有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lady luck is a harsh mistress, my friend. She'll kiss you at the altar, and the next thing you know, she's got the house and the kids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运女神是一位无情的情人，我的朋友。她会在祭坛上亲吻你，接下来你就知道，她已经有了房子和孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Karma doesn't make any promises. It doesn't deal with lawyers. It's cold, hard math. Now that's something I can believe in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因果不做任何承诺。它不与律师打交道。它是冰冷的、严酷的数学。现在这是我可以相信的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are your thoughts on gambling?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对赌博有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chems are a bonding force. They're the universal language, spoken by people of all creeds and color.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毒品是一种结合力。它们是一种通用语言，被所有信仰和肤色的人说着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't matter who you are, or where you're from. When the words travel through our bloodstreams we know each other as kin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你是谁，来自哪里。当这些词语穿过我们的血液时，我们就会彼此视为亲人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about chems?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于毒品的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crazy is like a drum, banging the inside of your skull.
ESP.TRADUIT: 疯狂就像是一种鼓，敲击着你头骨的内部。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
