ESP.ORIGINAL: So the psycho with the lead pipe? He's not trying to beat you, he's trying to communicate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以拿着铅管的精神病？他不是在试图打败你，而是在试图沟通。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are your thoughts on mauraders?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对掠夺者有什么想法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like targeting systems. It's like gambling with your aim, and I ain't much of a diceman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢瞄准系统。这就像用你的瞄准来赌博，而我不是个喜欢赌的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: One minute you're Doc Holliday, ass-fucking mosquitoes with your bullets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时你是霍利戴医生，用子弹干掉蚊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The next you're a dumb, blinking gecko, staring down the throat of a deathclaw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来你就变成了一只愚蠢、眨着眼的蜥蜴，盯着死亡爪的喉咙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of VATS?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对VATS有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You turn your back on a man, he might stab you in the gut, sure, but he also might pat you on the shoulder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你背对着一个人，他可能会捅你肚子，当然，但他也可能会拍拍你的肩膀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You turn your back on a chem, and it's up your ass and gnawing on your organs in two seconds flat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你背对着一个毒品，那它可能会立刻钻进你的屁股，啃咬你的器官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that's why God invented the donor system. Just let me know if you kill a raider who's my blood type.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这就是为什么上帝发明了供体系统。如果你杀了一个我的血型的掠夺者，就告诉我一声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got any advice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么建议吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't get to choose your lot in life. Some people are born as pinky fingers, other people are born as thumbs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你无法选择你生活的命运。有些人生来就是小指，有些人生来就是拇指。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me and you, we're the middle fingers. We're the "Fuck you" the world forgot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和你，我们是中指。我们是世界忘记的“操你妈”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Life's tough, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 生活很艰难，是吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't get why we need caps at all. We should just trade shit for shit, like in the old days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白为什么我们需要瓶盖。我们应该像古时候一样以物换物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Carrying around a sack of caps just ain't worth the trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着一袋瓶盖太麻烦了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么想法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always keep your gun loaded and ready. Don't care if you're taking a nap or a piss. If someone catches with your pants down, you're gonna get fucked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 始终保持你的枪装好子弹并且随时待命。不管你是在睡觉还是上厕所。如果有人在你裤子没穿好的时候抓住你，那你就完蛋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got any advice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么建议吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some say chems can be used like medicine. Don't know if that's true, but it does cure my boredom, and that's good enough for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人说毒品可以像药物一样使用。我不知道那是不是真的，但它确实能治愈我的无聊，对我来说这就够好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You like chems a lot, don't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很喜欢毒品，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not here to answer the big questions. Or even the little ones. You keep me around to shoot people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是在这回答大问题的。甚至也不是回答小问题的。你把我留在身边是为了对人开枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got some advice for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么建议给我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know how you do things out here but back west, when it comes to shit, we don't talk it or take it. Remember that and you'll be just fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你在这里是怎么做事的，但在西部，当涉及到那些烂事时，我们既不说也不接受。记住这一点，你就会没事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got some advice for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么建议给我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a big believer in karma. You do right by the world, and it'll return the favor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很相信因果报应。你对世界好，世界也会对你好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But we didn't do right by the world, did we. We dropped a big fucking turd on it, so it's no surprise we're living in a toilet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我们没有对世界好，对吧。我们对它丢了一坨他妈的巨屎，所以我们活在粪坑里也不奇怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么想法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some say you shouldn't do chems first thing in the morning. You know what I say? Fuck those people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人说早上不应该第一件事就嗑药。你知道我怎么说吗？操这群人的妈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么想法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I realized the other day that the body is a system built on purging. Taking a shit, jerking off, popping zitsЃcit, feels good to let it all out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我前几天意识到，身体是一个以清除为基础的系统。拉屎、打飞机、挤痘痘，把这些东西都释放出来会感觉很爽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The same is true for secrets, my friend. Don't be afraid to tell them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 秘密也是一样的，我的朋友。不要害怕说出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something troubling you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么困扰你吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever wonder if there's a God, and if he's a fucking dumbass? I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有想过是否有神存在，如果有的话，他是不是个混蛋？我有想过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not talking about Mother Nature, or karma, or the great big wheel of life. I mean the engineer who created man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是在谈论自然母亲、因果报应或者生命的大轮回。我指的是创造人类的工程师。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, this engineer, God or Jesus or whoever, he gave us hands, and we turned them into fists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，这个工程师，不管是上帝还是耶稣或者其他什么人，他给了我们手，而我们把手变成了拳头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now I say he should've seen it coming but I guess that's why he's an idiot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得他早就应该预见到这一点，但我猜这就是他为什么是个白痴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because there's no backsies when it comes to fists. Not when we use them to jerk off. He takes that away and it'll be mutiny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为用上拳头就没有回头路了。尤其当我们用它们打飞机的时候。他要是把这个拿走，那可是要造反的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got something on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么想法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Had a dream the other day. We were near this river of cola, watching a bunch of miners pan for caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前几天做了个梦。我们在一条可乐河旁边，看着一群矿工在淘瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't know what it means but it did make me thirsty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道这意味着什么，但确实让我口渴了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got something on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么想法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say that everything we build has some kind of sexual innuendo behind it. Ever seen a rocketship? It's man's attempt to fuck the sky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说我们建造的一切背后都有某种性暗示。你见过火箭吗？那是人类日天空的尝试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if flying saucers really exist, then shit...that means aliens got some fucked up penises.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以如果飞碟真的存在，妈的...那就意味着外星人的丁丁很奇怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got something to say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么话要说吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The beauty of chems is, they've got one for every human temptation ever invented.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毒品的美妙之处在于，它们融合了人类发明的所有诱惑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You wanna go up? Have a Jet. Wanna crash down? Hydra will take you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想升空吗？来个杰特。想下坠吗？九头蛇会带着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And it don't stop there, ohhhh no. We got Rebound and Rocket, Steady and Slasher, Turbo and Tobacco, Voodoo and Vodka.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且还不仅仅是这些，哦不。我们有疯狂药和火箭，稳定剂和狂暴针，加速剂和烟草，巫毒和伏特加。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can have the entirety of the human condition - peace, rage, laughter, and love - analyzed and synthesized, into the point of a half inch needle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以把整个人类的情感 - 平和、狂怒、欢笑和爱 - 都分析合成为一根半英寸的针头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The guy who sells drugs? He ain't a pusher, my friend. He's a goddamn librarian.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卖毒品的人？他不是推销员，我的朋友。他是他妈的图书管理员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you like chems, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你喜欢毒品，嗯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a fan of prehistoric sports, I like picking up books with stats in 'em. Batting average, slugging percentage, E-R-A...
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一个史前体育的粉丝，我喜欢看那些有数据的书。击球率、长打率、自责分率...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit man, you could ask me anything, I'm like a fucking terminal with that shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，你可以问我任何问题，我在那玩意方面简直像个他妈的终端机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what else do you like? Besides chems, I mean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还喜欢什么？我是说除了毒品外。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever wonder where things get their names from? Like the Salisbury in salisbury steak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有没有想过事物的名字是从哪来的？比如索尔兹伯里牛肉饼中的“索尔兹伯里”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it a city? A man? And why's he so goddamn delicious?
ESP.TRADUIT: 它是一个城市吗？还是一个人？为什么他这么他妈的美味？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么想法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Traveling the wastes reminds me of the time I ran into this wild Gecko. It was medium sized, about my height.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在废土旅行让我想起了我遇到一只野生蜥蜴的那次。它中等大小，大约和我一样高。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: After we spotted each other, neither of us made a move.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们看见彼此后，谁也没有动作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We just stared at each other for like a minute, trying to figure out which one of us was the food.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们只是互相盯着对方看了大概一分钟，试图弄清楚谁是食物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got any stories to share?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么可以分享的故事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard drinking your own piss is totally fine. Piss is sterile.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说喝自己的尿是完全没问题的。尿液是无菌的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you bottle it, and say, leave it out in the sun for a few days, well...let's just say I've had better ideas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是如果你把它装在瓶子里，然后放在阳光下几天，好吧...怎么说呢，我有过更好的主意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got another brilliant idea. Spit it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还有其他绝妙的主意吗？说出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes I think I ought to settle down and raise a family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候我想我应该安定下来，养家糊口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the American ideal. A wife, two kids, a white picket fence and of course, land mines. To you know, keep out the raiders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是美国式理念。一个妻子，两个孩子，一个白色篱笆，当然还有地雷。你懂的，为了防止掠夺者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But life ain't a billboard, bucko. That's cause the real land mines...they're inside the house.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但生活不是广告牌，老兄。因为真正的地雷...它们在屋子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's bothering you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么困扰着你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: People always imagine extraterrestrials having big heads and bug eyes and green skin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们总是想象外星生物有大脑袋、虫眼和绿色皮肤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That ain't scary. The scary thing would be if they looked just like us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不吓人。真正吓人的是如果他们看起来就像我们一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么想法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say people with big guns got tiny dicks. Like, if you're packing heat in your pants, there's no need to compensate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说拿大枪的人老二都小。就像是，如果你裤子里有热乎的家伙，就不需要去弥补什么了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, ever try killing someone with your dick? Fuck that shit, give me the biggest gun you got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你试过用你那老二杀人吗？操他妈的，给我你能拿出的最大的枪吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有些什么想法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you feel like getting for breakfast? I guess we could split this can of beans I found. Fair warning though. It was open when I found it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你早餐想吃点什么？我猜我们可以分吃我找到的这罐豆子。不过警告你一下，我找到它的时候它是开着的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, I gotta say, you're the bee's knees, my friend. The cat's pajamas. A real chip off the old block.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，我得说，你真是顶呱呱的，我的朋友。绝对是个人物。太像你老子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, did those words just come out of my mouth? I've been reading too much garbage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我刚才真说了这些话吗？我看了太多垃圾了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: 'Sup, Vincent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么样了，文森特。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it wrong to hurt people? I really don't give a fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伤害别人有错吗？我根本不在乎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I had a cap for every fuck I gave, then...well...in that case I'd be rich. Because you'd be paying me to care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我每在乎一次就能有一个瓶盖的话...好吧...那我会很有钱。因为你得花钱让我在乎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有些什么想法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever heard of flying saucers? They say they come out at night, and kidnap folks with the sole purpose of inspecting their anuses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过飞碟吗？他们说飞碟在夜晚出现，绑架人类，只为检查他们的肛门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hard to believe, I know, but I have a friend of a friend who knows a guy that is hundred percent sure he's crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 难以置信，我知道，但我有个朋友的朋友认识一个人，他百分百确定自己疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's going on in your head now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在在想什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whether it's out in the wastes or at the card table, remember to keep a clear head, a steady hand, and a flaccid penis.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论是在废土还是在牌桌上，记住要保持头脑清醒，手稳，还有老二别硬了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the first two anyway. Don't know why you'd raise your flagpole at a time like this but just in case.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，前两个就行了。不知道为什么你会在这种时候撑起旗杆，不过以防万一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got some words of wisdom for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么至理名言给我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: In life, you're always gonna remember the hard times. They're gonna stick to you like rads on a ghoul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在生活中，你总会记住艰难时刻。它们会像辐射粘在尸鬼身上一样粘在你身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that's a good thing. 'Cause when it comes to hard times, the worst thing you can do is forget 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一件好事。因为当面对艰难时刻时，最坏的事就是把它们忘了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got some words of wisdom for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么至理名言给我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know how the world's a circle? You keep going in one direction, and you end up where you were.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道世界是圆的吧？你一直往一个方向走，就会回到原地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, what if it's the same way up and down? You dig a hole deep enough, and next thing you know, you're falling out of the fucking sky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，如果上下也是一样的呢？你挖个够深的洞，接下来，你会从天上掉下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A cap for your thoughts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你呆呆地在想什么呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know much about the Commonwealth, but I do know something about the common man. He'll fuck you if you let him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对联邦了解不多，但对普通人了解一些。如果你让他操你，他就会操你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you know a lot of things, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你知道很多事吧，嗯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like your rifle. Now that's the kind of gun that'll put hair on your chest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢你的枪。这才是那种能让你有男子气概的枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, them Russki guns, they'll put hair on your back. That's where them Commie girls like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，那些毛子枪会让你有男子气概。那就是那些共产妹子喜欢的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm all in favor of facial hair. If you like it, grow a beard. Shit man, grow two!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完全支持胡子。如果你喜欢，就留一个胡子吧。哎呀哥们儿，留两个吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But a wise man once told me...if you got something worth looking at, why obstruct the view.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是有个智者曾告诉过我...如果你有值得看的东西，为什么要遮住视线呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever grow a beard? Or thought about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你留过胡子吗？或者想过要留吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes, everything's just numb to me. Like, I just wanna feel something, anything, to let me know I'm still alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候，对我来说一切都变得麻木了。就像，我只是想感受一些东西，任何东西，让我知道我还活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I realize I am feeling something. I'm feeling what it's like to be an angst-ridden teenager! Jesus H.Christ, no wonder I wanna kill myself!
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我意识到我感受到了一些东西。我感受到了作为一个充满焦虑的青少年是什么样子！我的天哪，难怪我想要自杀！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: How you keeping up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最近怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever notice if you spell 'dick' backwards, it basically spells 'Kid?'
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有注意到，如果你把 'dick' 倒着拼，基本上就是 'kid'？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something you want to say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么想说的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was listening to the radio the other day and...well, what in the world is a "rag time gal?" Because it sounds like it's some woman on her period.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我前几天听收音机然后...好吧，到底什么是“拉格时间女孩”？因为听起来像是某个女人在经期。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, them old timers were into some kinky shit. We need to step it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，那些老家伙都对一些古怪的玩意感兴趣。我们得跟上节奏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么想法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once got shot in a brothel, mid-coitus. Used a condom as a tourniquet. Then I pulled the bullet out with my teeth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有次在妓院里中了一枪，刚干到一半呢。我用一个避孕套当做止血带。然后用牙齿把子弹弄了出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why? Because my other hand was on my dick. It still had a job to finish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么呢？因为我的另一只手还在我老二上。它还有个任务要完成呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the craziest stuff you did?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你做过最疯狂的事是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a student of ancient history. Ancient American history. Cowboys and Indians, tea parties and witch burnings, turkey and smallpox.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是古代历史的学生。古代美国历史。牛仔和印第安人，茶会和焚巫，火鸡和天花。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those were the keys to glory, buckaroo. Manifest fucking destiny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些是荣耀的钥匙，哥们儿。天定他妈的命运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if I were to put a face on old world money, that's where I'd start. The smallpox.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我要给旧世界的钱刻上一个面孔，我会从天花开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: As far as I'm concerned, it ain't a disease. It's a goddamn patriot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就我看来，它不是一种疾病。而是个他妈的爱国者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得这个地方怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you ever get a chance to just load up on chems, then I say go for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有机会一次性嗑一大堆药，那我说就去试试吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, you'll regret it in the morning but it'll be a day you won't remember for the rest of your life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，第二天你会后悔，但这将是你余生中都不会记得的一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got some advice for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么建议给我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If loving chems is wrong, then I donЃ't wanna be right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果喜欢嗑药是错误的，那我就不想正确了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell, I'll eat crow for breakfast, and my words for lunch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼，我要把乌鸦当早餐，把我的言语当午餐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll get off on the wrong foot to back the wrong horse while it barks up the wrong tree.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会起错步，押错宝，还会干错人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be just about the wrongest man on the planet, if you'll do me the honor of passing that needle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果要请你给把那根针给我，我差不多就会是世界上最错误的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some people think using chems is wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人觉得嗑药是错误的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Roger that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的距离很好。我们聊点别的吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's hit the trail then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们就出发吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你很好。我们离开这里吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. It always felt like he cared more about survival than raising a family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我总觉得他更在意生存而不是抚养家庭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: In his defense, you can't raise a family if they're dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以他的立场来说，如果家人都死了，你就没法抚养家庭了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I get that, and I appreciate it, really, but it's not like you have to pick one or the other. You can do both.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我理解这一点，真的很感激，但不是说你必须要选一个。你两者都可以兼顾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, so give me an example. When's a time you felt neglected?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那给我举个例子。你什么时候感到被忽视过？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, this one time he forgot my birthday because he was too busy setting traps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，有一次他因为忙着设置陷阱而忘记了我的生日。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then he tried to make up for it by saying the gecko he caught was my present.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后他试图弥补，说他抓到的蜥蜴是我的礼物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh you poor thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你太可怜了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut up, I'm being serious. He even tried to put a little bow on it. It was the saddest thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴，我是认真的。他甚至试图在上面系上一个小蝴蝶结。那是最让人难过的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well if that's the saddest thing that's ever happened to you in your life, you're lucky.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果那是你一生中最难过的事情，那你很幸运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what my father did on my birthday? He got drunk and beat the shit out of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我父亲在我的生日做了什么吗？他喝醉了，然后狠狠地打了我一顿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no point. It's not exactly gambling when we share our money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有意义。如果我们共享钱财，这就不算真正的赌博。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't have to bet money. How about the winner gets to choose where we go on our honeymoon?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不一定要赌钱。赢家可以选择我们去哪里度蜜月，怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, you won't even let me pick my clothes. Now you're letting me pick that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，你连我的衣服都不让我选，现在却让我选这个？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're saying It's worth something to you to win.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你的意思是，赢对你来说有价值。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, but if I pick somewhere you don't wanna go, I have a feeling it's going to cost me much, much more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，但如果我选了一个你不想去的地方，我觉得这会让我付出更多更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh my god, really?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦天啊，真的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, but you get the point, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不过你明白我的意思，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're horrible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你太可怕了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just saying, your father getting you a gecko for your birthday isn't the worst thing in the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是说，你父亲给你生日送了只蜥蜴并不是世界上最坏的事情。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: So is that the standard for good parenting now? So long as you don't flog your kids you're doing great?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以这是现在好父母的标准了吗？只要不鞭打孩子就算做得好了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a start.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're unbelievable. And oh by the way, I feel like this is all just an excuse to get me something shitty for my birthday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是不可理喻。顺便说一下，我觉得这都是你为了给我生日送烂玩意找的借口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not true. I'll have you know I bought you a gecko weeks before you even told me this story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是这样的。我要让你知道，甚至在你告诉我这个故事几周之前，我就给你买了一只蜥蜴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a city, or an institution?
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一座城市，还是一个机构？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean as a place to live.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说作为一个居住的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you're not gonna like my answer. I think it's full of phonies. Every casino, every performer, just phonies, the whole lot of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么你不会喜欢我的答案。我觉得那里充满了骗子。每个赌场，每个表演者，都是骗子，全都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you'd fit right in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你会很适合那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ouch. You really go right for the jugular, don't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀。你真是一针见血，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's why you fell for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是你爱上我的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you asking, anyway? I know you don't want to live there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，为什么问这个？我知道你不想住在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was thinking of a place for my dad. With mom gone, I'm worried he's gonna get lonely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在为我爸找个地方。妈妈走了，我担心他会感到孤独。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, Vegas will take care of that, provided he can still make it stand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，维加斯会解决这个问题，只要他还能搞得动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you brought it up, not me. But if you're that worried about him, you should invite him here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，是你提出来的，不是我。但如果你真的那么担心他，就应该邀请他来这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh, gross.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，真恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, what does Vegas got that we don't? We got whores, pit fighting, and even a Super Mutant!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，维加斯有什么我们没有的？我们有妓女、斗兽场，甚至还有个超级变种人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd be willing to bet my left nut that Vegas doesn't have a super mutant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢用我左边的睾丸打赌维加斯没有超级变种人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's see what you have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看你有什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take a look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bartender [1100922F] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like this to be your new home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望这里能成为你的新家。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you relax here for a while?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不在这里休息一会儿呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you relax here for a while?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不在这里休息一会儿呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not gonna beg. If he comes, he comes. I don't need his approval anymore, I'm not a child.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会求他。如果他要来，他就来吧。我不再需要他的认可了，我不是小孩子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you don't think you're acting like one?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不觉得你表现得像个孩子吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't. If anyone is acting like a baby, it's him. He's probably still mad I left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不觉得。如果说有人表现得像小孩，那就是他。他可能还在生我离开的气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did leave without saying a word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确实不告而别了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you helped! Jesus, whose side are you on, anyway?
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且你还帮了我！天啊，你到底是站在哪一边的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yours. You know that. That's why I'm trying to get you to make up. It's what you want, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然是你这边。你知道的。这就是为什么我想让你们和解。这是你想要的，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901B] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: To be honest, I don't know what I want. Things with my dad have always been complicated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说实话，我不知道自己想要什么。我和我爸之间的事情一直很复杂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Westside Citizen [1100901E] (mod) Quest : ([11009019]x3DNPCYoungCouple) Westside Bakery EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a knife I got off some wastelander.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我从一个废土游民那里搞到的一把刀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11F] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you fucking kidding me? The Deathclaw, hands down. Shit, it’d win with both hands tied behind its back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的开玩笑吧？这毫无疑问是死亡爪。妈的，它双手被绑在背上也能赢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11E] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, what about twenty dogs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那二十只狗呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11F] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: It ain’t about a numbers. Deathclaws are killing machines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是数量的问题。死亡爪是杀人机器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11E] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: The boss has killed plenty of people. Think he could take out a Deathclaw?
ESP.TRADUIT: 老板已经杀了很多人。你觉得他能打败一个死亡爪吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11F] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don’t know, but I’m not gonna be the dumb shit who tells him he can’t.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，但我不会做那个说他做不到的傻逼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11E] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that all? The way people were crowding around, you'd think it was more than some plain old knife.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这些吗？看人们围过来的样子，你会觉得这可不只是一把普通的旧刀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11E] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it wasn't just any knife, dumbass. I made it from his bones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，它不仅仅只是一把普通的刀，蠢货。我用他的骨头制作了它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11F] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously. Hopefully the boss will have something for us soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说真的。希望老板很快就会给我们点事做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11E] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why wait? I say we go out there and raid a few towns, just for kicks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么要等？我说我们出去抢几个镇子，就当找点乐子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11F] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck that. I ain't following you anywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你妈的。我才不会跟着你去任何地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11E] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: And why the fuck not? I've done it before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的为什么不干？我以前就这么做过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11F] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's fine if you go out on your own. But orders come from the boss, and you ain't him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你自己出去没问题。但命令是老板下的，你又不是老板。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11E] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just cover the place in blood and guts, not this pussy ass spray paint shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要用血和内脏覆盖这个地方，而不是这种胆小鬼狗屎喷漆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11F] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You gotta kill a man to hang a man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得把人杀了才能把他吊起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11E] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've killed plenty. More than your slow ass. I can't figure out how you can have such a big gun and such a tiny little-
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了很多人。比你这慢吞吞的家伙多。我搞不明白你怎么能有这么大的枪，而有个这么小的-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11F] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, don't even go there. That ain't right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，别到那种程度。那不对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11E] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kill count. A tiny little kill count you dumb fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀人数。你这个傻逼只有很小的杀人数。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11F] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: That’s not their style. They attack things head on, and they never quit. So make sure you don’t either.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是他们的风格。他们直接进攻，永不放弃。所以确保你也不会放弃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : NCR Trooper [11007E9A] (mod) Quest : ([11006D09]x3DNPCCampMcCarran) Camp McCarran Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was that you were showing off the other day?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你那天炫耀的是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100A11E] (ID) Quest : ([1100A116]x3DNPCRaiders) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a riff on the cold spray you were working on previously. You know, the topical anesthetic?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是对你之前研究的冷喷雾的改进。你懂的，表面麻醉剂？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B288] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know the one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道那个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B289] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I was eating a particularly gamey iguana the other day, when I realized I could still feed myself and mitigate the unpleasant aftertaste by spraying the anesthetic on my tongue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我前几天吃了一只特别腥的鬣蜥，然后我意识到我可以在舌头上喷洒麻醉剂，以便仍然能够喂饱自己并减轻不愉快的余味。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B288] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: To be honest, that's not much of a breakthrough. You just took my spray and used it on your mouth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说实话，这并不算什么突破。你只是拿了我的喷雾喷在了你的嘴上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B289] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I did was increase our customer base. Not everyone is a wandering wastelander. But everyone eats, and the food we eat is terrible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做的是扩大我们的客户群体。并不是每个人都是漫游的废土游民。但每个人都会吃饭，而且我们食物很难吃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B288] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hm...I suppose you have a point. Although I never did figure out a way to make it less poisonous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...我想你说得有道理。虽然我从来没有想出过减轻它毒性的方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B289] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: What if they have more in common with people than crabs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果它们与人类更像，而不是泥沼蟹呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B288] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: My dog can stand on his hind legs. He also likes to sniff butts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的狗可以两条腿站立。它也喜欢闻屁股。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B289] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: But what about reports regarding Mirelurk Kings? They share much of the same physiological traits as humans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是关于泥沼蟹王的报告呢？它们和人类有许多相同的生理特征。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B288] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want my professional opinion, they're turtles. Giant, radioactive turtles. But I can't say for sure without examining one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想听我的专业意见，它们是乌龟。巨大的，放射性的乌龟。但我没有检查过，不能确定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B289] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'm not falling for that again. You'll have to catch your own dinner this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，我不会再上当了。这次你得自己捉晚餐了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B288] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm beginning to think the equipment in this lab is too contaminated to produce viable results.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我开始觉得这个实验室的设备太受污染了，无法产生可靠的结果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B289] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's probably because you use it as a kitchen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这可能是因为你把它当成了厨房。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B288] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bunsen burner does function well as a stove.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个酒精灯作为炉子还是很好用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B289] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: True...but then again, so does the actual stove.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错...但再说一次，真正的炉子也一样好用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Followers Doctor [1100B288] (mod) Quest : ([1100B28C]x3DNPCMormon) Scientists Scene EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: They always say that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们总是这么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE35] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because it's always true.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为这总是事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know, but that's why it’s not a big deal. Tell me when you have good news, and then I'll act surprised.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，但这就是为什么它不算什么大事。等你有好消息再告诉我，然后我会假装惊讶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE35] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if that's something to be proud of. It's like spilling a glass of wine, then patting yourself on the back after you clean up the mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道这是不是值得骄傲的事情。就像把一杯酒倒出来，然后在清理好后拍拍你自己的背。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE35] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might've been a good idea not to spill it in the first place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好一开始就不要倒出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE35] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you still mad about that? It slipped out of my hand, I swear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还在生我的气吗？我发誓是它从我手里滑出来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: And right onto my favorite blouse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后正好滑到我最喜欢的衬衫上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE35] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yet you still wear it all the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可你还总是是穿它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, just to shame you. It's your Scarlet letter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，就是为了羞辱你。它是你罪行的污点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE35] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd be all for it, provided we saved enough caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完全支持，只要我们能存足够的瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE35] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: We could borrow some from my Uncle, he's always willing to "lend" me some money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以找我叔叔借一些，他总是乐意“借”我一些钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd rather not owe your Uncle anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我宁愿不欠你叔叔任何东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE35] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you not hear the air quotes? When I say lend, I mean he's gonna give it to us, no strings attached.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没听见我说的引号吗？我说借的时候，我的意思是他会毫无条件地把钱给我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's always strings. You just can't see them pulling on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总是有条件的。只是你看不见它们在拉扯你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE35] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't the faintest idea. Nor do I care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一点都不知道。我也不在乎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE35] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, in that case, forget I even brought it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，要是那样，就当我提都没提过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: It isn't who I think it is, is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是我想的那个人，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE35] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought you didn't care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为你不在乎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, maybe I do care, just a smidge. Especially when it concerns that harlot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，也许我确实在乎，只是一点点。尤其是涉及那个荡妇的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE35] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh so she's a harlot now. Yesterday she was just a plain old liar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，所以现在她是个荡妇了。昨天她只是一个老骗子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's all of those things. And whatever she had to say, I guarantee you it's utter nonsense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她所有那些都是。不管她说了什么，我向你保证都是胡说八道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE35] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure about that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes. Now are you gonna tell me what she said or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。那你现在是要告诉我她说了什么还是不说？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE35] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. The other day she said you were the only person in this town we can trust.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。前几天她说你是这个镇上唯一值得信任的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. That's actually really kind. She really said that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦。那可太好了。她真的这么说了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE35] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, and you're right. It's complete and utter nonsense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你说得对。这完全是胡说八道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it true your Uncle is dating someone half his age?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你叔叔和一个比他年龄小一半的人约会，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE35] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: A third his age and half of ours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他年龄的三分之一，我们的二分之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't you think that’s scandalous?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不觉得那是丑闻吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE35] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: When it comes to what goes on in my uncle's bedroom, the less I think about it, the better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当涉及到我叔叔卧室里发生的事情时，我想得越少越好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sharecropper [1100BE34] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE39]x3DNPCSharecroppers) Raiders Scene EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't know. Supposedly people on the other side say chips are french fries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道。据说在另一边的人们称薯片为炸薯条。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE88] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: The other side? What, you mean hell?
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一边？什么，你是指地狱吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE87] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: The other side of the Atlantic. Not exactly hell, but from what I've heard, it's pretty damn close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大西洋的另一边。不完全是地狱，但据我所知，非常接近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE88] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Said he can't. He's going to the clinic to donate some blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说他不能。他要去诊所献一些血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE88] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's admirable. Never could do it myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那很令人钦佩。我自己从来做不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE87] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE88] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. I just can't imagine my blood swimming around in some other guy's dick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我就是无法想象我的血会在别人的老二里游泳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE87] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beer if you're lucky. Radiation most likely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你幸运的话是啤酒。最有可能的是辐射。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE88] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: It almost sounds like they're trying to kill us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这差不多听起来像是他们在试图把我们杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE87] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: And we're paying customers. Imagine what they'll do when we run out of caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而我们是付费顾客。想象一下要是我们没瓶盖了他们会做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE88] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe the alcohol here is watered down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许这里的酒精被稀释了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE88] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watered down whiskey should be a crime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 稀释了的威士忌应该是一种犯罪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE87] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need laws to have crime. Otherwise it's just a screw job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要法律才能有犯罪。否则就只是一场骗局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE88] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You notice the weather's getting a bit colder?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你注意到天气变得有点冷了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE88] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Colder? If anything, it's getting hotter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷了吗？如果有的变化的话，它反而变热了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE87] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: The weather, or the climate?
ESP.TRADUIT: 天气，还是气候？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE88] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there a difference?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有区别吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE87] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure. Weather's what we got now. Climate's what we’ve been getting now, later, and back then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。天气是我们现在的情况。气候是我们现在、将来和过去一直在经历的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE88] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I went outside yesterday, I went outside today, and I plan on going outside tomorrow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，昨天我出去了，今天我也出去了，我计划明天也要出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE87] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: And it seems to me that in this case, weather and climate is the same fucking thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这种情况下，天气和气候对我来说似乎是他妈的一回事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Boulder City Worker [1100BE87] (mod) Quest : ([1100BE8D]x3DNPCBCsaloon) BC Saloon EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: For one thing, I ain't got no chance of growing a fine looking mustache like that woman!
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，我不可能长出像那女人一样好看的胡子！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't we ask the bartender what she thinks?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我们不问问酒保她的想法呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember the time we took care of them Powder Gangers? Townsfolk showed real heart that day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还记得我们照顾那些火药帮的时候吗？镇上的居民那天表现得真是有血性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What time is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在几点了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: When's the last time you used a comb?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你上次用梳子是什么时候？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say up in Vegas they got all sorts of ladies. Even ghouls if you're into that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说在维加斯有各种各样的女人。如果你喜欢的话，甚至还有尸鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if it's morning, maybe we ought to drink coffee instead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，如果是早上，也许我们应该喝咖啡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it's time to go home Bill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想现在是回家的时候了，比尔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Frank [11000801] (mod) Quest : ([11000804]x3DNPCGoodsprings) Goodsprings Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure. I already let everyone know you aren't feral.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确定。我已经让大家知道你没发狂了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mercenary [1100CA96] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what about everyone else? It's a motel. Strangers are bound to come by.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那其他人呢？这是个汽车旅馆。肯定会有陌生人经过这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cafferty [1100CA98] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if they do, they'll come right through that door. That's where I'll be aiming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们来了，他们会直接通过那扇门。那就是我要瞄准的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mercenary [1100CA96] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought you'd be used to funny looks by now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为你现在应该习惯受到奇怪的眼神了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mercenary [1100CA96] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny as in "ha-ha," yeah. Funny as in "I look funny?" All the fucking time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇怪是指“哈哈”，是啊。奇怪是指“我看起来好笑吗？”整天都他妈的这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cafferty [1100CA98] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: So? Last time I checked you weren't gnawing on your toes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那又怎样？我上次检查的时候你没在咬自己的脚趾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mercenary [1100CA96] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: But what if they think I'm working for them? Like a spy or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果他们认为我是在为他们工作呢？像间谍什么的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cafferty [1100CA98] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're called feral ghouls for a reason, you paranoid loon. Espionage isn't exactly their strong point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们被称为狂尸鬼是有原因的，你这个偏执狂。间谍活动不是他们的强项。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mercenary [1100CA96] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You on chems again? No sane person, ghoul or otherwise, is living in that dump.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你又嗑嗨了吗？那个垃圾堆里没有正常人，不管是尸鬼还是其他什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mercenary [1100CA96] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Truth is, I used to be a thief. But the ranger who caught me had me guard a caravan as part of my parole. And I've been covering asses for a living ever since.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实是，我以前是个小偷。但是抓到我的游骑兵让我保护商队作为假释的一部分。从那时起，我就一直以保护别人的屁股为生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mercenary [1100CA96] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why? Is there something I should know about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么？有什么我应该知道的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mercenary [1100CA96] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, but you know if push comes to shove they're gonna think the ghoul did it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有，但你知道如果事态严重，他们会认为是尸鬼干的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cafferty [1100CA98] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let 'em. If they think you're out there, that means they won't be looking for you in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随他们去吧。如果他们认为你在外面，那意味着他们不会在这里找你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mercenary [1100CA96] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But "funny" as in "I'm gonna shoot you for shits and giggles?" Well, you give me that look, and I ain't laughing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但“奇怪”是指“我要开枪打死你只是为了好玩”？好吧，你用那种眼神看着我，我可不觉得好笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cafferty [1100CA98] (mod) Quest : ([1100CA9A]x3DNPCNovac) Brooks and Cafferty EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not just put it all on the roulette wheel? Might as well go out with a bang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不把一切都押在轮盘上？还不如大张旗鼓地结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDAB] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know, I'm tired of letting the house take my money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，我厌倦了让庄家拿走我的钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDA7] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, at least the house will buy you a drink before he fucks you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，至少庄家在搞你之前会给你买杯酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDAB] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I gotta disagree. Gomorrah gots the best talent in all of Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得不同意。蛾摩拉拥有整个维加斯最好的才艺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDAB] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, but you like them dirty. Me, I like them girls over at the Mormon Fort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，但你喜欢那些脏的。我的话，我喜欢摩门要塞的女孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDA7] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mean the doctors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说医生吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDAB] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, nothing hotter than a girl in a labcoat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，没有什么比穿着实验服的女孩更性感的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDA7] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你在这里干嘛？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDAB] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'm thinking of getting myself sick just so I have an excuse to visit the Fort. And who better to catch a disease from then a prostitute.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我在考虑让自己生病，这样我就有借口去摩门要塞了。还有什么比从妓女身上染上疾病更好的呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDA7] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you hear one of Tommy's cousins is a dancer here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说汤米的一个表亲在这里跳舞吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDAB] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Which Tommy? The one with a cleft lip?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哪个汤米？有唇裂的那个？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDA7] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, the one who joined the NCR. You know, Sadie's friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是，是加入了NCR的那个。你知道，是萨迪的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDAB] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, okay. I never met her cousin. Is she hot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，好的。我从来没见过她表亲。她漂亮吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDA7] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why haven't you haven't touched your drink?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么一口酒都没动？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDAB] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because we're in a casino-slash-brothel, and alcohol makes bad decisions sound like good ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我们在一个赌场兼妓院，酒精让坏决定听起来像是好决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDA7] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess that makes sense. Which reminds me, I should order another round.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这有道理。这倒提醒我了，我应该再点一轮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDAB] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why's that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDA7] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because I'm beginning to think it was a bad decision to invite you here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我开始觉得邀请你来这里是个坏决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDAB] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's handsome enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他够帅了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDAB] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDA6]x3DNPCGomorrah) Gomorrah Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nah, our luck's about to change. I can feel it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我们要转运了，我能感觉得到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDC] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: The last time you said that, we ended up sleeping on the sidewalk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上次你说过这话，我们最后是睡在人行道上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDF] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: No way. The way I see it, losing makes it all the more sweeter when you win. You'd probably get sick of playing if every hand was a blackjack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没门。我看，输了钱之后，赢的时候才更有滋味。如果每手都是黑杰克，你可能就会厌倦玩牌了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDC] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might get sick of playing cards, but I sure as hell won't get sick of the caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能会厌倦玩牌，但我绝对不会厌倦赢钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDF] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's etiquette.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是礼节。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDC] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: What you're doing goes beyond etiquette.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在做的可不只是礼节了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDF] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well that's because it's not just a tip. It's a tribute. I'm not just thanking the dealer. I'm thanking Lady Luck for the good fortune.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那是因为这不仅仅是小费，而这是一种贡品。我不仅是在感谢庄家，我也在感谢幸运女神赐予的好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDC] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds to me like a bribe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来像是贿赂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDF] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You say tomayto, I say to-mah-to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说是西红柿，我说是番茄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDC] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: And when she turns on you, what happens then? Does she give you a refund?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果她反过来对付你了，那又会怎样？她会退款吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDF] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, but if we treat her right, she might give us a warning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不会，但如果我们对她好一些，她可能会提个醒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDC] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't know. But there's a lot of different gods associated with luck. Some are men, some are women, and some are neither.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道。但跟好运相关的神有很多。有些是男神，有些是女神，有些都不是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDC] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, the way we're going, we're gonna need to pray to all of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，照我们现在的情况，我们可能需要祈祷所有的神了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDF] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell that to my chip stack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就对我的筹码堆说吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDC] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, it worked, didn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，它起作用了，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDC] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good results doesn't excuse bad process.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的结果并不能成为坏的过程的借口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDF] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: And it was the best sleep I had in years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，那可是我多年来睡得最香的一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [1100CDDC] (ID) Quest : ([1100CDDB]x3DNPCAtomic) AWrangler Generic Dialogue EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me more about the songs you perform.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我更多关于你表演的歌曲的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No one knows who wrote them. Seems to be to the case with a lot of Pre-War music.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人知道是谁写的。这似乎是很多前战音乐的情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: They get passed around like drinks at a bar, and all we have to do is take a sip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们像在酒吧里传递的饮料一样流传开来，我们要做的只是来一口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, most people don't mind the old stuff. But if you want me to play something new, well, first you'll have to point me to the bar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，大多数人不介意老的东西。但如果你想让我唱些新的，那么，首先你得告诉我酒吧在哪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Depends on what you mean by "new," but yeah sugar, I know of one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这取决于你说的“新”是什么意思，但是，亲爱的，我知道一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say in one of those vaults, they have a copy of a Pre-War song not even the Kings have heard of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说在那些避难所之一，有一首战前歌曲的副本，连猫王帮都没听过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Problem is, it's overrun with fiends. Charlie never bothered to put up the caps to find it, but if it's still there, maybe you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是，那里被恶魔帮占据了。查理从来没费心投入瓶盖去找它，但如果它还在那里，也许你可以找到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. Where can I find some new songs for you to play?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。我可以在哪里找到些新歌给你唱呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not every day I meet someone who can keep a promise. I'm impressed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是每天都遇到能够信守承诺的人。我印象深刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's just too bad you couldn't do the same for my cousin. Either way, I promised you a reward, so here. Courtesy of our new owner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只可惜你不能为我的表亲做同样的事情。不管怎样，我答应给你奖励，所以拿去吧。这是我们新老板的好意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, this next gift I'm about to give you is strictly from me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我要给你的下一个礼物纯粹是我自己的心意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got the song. Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到那首歌了。给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not every day I meet someone who can keep a promise. I'm impressed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是每天都遇到能够信守承诺的人。我印象深刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you probably want more than my respect sugar, so here. Your reward, courtesy of our new owner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过你想要的可能不仅仅是我的尊重，亲爱的，所以拿去吧。你的奖励，这是我们新老板的好意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, this next gift I'm about to give you is strictly from me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我要给你的下一个礼物纯粹是我自己的心意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carmen [11000807] (mod) Quest : ([11000809]x3DNPCCarmenDialogue) A Mourning Bird EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got the song. Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到那首歌了。给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do they call 'em "super" mutants? Where's the spandex? The capes? I say change the name to "big green guys who like to work out."
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么他们要称他们为“超级”变种人？弹性纤维在哪里？披风在哪里？我说就该把名字改成“喜欢锻炼的绿色大只佬”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Super mutants are tough sons of bitches. But you know who's tougher? The motherfucking planet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 超级变种人真是厉害的混蛋。但你知道谁更厉害吗？这颗他妈的星球。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can always tell how windy it is by how heavy the trash is that's floating around. I'd say today's wind is about napkin miles per hour.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你总能通过漂浮在空中的垃圾有多重来判断风有多大。我想今天的风速大约是餐巾纸级别的英里每小时。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some people make plans, and other people make goals. Me, I just try and make do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人制定计划，有些人设定目标。而我呢，只是尽量应付过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't seem like you ever get tired. Hope the same goes for getting tired of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来似乎从不感到疲倦。希望你也不会对我感到疲倦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear
