ESP.ORIGINAL: Raiders aren't known for their cleanliness. Throw a bar of soap at 'em and they'll scatter like its a grenade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 掠夺者以不爱干净闻名。丢块肥皂给他们，他们会像看到手榴弹一样四散逃开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks a lot for helping me out with that orchid business. Feels like a great big weight off my shoulders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常感谢你帮我解决了那件兰花的事。感觉肩上的大石头终于落地了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more bad thoughts, no more regrets. That's how I'm living from now on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有坏念头，没有遗憾。从现在开始，我要这样生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: The world seems bigger now that my vision's out the tunnel. I don't know which way to go, and that's just fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我的视野更开阔了，世界显得更大了。我不知道该往哪个方向走，但这也挺好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're gonna be mad as bees for helping me. Because I'm probably gonna be twice as chipper now than I ever was before!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你帮了我大忙，这会让你气得像蜜蜂一样。因为我可能会比以前更有活力两倍！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some days I feel like a bump on a log. Don't be afraid to cut me off if I slow you down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候我觉得自己像个榆木脑袋。如果我拖累了你，不要怕打断我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got the devil's luck partner, but sun don't shine on the same dog's tail all the time. Be careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搭档，你运气真好，但太阳不会总照在同一条狗的尾巴上。小心点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't let people tell you you don't got charisma. I can see it. It's just easier to let your weapon do the talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要让别人告诉你你没有魅力。我能看出来。只不过是让你的武器来说话更容易些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't have much charisma either as a kid. Don't worry about what people say, your smile still brightens my day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我小时候也没有多少魅力。别在意别人怎么说，你的笑容依然能让我开心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think I've ever met anyone so smart before. I mean, there was Al, but he was just smart enough to keep quiet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我从未见过像你这么聪明的人。我的意思，艾尔也很聪明，但他只聪明到知道保持安静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems like for us, a lucky break is like a butterfly. Nice to look at, hard to catch. But hard work will make up for lazy dice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我们来说，幸运就像蝴蝶。好看却难抓住。但努力工作会弥补懒散的运气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyone ever tell you you got a way with words? You could talk the claws off a...well, a deathclaw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人告诉过你，你很能说吗？你能把死亡爪的爪子说掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I suppose if you did that, there'd be nothing but death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我想，如果你真能做到，那死亡爪就只剩下死亡了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'd be nice if we had more clean water. But there's no use wanting, not out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们有更多干净的水就好了。但在这里，没必要去奢望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ma always said you can spit in one hand and want in the other, and you can pretty much guess which one will fill up first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈妈总是说，你可以往一只手上吐口水，另一只手上奢望，你大概能猜到哪只手会先满。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whenever Pa got to preaching too hard, Ma used to say "Put your prayers in one hand and your doo-doo in the other, and see which one fills up first."
ESP.TRADUIT: 每当爸爸布道太多时，妈妈常说：“把你的祈祷放在一只手里，把你的便便放在另一只手里，看哪只手先满。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But Pa always said, a miracle only has to happen once, and it'll fill you up higher than any mountain of you-know-what.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但爸爸总说，奇迹只需要发生一次，它会让你比任何一座你知道的山都高。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't nothing between us and the Lord than the clothes on our backs and the guns in our sacks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我们和上帝之间，只有身上的衣服和袋里的枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But then again, I ain't in no hurry to meet him. So let's keep our clothes on and our guns loaded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但话说回来，我不着急见他。所以让我们继续把衣服穿好，枪也上好膛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I first started traveling these wastes, I felt knee high to a grasshopper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚开始在这片废土上旅行时，我感觉自己像一只蚱蜢那么矮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose that don't mean the same nowadays. I reckon you'll find grasshoppers big as a wagon out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我想现在不一样了。我估计你会在这里找到像马车一样大的蚱蜢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well look at this place. NCR folks look about as happy as a puppy with two peters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看这地方。NCR的人看上去非常开心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't think we'll get a lick of work done today. Not in this place anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得今天我们可一点活都干不了。至少不在这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I gotta say you're pretty handy with a pistol. Best shot this side of the Mississippi. And probably the other side too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 得说你用手枪用得真是顺手。密西西比河这边最厉害的射手。说不定那边也一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last place I ever saw myself is a casino called Gomorrah. We're moving down in the world, and fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从未想过会来到一个名叫蛾摩拉的赌场。我们正在向世界的底层沉沦，而且速度很快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're pretty good with those terminals. My eyes hurt if I look at them for too long. Figured that was god's way of saying it wasn't for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对那些终端机很在行。我看久了眼睛就疼。我觉得那是上帝在告诉我它不适合我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know how you survive, given your luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到你的运气，我不知道你是怎么生存下来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly, your luck's so bad, you could fall into a barrel full of bosoms and come up sucking your thumb.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说真的，你的运气太差了，你能掉进一个满是乳房的桶里，还吸着你的大拇指冒出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But not everyone in life is lucky. Some people are just good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但生活中不是每个人都那么幸运。有些人只是很优秀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could go for some mashed taters tonight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我今晚想吃点土豆泥。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I had my druthers, I'd slather 'em up with gravy, get a side of corn bread, and some fried chicken too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我能选择，我要淋上肉汁，来一份玉米面包，再来些炸鸡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But seeing as this ain't a dream, I guess bug on a stick will have to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但既然这不是梦，我想只能吃点昆虫串了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feels like I've been chasing down old demons since the day I crawled out the womb.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感觉自己从出生那天起就一直在面对过去的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Want some advice? When the past calls don't answer. It ain't got nothing new to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想听点建议吗？当过去打来电话时别接。它没什么新东西好说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kids used to say my teeth were so bucked I was eating corn through a picket fence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小时候别人说我牙齿歪得吃玉米都得过个栅栏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But time passed, and those fence posts got closer. Kind of like you and me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但随着时间的推移，那些栅栏渐渐靠近了。有点像你和我之间的关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard folks on the strip were all gussied up like the girls in old magazines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说长街的人都打扮得像旧杂志里的女孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't think it was all below the neck though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我没想到都是在脖子以下打扮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like that you think on my level. Sometimes I wonder if you're a little slow, but then I do something stupid and I realize I ain't no different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢你能和我思维一致。有时候我会怀疑你有点迟钝，但然后我干了些蠢事，就明白我也没什么不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard people say you ain't that smart. Then why do they keep asking you for help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听人们说你不太聪明。那为什么他们老找你帮忙？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems like for us, a lucky break is like a butterfly. Nice to look at, hard to catch. But hard work will make up for lazy dice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我们来说，幸运就像蝴蝶。好看却难抓住。但努力工作会弥补懒散的运气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a lucky son of a gun, you know that? You could fall into a barrel full of moonshine and come up smelling like the sun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个幸运鬼啊哥们儿，你知道吗？你能掉进装满月光的桶里，然后冒出时身上散发着阳光的味道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, shut my mouth and whistle dixie. That's a purty view.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀，闭上我的嘴巴，吹起迪克西的口哨。那景色真漂亮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some say down south, you don't sweat. You glisten. Well, we're do a whole lot of glistening out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人说在南方，你不是在出汗，你是在闪闪发光。好吧，我们在这里闪闪发光得很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well butter my butt and call me a biscuit. Look at that view.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀，涂黄油在我的屁股上再叫我饼干吧。看那景色。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like to do things one at a time. Can't get caddywonked if you've got your head on straight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢一次做一件事。如果你头脑清醒，就不会被搞得一团糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Them yao guais really dill my pickle. They're big, mean, and don't even taste good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些妖怪真是让我火大。它们又大又凶，连味道都不好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice weapon you got there. That dog will hunt, sure as the sun'll come up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你手里的武器不错。那条狗肯定能打猎，就像太阳肯定会升起一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mine though, sometimes she can't piss out of a boot even if you ripped off the heels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而我的呢，有时候即使你把鞋跟都拔掉，她也不一定能尿到靴子里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I guess that's my fault more than the gun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我想那更多的是我的错，而不是枪的错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think Ma is the one who gave me the name. She loved to needle my Pa, and in the end she always got her way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是妈妈给我起的名字。她喜欢取笑爸爸，而且最后她总能得逞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes I wonder if it's wrong to hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时我在想希望是不是错了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't matter what you're hoping for. A better life, a cold beer, or a second chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你希望什么。更好的生活，一瓶冷啤酒，或者第二次机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some people say it takes real strength to let go. Others say you gotta keep holding on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人说需要真正的力量才能放手。也有人说你必须继续坚持。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. I just keep moving, and keep hoping that today's the day. Today I'm gonna make it right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我只是继续前进，继续希望今天会是那一天。今天我会做对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got any guilty pleasures? For me, it's gotta be Spring Valley Crisps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么内疚的快乐吗？对我来说，那得是春谷薯片。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I was young, I used to collect the little bar codes, so I could send 'em in for a moon map.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我年轻的时候，我常常收集小条码，这样我就能寄去换一张月球地图。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never got it though. I imagine these days Spring Valley's going through a nuclear winter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过从没收到过。我想现在春谷镇可能正经历着核冬天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once met a guy mad for bobble-heads. Would've traded a thousand caps for just one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 曾经遇到一个对摇头娃娃痴迷的家伙。愿意用一千个瓶盖就为了买一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought he was crazy. But damn if I ain't on the same wild goose chase.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得他疯了。但该死的，我不也是在做徒劳之举吗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever get so close to someone you start finishing each other's sandwiches?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有和某人亲密到开始替对方吃完三明治？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoops, I meant sentences, but now that I mention it, eating your friend's sandwich is pretty darn intimate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀，我就是说说，不过现在既然提到了，吃你朋友的三明治也确实挺亲密的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ma used to say a shotgun was like a sheriff's badge. It gives you authority.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈妈以前说，霰弹枪就像警长的徽章。它给你权威。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Folks have been dropping like bloatflies in these parts. But I got faith in the Lord he'll see us through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一带的人死得跟苍蝇一样。但我对上帝有信心，他会让我们挺过去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard them Brotherhood of Steel folks are more machine than men. Only god knows if they still have souls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说那些钢铁兄弟会的人更像机器而不是人。只有上帝知道他们还有没有灵魂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, the dirt around here might as well be a devil, the way it kicks up a storm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，这里的尘土简直像个恶魔，会掀起一阵风暴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I asked Al once what the difference is between ignorance and apathy. He says, "I don't know and I don't care."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经问艾尔，无知和冷漠有什么区别。他说：“我不知道，也不在乎。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: AI used to have dog named Miles. But he was too lazy to walk 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 艾尔以前养过一只叫迈尔斯的狗，但他太懒了，不愿意遛狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I ain't much for bar fights. Ma though, she once punched a guy so hard, he couldn't tell night from day on account of all the stars he was seeing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太喜欢酒吧斗殴。不过我妈妈，她曾经一拳打得一个人分不清昼夜，因为他只能看见满天的星星。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always wanted to grow up a southern belle. Problem is out here, the only thing you're gonna dress is a bullet wound.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我总想着长大后成为一个南方美女。问题是，在这里你唯一能装扮的就是枪伤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, the quieter it gets, the better we can hear. There ain't much in this world louder than silence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你懂的，越安静，我们就听得越清楚。世界上没有比寂静更响亮的声音了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some old crooner tried to hit on me once. Sweet fella but wouldn't take no for an answer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个老歌手曾经试图勾搭我。他人很好，但就是不肯接受我的拒绝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if he was high on chems or drunk on a dare, but he lost it in the end. The dare, and his lunch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道他是嗑嗨了还是打赌喝醉了，但最终他都输了。输了打赌，还有他的午饭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've been traveling for a while, haven't we? My soles are so worn not even Jesus can save 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们已经走了很久了，不是吗？我的鞋底都磨损得连耶稣也救不了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know I ain't as big and strong as most folks, but hopefully what I lack in strength I make up for in pep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我不像大多数人那样高大强壮，但希望我在力量上的不足能靠活力来弥补。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't never met a vault dweller before. Is it true they eat their own dead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 以前从没见过避难所居民。他们真的会吃死掉的人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say that's right but these days, who's to say what is?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那可不对，但在如今的世道，谁能说什么是对的呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always say treat people how you wanna be treated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我总是说，要以你想被对待的方式对待别人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So if the Enclave hates mutants, then I guess they want people to hate them too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以如果英克雷讨厌变种人，那我猜他们也希望人们也讨厌他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: A friend of mine used to lay a pile of caps outside the campfire at night. He said it was to ward off raiders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个朋友曾经晚上在营火旁放一堆瓶盖。他说这是为了防止掠夺者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I ask him, "How in Jesus' name are a dozen caps gonna stop a raider?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是我问他：“你是怎么想的，一打瓶盖怎么能阻止掠夺者呢？”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: And he says, "Because they can't count past eleven!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说：“因为他们数不过十一！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes you run so long, you forget what it is was chasing you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候你跑得太久，会忘记在追你的是什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I know what's after me. And the past'll catch up to me sooner or later, if I don't find a way to shake it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我知道是什么在追我。过去迟早会追上我，除非我找到甩掉它的方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pa always said I lacked direction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爸爸总是说我缺乏方向感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not sure if he was talking about my toes or my heart, but either way, I never could walk a straight line.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不确定他是指我的脚趾还是我的心，但不管是哪一种，我都从来没有走过直线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Be sure to stock up on RadAway. We're gonna need it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确保多备点辐特宁。我们会需要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the radiation gets bad, folks can be nuttier than a squirrel's you know what. So best to go in guns a' blazin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当辐射变得严重时，人们会变得比松鼠的某个部位还要疯狂。所以最好全副武装地进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lot more junk around here. Down south, it's almost like folks were never there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有很多垃圾。往南走，几乎就像从来没有人来过一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But every now and then you'll see something that'll remind of you that ain't so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但偶尔你会看到一些东西，让你觉得事实并非如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like a hat on a cactus. Or a car sticking out where there ain't no business being a road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比如仙人掌上的帽子，或者有汽车出现在不是道路的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's enough to make you wonder if it's all part of the plan. Maybe God just got tired of the fighting and grandstanding and being the big, bad lion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这足以让你怀疑这一切是否是计划的一部分。也许上帝厌倦了争斗和哗众取宠，厌倦了扮演大坏狮子的角色。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe he just wants to be a butterfly, dancing on the Texas wind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许他只想做一只蝴蝶，在德州的风中翩翩起舞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The more bad things people say, the uglier they look, and the uglier things get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们说的坏话越多，他们看起来就越丑，事情也变得越糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you say good things...well, you can just leave the makeup at home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你说好话...好吧，你就可以省掉化妆了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, it's hot as the devil out here. I'm fixed to empty my water into a tub and go skinny dip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，这里热得像地狱一样。我要把水倒进浴缸，然后裸泳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is browner than a Brahmin. And I ain't entirely sure it's dirt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方比双头牛还要褐色，而且我不确定这全是尘土。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish I could brag about the things we done, but it'd be like bragging about a silver medal in a two-man race.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我能夸夸我们做过的事情，但这就像在两人比赛里夸银牌一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Truth is, I ain't running fast. I'm just following your lead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，我跑得并不快。我只是在跟随你的脚步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just remember to keep Hope alive, haha. Aw come on, you don't think that was funny?
ESP.TRADUIT: 记得要让希望（霍普）永存，哈哈，哎呀，难道你不觉得这很好笑吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know sometimes I act like I ain't got no sense. Lucky for me, you got enough for the both of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道有时候我表现得像是没脑子。算我好运，你的脑子足够我们俩的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say if you wanna trap the devil, you just put a mirror on your porch. He can't help but stare at himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说如果你想抓住恶魔，只要在门廊上放一面镜子。他就会忍不住盯着自己看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need a knight in shining armor. A cowboy in a duster will do just fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不需要穿着闪耀盔甲的骑士。穿风衣的牛仔就够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need a knight in shining armor. A cowgirl in a duster will do just fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不需要穿着闪耀盔甲的骑士。穿风衣的女牛仔就够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, can you do me a favor and keep an eye on your Pip Boy? Just in case the radiation spikes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你能帮我个忙，留意一下你的哔哔小子吗？以防辐射激增。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope and faith will see you through. I guess all that's left now is to figure out who Faith is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望（霍普）和信念会带你度过难关。我想现在剩下的就是弄清楚谁是信念。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some folks will tell you "I was wrong." Others will tell you, "I'm willing to admit I was wrong."
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人会告诉你“我错了。”另一些人会说“我愿意承认我错了。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Way I see it, one's being humble. The other's just a pat on the back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我看来，一个是谦虚。另一个只是自我安慰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never was much for sightseeing. Best I go where you take me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从不太喜欢观光。最好还是跟着你走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if you noticed, but when I put on my boots, I always start with the left one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道你有没有注意到，我穿靴子时总是先穿左（Left）脚的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't have a good reason why, just feels right. Haha...no? Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有特别的理由，只是觉得这样是对的（Right）。哈哈...不好笑？抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pa always said you gotta keep the Lord in your heart and a smile in your mouth. Otherwise, it's just teeth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老爸总说你得把主放在心中，嘴角面带微笑。不然，那就只是把牙齿露了出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like getting into arguments. The tension makes the air so heavy it'll break your back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢争吵。紧张的气氛会让空气变得沉重，压得你喘不过气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like to keep a rabbit's foot in my pocket. They say it's good luck. Although I'm not sure the rabbit would agree.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢在口袋里放一只兔子脚。他们说这样会带来好运。虽然我不确定兔子同不同意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pa always said to kill 'em with kindness. Ma though, she preferred bullets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老爸总说要用善意征服他们。不过老妈更喜欢用子弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say spit three times and you ward off evil. Just watch where you aim. Don't wanna ward off your friends too!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说吐三次口水能驱邪。注意瞄准目标。别想把你的朋友也驱掉了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you're fixing to do, I'm with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你打算做什么，我都支持你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Better get the lanterns out, shadows are getting so long they're halfway to Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好把灯笼拿出来，影子变得那么长，已经快到维加斯的一半了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Getting dark out. But good Lord willing and the creek don't rise, we can make it to town by sundown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天快黑了。但愿上帝保佑一路顺风，我们可以在日落前到镇上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006AA3]aaaHopeIdleChatter) Hellos and Idles EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some people like to call vaults "tombs." So I guess that makes vault dwellers zombies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人喜欢把避难所叫做“坟墓”。所以我猜那让避难所居民变成了僵尸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You give a killer a stick of dynamite, chances are he'll throw it right back at you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你给杀手一根炸药，他很可能会扔回来给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, I doubt whoever gave the order caught any of the blowback. No, I'd bet my ass that guy got a promotion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我怀疑下达命令的人有没有遭到任何报复。不，我敢打赌那家伙得到了升职。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a Jackal gang hideout. It's customary in these parts to eat the vanquished. Not saying you should, but that'd be the polite thing to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个豺狼帮的藏身处。这地方有吃掉战败者的传统。不是说你应该那么做，但那是礼貌的做法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any store worth its balls keeps the guns behind the counter. Meaning that pea-shooter up front ain't worth shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何有点实力的商店都会把枪支放在柜台后面。也就是说，前面的那把小枪屁用都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes things in life get heavy, and you don't want to deal with it. I get it. But that's why god invented Buffout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候生活中的事情变得很沉重，你不想去处理。我明白。但这就是为什么上帝发明了壮大灵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever wake up and feel less than a one hundred percent? Makes me want to check all my fingers and my toes, make sure they're still there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有醒来时感觉状态不佳？让我想检查一下我的手指和脚趾，确保它们还在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Squirrel on a stick, iguana bits, human flesh. You know what they called that shit back in the day? Hot dogs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 棍子上的松鼠，蜥蜴肉，人肉。你知道以前人们叫那些玩意什么吗？热狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet your spirit animal is like a camel or some shit. Fuck man, your ass never gets tired.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢打赌你的精神动物是像骆驼之类的玩意。我操，你这家伙从不感到疲倦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best way to get in shape is to run like you got a Deathclaw chasing ya. Worst way? Find an actual Deathclaw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最好的健身方法是像被死亡爪追一样跑步。最坏的方法？遇到真的死亡爪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's got heartache by the number and cold sores on her lip, from sucking on the barrel of the big iron on his hip!
ESP.TRADUIT: 她的心碎了无数次，唇上还有唇疱疹，因为她舔了他臀部上的大枪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some days I drink so much I sweat vodka. So if you see me licking myself, that's why.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些日子我喝酒多得流汗都是伏特加。所以如果你看到我舔自己，就是这个原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew a guy who had a great idea for a restaurant. Sell the food cheap, charge a shitload for the Radaway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认识一个家伙，他有个开餐馆的好主意。食物卖得便宜，辐特宁卖得贼贵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had this dream about you. Fuck, you were doing some crazy shit. I almost feel like I need to apologize for thinking it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我梦到过你。操，你在做一些疯狂的事。我差点觉得要为想这些事情而道歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck, it's hot as balls out here. Whatever happened to the nuclear winter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 操，外面热得像火球。核冬天到底去哪了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a fucking sea of junk out here, with lots of places to hide. Better watch your step or something might drag you under.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是一片他妈的废品的海洋，到处都有藏身之处。小心点，不然可能会有什么东西把你拖下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Drugs, bugs, and hugs. Just another day in the wastes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毒品，虫子，拥抱。只是废土上的普通一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I almost drowned once in a tub of moonshine. But I drank my way out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我差点在一缸私酿酒里淹死。不过我喝光了才脱险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd kill for a beer right now. As in, I would literally put my hands on a stranger's throat and strangle them for some suds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我愿意为了一瓶啤酒杀人。真的，我会用手掐住陌生人的喉咙，掐死他们来换一瓶啤酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say cockroaches can survive anything, but in a race against time, my money's on InstaMash. That shit is built to last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说蟑螂能活过任何东西，但如果和时间赛跑，我押爽口土豆泥赢。那玩意经久耐用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, this place is crawling with ghouls. If it wasn't for bad luck, we woudn't have any luck at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，这地方爬满了尸鬼。如果不是坏运气，那我们根本就没有运气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it true that pouring vodka down your butt will get you drunk faster? I need to know for, y'know, science.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把伏特加倒进屁股里会醉得更快是真的吗？我需要知道，为了，呃，科学。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say I enjoy the city. There's just too much concrete. Any cowboy worth his shit prefers an open range.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能说我喜欢城市。水泥太多了。任何有点实力的牛仔都更喜欢空旷的草原。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "The future of America is big and bright and shaped like a mushroom!"
ESP.TRADUIT: “美国的未来大而光明，形状就像蘑菇云！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes I imagine aliens passing by our planet, saying shit like, "Can you believe people actually live in this dump?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时我想象外星人路过我们的星球时，说着这样的话：“你能相信人们居然住在这个破地方吗？”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Another thing about the name "super mutants." It sounds racist, no? Wait, let me think about this....Aw fuck it, I'm going with racist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说说“超级变种人”这个名字，听起来有点种族歧视，对吧？等一下，让我想想...算了，我还是觉得这就是种族歧视。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Psycho man, shit's a trip. Turns you into a fucking bullet sponge. Then you die of lead poisoning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 精神病人，真是个奇妙的玩意。让你变成一个他妈的子弹海绵。然后你会死于铅中毒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fighting with you really gets the blood pumping. Been a long time since my heart felt anything besides chems and cholesterol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和你一起战斗真的让人血脉喷张。好久没有感受到心脏除了毒品和胆固醇之外的任何东西了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The thing you have to realize about history is, it's always got a future. The past is a rough draft, waiting for the rewrite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须意识到关于历史的一点是，它总是有未来的。过去是一个粗略的草稿，等待着重写。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I love the radio. Who doesn't? But am I crazy or does "invisible music traveling hundreds of miles, right into your Pip-Boy" sound a little nutty?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢收音机。谁不喜欢呢？但我是不是疯了，或者“看不见的音乐穿越数百英里，直接到你的哔哔小子里”听起来有点疯狂？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some people say beer tastes better when it's been exposed to a little radiation. I think it has to do with how the hops make you stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些人说啤酒被辐射稍微照射过后味道会更好。我觉得这跟啤酒花让你变傻有关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Radiation's a bitch. Never know when you might wake up with an extra nipple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 辐射真是个婊子。你永远不知道什么时候会醒来时多了一个乳头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Opinions are like assholes. Everyone's got one and they ain't got but shit to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 意见就像屁眼。人人都有，但从它们里面出来的玩意都没什么用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: They say chems are a double-edged sword. Which means they're twice as good as regular ones.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说毒品是一把双刃剑。这意味着它们比普通的药品好两倍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking a chick with a mohawk is like fucking the world's loneliest porcupine. They got issues, and they damn sure got pricks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操一个莫霍克发型的小妞，就像操世界上最孤独的豪猪。他们有问题，而且绝对有刺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: At my age, it's a good idea idea to stretch before and after you try to suck your own dick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我这个年纪，尝试自我口交前后做点拉伸是个好主意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard that in the old world, octopuses were pretty smart. Probably why they turned them into robots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说在旧世界里，章鱼很聪明。这大概就是为什么他们把章鱼变成了机器人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some days life's a joke. Other days you're the punchline.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候生活是个笑话。其他时候你是笑点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The older people get, the shittier things seem. But the only thing that's changed is them. It's called novelty, friend. It always runs out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人年纪越大，事情看起来就越糟。但唯一改变的只有他们自己。这叫新奇感，朋友。它总会消失的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what I expected to see more of in the wastes? Baseball. All this open space and hardly anyone playing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道在废土里我本以为会看到更多的是什么吗？棒球。这么大的空地，而几乎没有人玩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit man, lot of clouds on this side of the world. Back west, you know what we call them fuckers? Endangered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，这边的云真多。在西边，你知道我们怎么称呼那些破玩意吗？濒危物种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think today was productive. We cleaned up a few streets, helped some needy kids, and planted a tree.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得今天很有成效。我们清理了几条街，帮助了一些贫困儿童，还种了一棵树。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh wait, that was some other guy. Don't worry, I shot him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦等等，那是另外的人。别担心，我把他给毙了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Stick the needle where the sun don't shine." That's an old voodoo proverb. I gotta try that the next time I shoot up. Right in the dick.
ESP.TRADUIT: “把针扎在阳光照不到的地方。”那是一个古老的巫毒谚语。下次打针时我得试试这个。直接扎在老二上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: A bounty hunter once told me there's two things you can't escape. Death and taxes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个赏金猎人曾经告诉我，有两件事你是逃不过的。死亡和税收。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why he always asked for receipts. Cause when you kill for a living, the bullets are tax deductible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么他总是要求字据的原因。因为当你以杀人为生，子弹是可以抵税的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Law and order is like that old Indian proverb. The enemy of my enemy is my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 法律与秩序就像那句古老的印度谚语。我敌人的敌人就是我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why he always asked for receipts. Cause when you kill for a living, the bullets are tax deductible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么他总是要求字据的原因。因为当你以杀人为生，子弹是可以抵税的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw a bunch of tap dancers in Vegas once. Always funnier if you imagine someone shooting at them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经在维加斯看到过一群踢踏舞者。如果你想象有人在朝他们开枪，总是更好笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw a bunch of tap dancers in Vegas once. Always funnier if you imagine someone shooting at them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经在维加斯看到过一群踢踏舞者。如果你想象有人在朝他们开枪，总是更好笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever laugh so hard you shit yourself? Not saying I have, just saying some chems should come with a warning label.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有笑得太厉害以至于拉裤子过？我不是说我有过，只是说有些毒品应该带个警告标签。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Desperate times call for desperate actions. But it ain't your brain making that call. It's your balls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常时期需要非常行动。但做出决定的不是你的脑子，而是你的胆量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck, what time is it? It's so hot I don't know whether to scratch my canteen or drink my ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操，现在几点了？热得我不知道是该挠水壶还是喝自己的屁股。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every day the world keeps spinning, and karma right along with it. Two to tango? Shit, try two billion. That's how many people are doing this dance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每天世界都在转动，因果报应也在一起转动。要两个人跳探戈？妈的，试试二十亿人吧。这就是在跳这支舞的人数。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're all guilty of something, and in the end, everyone gets caught. But with karma, you don't always know it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都有一些罪，在最后，每个人都会被抓到。但对于因果报应来说，你不一定总是知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Today's weird is tomorrow's norm. So we're not freaks, buckaroo, we're just ahead of the curve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天的怪异就是明天的常态。所以我们不是怪胎，哥们儿，我们只是领先一步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: One thing I've learned during my time in the wastes - the truth is never told sober.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在废土里，我学到了一件事 - 真相永远不会在清醒时被说出。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crazy is like a drum, banging the inside of your skull. So the psycho with the lead pipe? He's not trying to beat you, he's trying to communicate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 疯狂就像一个鼓，在你头骨里敲打。所以那个拿着铅管的疯子？他不是想打你，他是想和你交流。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, I gotta piss so bad my eyeballs are treading water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我得尿尿了，我眼珠子都在冒水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might want to slow down the pace, bucko. We're moving faster than a knife fight in a closet. And my lungs aren't built for speed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能你要放慢点速度，老兄。我们移动得比衣柜里的刀战还快。我这肺不适合快速运动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes things in life get heavy, and you don't want to deal with it. I get it. But that's why god invented Buffout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候生活中的事情变得很沉重，你不想去处理。我明白。但这就是为什么上帝发明了壮大灵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever been to the shore? Strange things wash up from time to time. Sorry about that, most of that shit is mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去过海岸吗？时不时会有奇怪的东西被冲上岸。抱歉，大多数玩意都是我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: An old Chinese proverb says "God helps those who help themselves."
ESP.TRADUIT: 一句古老的中国谚语说：“自助者天助之。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'll just help myself to some chems, thank you very much. And if we don't reach nirvana by nightfall, maybe God can take care of the rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那我就自助点毒品，非常感谢。如果到晚上我们还没达到涅槃，也许天会处理剩下的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You turn your back on a man, he might stab you in the gut, sure...but he also might pat you on the shoulder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你背对着一个人，他可能会捅你肚子，当然，但他也可能会拍拍你的肩膀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You turn your back on a chem, and it's up your ass and gnawing on your organs in two seconds flat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你背对着一个毒品，那它可能会立刻钻进你的屁股，啃咬你的器官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that's why God invented the donor system. Just let me know if you kill a raider who's my blood type.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这就是为什么上帝发明了供体系统。如果你杀了一个我的血型的掠夺者，就告诉我一声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's an old Chinese proverb, "When one door closes another opens."
ESP.TRADUIT: 有句古老的中国谚语说：“天无绝人之路。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: East or west, north or south...it's all one big merry-go-round.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管是东南西北...这一切都像个巨大的旋转木马。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In baseball, if someone fucks up real bad they call him a goat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在棒球里，如果有人真的搞得很砸，他们会称他为山羊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it goat fucks up real bad, what do you call him? You can't call him a goat. That's not an insult, it's a fact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果一只山羊搞砸了，你叫它什么？你不能叫它山羊。那不是侮辱，那是事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like targeting systems. It's like gambling with your aim, and I ain't much of a diceman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢瞄准系统。这就像用你的瞄准来赌博，而我不是个喜欢赌的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: One minute you're Doc Holliday, ass-fucking mosquitoes with your bullets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时你是霍利戴医生，用子弹干掉蚊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: The next you're a dumb, blinking gecko, staring down the throat of a deathclaw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来你就变成了一只愚蠢、眨着眼的蜥蜴，盯着死亡爪的喉咙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chems are a bonding force. They're the universal language, spoken by people of all creeds and color.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毒品是一种结合力。它们是一种通用语言，被所有信仰和肤色的人说着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't matter who you are, or where you're from. When the words travel through our bloodstreams we know each other as kin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你是谁，来自哪里。当这些词语穿过我们的血液时，我们就会彼此视为亲人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lady luck is a harsh mistress, my friend. She'll kiss you at the altar, and the next thing you know, she's got the house and the kids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 幸运女神是一位无情的情人，我的朋友。她会在祭坛上亲吻你，接下来你就知道，她已经有了房子和孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Karma doesn't make any promises. It doesn't deal with lawyers. It's cold, hard math. Now that's something I can believe in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因果不做任何承诺。它不与律师打交道。它是冰冷的、严酷的数学。现在这是我可以相信的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know how fucked up this country is? We once elected a guy named "Dick Richardson" President.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这个国家有多混乱吗？我们曾经选举了一个叫做“迪克·理查森”的家伙当总统。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right, the guy's name was literally "Penis Cockboy" and we thought he'd make a good leader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，那家伙的名字就是“阴茎·鸡巴男孩”，而且我们竟然觉得他会是个好的领导者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's another idea I pulled out from the anus homeworld. Solar-powered sunglasses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里还有个我从肛门家园想到的主意。太阳能墨镜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right, the guy's name was literally "Penis Cockboy" and we thought he'd make a good leader.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，那家伙的名字就是“阴茎·鸡巴男孩”，而且我们竟然觉得他会是个好的领导者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes I like to repeat myself. That's no accident. That's the circle at work, amigo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候我喜欢重复自己。这不是意外。这是循环在起作用，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's either the circle or brain damage. That's what happens when your brain goes pop. Sometimes you like to repeat yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，要么是循环，要么是脑损伤。这就是当你的大脑崩溃时发生的事情。有时候你会喜欢重复自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think today was productive. We cleaned up a few streets, helped some needy kids, and planted a tree.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得今天很有成效。我们清理了几条街，帮助了一些贫困儿童，还种了一棵树。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh wait, that was some other guy. Don't worry, I shot him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦等等，那是另外的人。别担心，我把他给毙了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101348A]vvVincentRandomIdles) Vincent's Randomised Chatter EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahh that's better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，感觉好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11015135]VincentHealingQuest) Vincent's Auto-Heal EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, that needle hurts!
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，那根针好痛啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11015135]VincentHealingQuest) Vincent's Auto-Heal EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legs, arms, vodka bottle...yeah, all there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 腿、胳膊、伏特加酒瓶...是啊，都在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11015135]VincentHealingQuest) Vincent's Auto-Heal EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something I can help you with, senorita?
ESP.TRADUIT: 需要我帮忙吗，小姐？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, your name Gomez?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，你叫戈麦斯吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Depends who's asking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要看是谁在问了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we ain't hear to cause trouble. A friend of mine told me you might know about this plant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我们不是来惹麻烦的。我的一个朋友告诉我你可能知道这种植物的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must have me mistaken for a gardener. I know nothing of the sort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定把我错认成园丁了。我不知道这种东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, they say this plant's different. The way I hear it, it was born from a nuke, like a seed planted right in the ground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，他们说这种植物不同。我听说的是，它是从一个核爆中诞生的，就像一颗种子种在地里一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't say. In that case, maybe I do know something. As for what I say, well, again...it depends on who's asking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗。那样的话，也许我确实知道一些。至于我会说什么，嗯，还是一样...得看是谁在问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是这样吗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, usually I don't know shit from Sherlock, but I make it my business to know what puts caps in my pocket.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，通常我对这种事一窍不通，但我知道什么能让我的钱包鼓起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, if it's a plant you want, you're in the wrong place and the wrong time. There's nothing growing out there but poison.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，如果你要的是植物，那你来错地方也来错时候了。那里只有毒草在长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: They call it the "Rising Angel." Petals as white as wings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们叫它“升天使”。花瓣白得像翅膀一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So yeah, that's what I know. As for what I say, well, again...it depends on who's asking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以是啊，那就是我知道的。至于我会说什么，嗯，还是一样...得看是谁在问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it helps, we ain't in it for profit. I just wanna help a sick friend, is all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有帮助的话，我们不是为了利益。我只是想帮一个生病的朋友，仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't give a shit what your goals are. You can't tug on my heart strings and expect to hear a song.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不在乎你们的目的是什么。你不能拽我的心弦然后就期望听到一首歌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you're sure we'll find it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你确定我们能找到它吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [300 Caps] I've got the caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: [300瓶盖] 我有瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like you're a little short, amigo. Come back when you got the caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你手头有点紧，朋友。等你有瓶盖了再来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pleasure doing business with you. I'll show you on your gadget where you can find it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴跟你做生意。我会在你的装置上标出能找到它的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You heard wrong though. That field of orchids? It's not growing in a cave. It's in a vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过你听错了。那片兰花田？它没长在山洞里。它在一个避难所里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: And from what I hear, that place is hairier than a yao guai's culo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而据我听说，那地方比妖怪的屁股还要棘手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: But at least that means you'll be the only one there to see your angel bloom.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但至少这意味着你会是唯一一个在那里看到你的天使开花的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Three hundred ought to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。三百应该够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or I could just beat the shit out of you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者我可以把你打得屁滚尿流。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do it that way, there's no telling where I send you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你那样做，我可不知道会把你送去哪儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if I give you a receipt, then you might wanna do business again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果我给你一张字据，那你可能会想要再做一次生意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, no deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，不成交。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sad to hear it. But I reckon your lady friend will be even sadder when you tell her the news.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听到这消息我感到很难过。但我想当你告诉你的女性朋友这个消息时，她会更加难过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't make guarantees in this business, senorita.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种生意不能作保证，小姐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Especially since I heard the radiation in those vaults fucks with your head. Almost makes you wish you were a ghoul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尤其是我听说那些避难所里的辐射会搞乱你的大脑。差不多会让你希望自己是个尸鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we only need one, so it shouldn't be a problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我们只需要一个，所以不应该是个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you can never take just one. But that might be the wiser course of action.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，你永远不能只要一个。但这可能是更明智的做法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now if you'll excuse me, I must get back to my meal. I'd wish you luck, but the truth is, I just don't care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在请原谅我，我得回去吃我的饭了。我希望祝你好运，但事实是，我只是不在乎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gomez [11001379] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're safe. You got radiation sickness. I had to carry you out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们安全了。你得了辐射病。我不得不把你抱出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I'm sorry. Kind of went in there without thinking, didn't I.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我很抱歉。我有点想都没想就进去了，对吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if the good Lord hadn't brought you beside me, I'd probably be up there with Pa and the angels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不是上帝把你带到我身边，我大概就会和爸爸还有天使们一起在上面了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: A doctor's office. How else was I going to save your life?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个医生的办公室。不然我还能怎么救你命呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I certainly feel sick. Not sure if it's from the rads or the chems. But I appreciate what you did all the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我确实感觉不舒服。不知道是因为辐射还是化学品。但我还是很感激你所做的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it weren't for you, I'd probably be up there with Pa and the angels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不是因为你，我大概就和爸爸还有天使们在一起了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's too bad about the orchid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兰花的事情太可惜了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. I guess there was no saving it and me. I was supposed to be the one to save her, and I just got in the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊。我猜我和它都救不了她了。我本该是去救她的，可我却挡住了路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if I haven't found it by now, well...Cole's wife ain't got much of a chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我现在还没找到，那么...科尔的妻子就没什么机会了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you remember what happened in the vault?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还记得避难所里发生了什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really. Just a feeling. Like everything got warm, and then there was a light.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算不上记得。只是一种感觉。好像一切都变暖了，然后出现了一道光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thought for a second it was the sun over them pearly gates, but it turns out it was just a regular old bulb.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我起初以为那是天堂之门上方的太阳，但后来发现那只不过是一个普通的灯泡而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because if this is heaven, Pa has got some explaining to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为如果这是天堂，爸爸就必须做点解释了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you going to be all right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会没事的吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's strange but...I think I am. When I woke up, part of me knew she was gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很奇怪，但...我觉得是的。当我醒来时，我的一部分意识到她已经走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: And to be honest...I don't know how I should feel about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说实话...我不知道我应该对此有何感受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: All this time I just thought if I kept hoping, she'd be all right in the end. And maybe in some strange way...she is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直以为只要我继续抱有希望，她最终会没事的。也许从某种奇怪的角度来说...她确实没事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: If what you say about this illness is true, then she probably never did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你说的这种疾病是真的，那她可能从来就没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate to say it but...you're actually right. She wasn't long for this earth, and there ain't much hope in thinking she was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想说，但是...你说得对。她命不久矣，抱有希望也没太大意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, don't make sense trying to save a dying flower and toss all your seeds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说，尝试拯救一朵垂死的花然后扔掉所有的种子也毫无道理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess what I'm trying to say is, I ain't doing nothing if it means putting you in harm's way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我要表达的是，如果会让你置身于危险之中的话，我什么都不愿意做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think she's still alive after all this time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得她经过这么长时间还活着吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. I reckon not. I was trying to tell myself otherwise, but deep down, I felt it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。我想不会。我曾试图告诉自己不是这样，但内心深处，我感觉到了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, don't make sense trying to save a dying flower and toss all your seeds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说，尝试拯救一朵垂死的花然后扔掉所有的种子也毫无道理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess what I'm trying to say is, I ain't doing nothing if it means putting you in harm's way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我要表达的是，如果会让你置身于危险之中的话，我什么都不愿意做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: You loved him, didn't you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你爱过他，对吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, it's not like that at all. I couldn't see it then but...it was just the guilt that drove me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，并不是那样的。我当时没有意识到这一点，但...只是罪恶感在驱使着我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like someone painted the perfect couple and I threw mud on the whole thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像有人画了一对完美的夫妇，而我却往整幅画上扔了泥巴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was just trying to clean up, and I ended up making it worse. For them, and for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是尝试清理一下，结果却把情况弄得更糟。对他们和我们都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to Cole's wife was never your fault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 科尔的妻子身上发生的事从来都不是你的错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what, you're right. If I could really make folks ill just by wishing it, then I'd be the devil herself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，你说得对。如果我真的可以通过希望让人生病，那我就是她魔鬼本人了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plus that'd make you her accomplice, and that I can't abide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且那会让你成为她的同谋，这我不能容忍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, don't make sense trying to save a dying flower and toss all your seeds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再说，尝试拯救一朵垂死的花然后扔掉所有的种子也毫无道理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess what I'm trying to say is, I ain't doing nothing if it means putting you in harm's way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我要表达的是，如果会让你置身于危险之中的话，我什么都不愿意做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem comfortable with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你似乎对这很自在。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think so? Well, point is, she's at peace, and so am I.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也认为吗？嗯，重点是，她已经得到了安宁，而我也是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you want to go and pay your respects?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想去致哀吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll say a prayer, but I don't think I'm invited to any funeral. It's probably better this way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会祈祷，但我想我不会被邀请参加任何葬礼。这样也许更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I hope you'll ready to travel some more. There's still a lot that needs to be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我希望你已经准备好继续旅行了。还有很多事情要做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looking forward to it. And I mean that. I think I finally got my head on straight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常期待。我是认真的。我觉得我终于想通了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean, a test of faith?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的信仰的考验是什么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It all makes sense now. This is why the thing with Cole happened, why his wife got ill, and why I can't get over the guilt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在一切都说得通了。这就是为什么与科尔的事情发生了，为什么他的妻子生病了，还有为什么我无法摆脱罪恶感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was all so I could give my life to save hers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切都是为了能够献出我的生命来拯救她的生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: No more Bible shit, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再说圣经的废话了，拜托了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, just one more time, actually. See, it all makes sense now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，实际上，只会再说一次了。看，现在一切都说得通了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is why the thing with Cole happened, why his wife got ill, and why I can't get over the guilt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么与科尔的事情发生了，为什么他的妻子生病了，以及为什么我无法摆脱内疚感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was all so I could give my life to save hers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一切都是为了能够献出我的生命来拯救她的生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you gonna be all right in there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在那里面还好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. Maybe. I don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊。也许吧。我不清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess it doesn't matter at this point. As far as I'm concerned, this is a test of faith.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想现在这已经不重要了。对我来说，这是一次信仰的考验。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: "When you go through rivers, they won't sweep you away. When you walk through fire, you can't be burned."
ESP.TRADUIT: “你趟过江河，水必不漫过你。你从火中行过，必不被烧。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me go in there. You stay here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我进去。你留在这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, but I can't let you do this for me. This is a test of faith, and I have to see it through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，但我不能让你为我这么做。这是一次信仰的考验，我必须坚持到底。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: "When you go through rivers, they won't sweep you away. When you walk through fire, you can't be burned."
ESP.TRADUIT: “你趟过江河，水必不漫过你。你从火中行过，必不被烧。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: A lot of gangs out here in the wastes. I once tried to start my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 废土里有很多帮派。我曾经尝试过自己创立一个帮派。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you can't have a gang without matching uniforms. That's just basic gang fundamentals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是没有统一的制服，就无法组成帮派。这就是帮派的基本原则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It says the orchid's in the back planter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上面写着兰花在后花园。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No surprise there. My bet is they keep it as far away as possible on account of all the radiation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不足为奇。我敢打赌，考虑到所有的辐射，他们会把它放得尽可能远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: But right now I could walk through a mushroom cloud and still feel blessed to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但现在我可以穿过蘑菇云，而且仍然感到很幸运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think it's on a different level. Let's go back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得是在另一层。我们回去吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Well, we should still check the lower level out, just in case.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？好吧，我们还是应该检查一下下一层，以防万一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm guessing it's heavy on the radiation. That explains the meds and the suits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜辐射应该很严重。这解释了药物和防护服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've found it, but it's too dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了，但太危险了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I appreciate the concern. But it's not my life that's important here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我感谢你的关心。但在这里重要的不是我的生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck if I know. I can't read.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操，我不知道。我看不清。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh come on, you mean you just stared at that thing for that long looking at the colors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，得了吧，你的意思是你只是盯着那个东西看了那么久，就看着它的颜色？
