ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I was looking over your shoulder, and it looks like that's our orchid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我通过你的肩膀看到了，看来那就是我们的兰花。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurt my eyes doing it, but I imagine the radiation's gonna hurt a whole lot worse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样做会伤害我的眼睛，但我想辐射会伤害得更重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have to do this. We can turn back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没必要这样做。我们可以回去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, don't you see? This is a test of faith.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你没看出来吗？这是信仰的考验。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: "When you go through rivers, they won't sweep you away. When you walk through fire, you can't be burned."
ESP.TRADUIT: “你趟过江河，水必不漫过你。你从火中行过，必不被烧。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是告别。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe, maybe not. It's all in the Lord's hands now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是，也许不是。这一切都在上帝的手中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if this is goodbye, I just wanna say I'm glad you were the one to take me this far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果这是告别，我只想说，我很高兴是你陪我走到这一步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I was tired you picked me up. When I was ready to give up, you gave me a good kick in the rear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我疲惫时，你把我扶了起来。当我准备放弃时，你促使我振作了起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess what I'm saying is, I traveled a long road to get to this point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我要说的是，我走了很长的路才到达这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if I had to walk it all over again, it'd be worth it if I could walk it with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我必须重新走一遍，只要能和你一起走，这一切都是值得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem determined to go through with this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你下定决心要把这件事坚持下去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am. But before I go, I just wanna say I'm glad you were here to take me this far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。但在我离开之前，我只想说我很高兴你能在这里陪我走到这一步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I was tired you picked me up. When I was ready to give up, you gave me a good kick in the rear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我疲惫时，你把我扶了起来。当我准备放弃时，你促使我振作了起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess what I'm saying is, I traveled a long road to get to this point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我要说的是，我走了很长的路才到达这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if I had to walk it all over again, it'd be worth it if I could walk it with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我必须重新走一遍，只要能和你一起走，这一切都是值得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just remember to put on a radiation suit. There's one right over there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是记得穿上防辐射服。那边有一件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't need it. Whether he wants me here or somewhere else, I put my faith in the Lord.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不需要。无论他想让我在哪里，我都相信上帝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies

ESP.ORIGINAL: But before I go, I just wanna say I'm glad you were the one to take me this far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但在离开之前，我只想说我很高兴是你陪我走到这一步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I was tired you picked me up. When I was ready to give up, you gave me a good kick in the rear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我疲惫时，你把我扶了起来。当我准备放弃时，你促使我振作了起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess what I'm saying is, I traveled a long road to get to this point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我要说的是，我走了很长的路才到达这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if I had to walk it all over again, it'd be worth it if I could walk it with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我必须重新走一遍，只要能和你一起走，这一切都是值得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What isn't over?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么还没结束？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your life. Your purpose. Your raison d'etre.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的生命。你的目标。你的存在意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now as for your wild goose chase, that I'm afraid is over. The woman you're trying to save, I'm afraid she didn't make it. Passed away two hours ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于你那无谓的追寻，我恐怕已经结束了。你试图拯救的那个女人，我恐怕她没能挺过去。两个小时前去世了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it helps, she went in peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这能让你感到好受一点，她走得很安详。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It never is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 永远不会结束。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You make it sound like a death sentence. But living on this rock is more like life without parole. Might as well make the best of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把这说得像是一场死刑。但生活在这片土地上更像是无期徒刑。不如尽力而为吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now as for your wild goose chase, that I'm afraid is over. The woman you're trying to save, I'm afraid she didn't make it. Passed away two hours ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于你那无谓的追寻，我恐怕已经结束了。你试图拯救的那个女人，我恐怕她没能挺过去。两个小时前去世了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it helps, she went in peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这能让你感到好受一点，她走得很安详。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave me alone, stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离我远点，陌生人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You remind me of a ghoul I used to know. Her only companion was a flask of vodka. But I'm all out of liquor, and so my words will have to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让我想起一个我曾经认识的尸鬼。她唯一的伴侣是一瓶伏特加。但我已经没有酒了，只能用我的话语来代替。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now as for your wild goose chase, that I'm afraid is over. The woman you're trying to save, I'm afraid she didn't make it. Passed away two hours ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于你那无谓的追寻，我恐怕已经结束了。你试图拯救的那个女人，我恐怕她没能挺过去。两个小时前去世了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it helps, she went in peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这能让你感到好受一点，她走得很安详。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't the slightest clue what you mean so I'll just nod my head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一点也不明白你在说什么，所以我只会点头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And yet to nod your head you'd first have to lift it. Problem is, all the weight in your skull keeps it pointed to the ground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而要点头你得先抬起头。问题是，你头骨里的全部重量让它始终指向地面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now as for your wild goose chase, that I'm afraid is over. The woman you're trying to save, I'm afraid she didn't make it. Passed away two hours ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于你那无谓的追寻，我恐怕已经结束了。你试图拯救的那个女人，我恐怕她没能挺过去。两个小时前去世了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it helps, she went in peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这能让你感到好受一点，她走得很安详。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where am I? What is this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哪？这是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well it can't be heaven, because the damn jukebox keeps eating all my coins...son of a gun is as hungry as a molerat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这不可能是天堂，因为这该死的点唱机一直在吞掉我所有的硬币...这狗娘养的就像鼹鼠一样饥饿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you know Cole's wife is dead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么知道科尔的妻子已经死了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because I saw her go past the gates about twenty minutes ago. Kept my eye on that one, seeing as she meant so much to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为大约二十分钟前我看着她走过大门。我一直关注着她，因为她对你来说很重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to the orchid?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那朵兰花怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your friend, the courier, she made a choice. Get that fool's orchid, or save a friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的朋友，那个邮差，她做了一个选择。是去拿那朵愚人兰，还是去救一个朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like to think she chose wisely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想她的选择是明智的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your friend, the courier, he made a choice. Get that fool's orchid, or save a friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的朋友，那个邮差，他做了一个选择。是去拿那朵愚人兰，还是去救一个朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like to think he chose wisely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想他的选择是明智的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's Hope?
ESP.TRADUIT: 霍普在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right where you left it I imagine. It's just hard to see under all that mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想它就在你放它的地方。只是在那片混乱之下很难看清。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: But it's there, darling. It always has been. Right under your nose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是亲爱的，它一直都在那儿。就在你的眼皮底下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, it was never your fault that woman got ill. And I ain't sure she'd even want your help if you gave it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，那个女人生病不是你的错。我甚至不确定她是否会希望你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've told you before, the past is a wagon that ain't got no wheels. You show up after all this time, and all three of you will be dragging it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我之前告诉过你，过去就像一辆没有车轮的马车。经过这么长时间，你才出现，你们三人都将被它拖住。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean by that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你那是什??么意思？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, eventually I just gave up on trying to go to sleep. Figured you were gonna wake me up anyway, so what was the point?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，最后我只是放弃了入睡的尝试。想着反正你总会把我叫醒，那还有什么意义呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only that night you were as quiet as a tumbleweed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有那个晚上你像个风滚草一样安静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I remember holding you in my arms, the both of us tired and hungry, not knowing whether me or my marriage would last the night.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得我把你抱在怀里，我们俩都又累又饿，不知道是我还是我的婚姻能否度过那个夜晚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: And then I looked into your eyes and thought to myself, this child right here is where all my hope lies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我看着你的眼睛，心里想着，这个孩子就是我所有希望的存在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's right hon. Your name doesn't mean hope don't exist. It means hope lies within.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，亲爱的。你的名字并不意味着希望不存在。它意味着希望存在于内心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So how did you come up with the name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你是怎么想到这个名字的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What just happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 刚才发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, from the looks of it, you passed out in some godforsaken vault. But, despite you being here, I reckon it's not quite over yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，看起来，你晕倒在了某个被遗忘的避难所里。但是，尽管你在这里，我觉得这还没完。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: That woman didn't deserve the pain I gave her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个女人不应该承受我给她的痛苦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jesus God almighty Hope, you've always been a stubborn one. It's why your name's such a good fit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 全能的上帝啊，霍普，你总是个顽固的家伙。这就是为什么你的名字如此合适。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, this may surprise you, but it wasn't your mother that picked it, although she did have a hoot saying it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，这可能会让你吃惊，尽管她确实有过这样的说法，但它并不是你母亲选的，
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you've mistaken me for someone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你把我错认成别人了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I think I know you better than you know yourself. Of course, foolishness has always run on your mother's side of the family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我想我比你更了解你自己。当然，愚蠢总是在你母亲那边的家族里流传。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although granted, it wasn't her that picked your name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管这是理所当然的，但你的名字并不是她选的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where does the name "Hope Lies" come from?
ESP.TRADUIT: “霍普莱斯”这名字是从哪来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, around the time you were born, your mother and I were having difficulties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，在你出生的时候，你妈妈和我遇到了一些困难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We couldn't agree on anything, let alone a name. So for about a month you were just "our crying child."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们什么都无法达成一致，更别提名字了。所以大约有一个月，你只是“我们哭闹的孩子”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: And boy, could you cry. I had to get my shuteye during the day, because every night you'd let out one hell of a storm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，你真能哭。我得在白天休息，因为每天晚上你都会闹得天翻地覆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your mother of course slept right through it, so it was up to me to calm you down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，你妈妈在整个过程中都在睡觉，所以得让我来让你平静下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: She sounds like a real pain in the ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她听起来确实很让人讨厌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: At times. But she was a tough son of a gun, and I couldn't have raised you without her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候是。但她是个顽强的家伙，没有她，我不可能能把你抚养长大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you did it, like any father would.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你做到了，就像任何父亲都会做的那样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha, I did. Looking back on it now, those days were priceless. And I'm grateful I didn't sleep through 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，我做到了。现在回想起来，那些日子是无价的。我很庆幸我没有把它们睡过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's mom all right. But a raider comes within one hundred feet and she'd spring right up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是妈妈。但是只要有一个掠夺者靠近一百英尺，她就会立刻跳起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And complain to us that we didn't do the same. But that's why we love her. She was one of a kind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且责怪我们没有做同样的事。但那就是为什么我们爱她。她是独一无二的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Pastor Lies [11018754] (mod) Quest : ([11006208]aaaHopesQuest3DNPC) Hope Lies EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got a friend I'd like you to meet. A sniper rifle, actually, which is about as good a friend as you'll find.
ESP.TRADUIT: 向你介绍一个朋友。一把狙击步枪，可以说是你能找到的最好的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's got a good build, and good range. She'll reach out and touch a guy from half a mile away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她的结构很好，射程也不错。她能在半英里外击中目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the best part about her is her name. I call her Payback, because she's one hell of a bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但她最棒的地方是她的名字。我叫她报复，因为她真是个狠角色。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110008E3]vvVincentFollowerQuest) Vincent's Follower Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么想法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101B86C]vvVincentCampfireQuest) Vincent Starts A Fire EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set up a campfire, Vincent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 文森特，生个篝火。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, no can do. It's kind of close in here, if you hadn't noticed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，没办法。这里有点挤，你没注意到吗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101B86C]vvVincentCampfireQuest) Vincent Starts A Fire EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you make a campfire?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你为什么不生篝火呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I already got it going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经生好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101B86C]vvVincentCampfireQuest) Vincent Starts A Fire EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why don't you make a campfire?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你为什么不生篝火呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Essential] Do whatever you can to stay alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: [基础内容] 尽你所能维持生命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hope [11001934] (mod) Quest : ([110039E4]aaaHopeCompanionQuest) Hope Companion Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Non-Essential] Fight to the death if you have to.
ESP.TRADUIT: [非基础内容]如果有必要，就拼死战斗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right, I could do with some shuteye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我可以小睡一会儿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101F1B8]vvVincentShuteyeQuest) Vincent Gets Some Shuteye EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get some sleep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去睡一会。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right behind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟在你身后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1101F1B8]vvVincentShuteyeQuest) Vincent Gets Some Shuteye EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该出发了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey doc!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，医生！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pretty busy. Is there something you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我挺忙的。有什么需要帮忙的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Usanagi [000EC7A3] (file) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure there is. I need you to take a look at this injury.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然有。我需要你看看这个伤口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {examines him}
ESP.TRADUIT: {检查他}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Usanagi [000EC7A3] (file) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look fine to me. I hope this isn't drug seeking behavior.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来没什么问题。我希望这不是在找借口要药物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Usanagi [000EC7A3] (file) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aw doc, you mean you didn't hear the sound of heartbreak when I walked in through the door and saw you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎呀，医生，你是说我走进门看到你的时候，你没听到我心碎的声音吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm assuming you're referring to mental trauma. Have you ever considered getting your head checked?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你指的是心理创伤。你有没有考虑过检查一下你的脑子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Usanagi [000EC7A3] (file) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh. As a matter of fact, I genuinely need your services.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呵，事实上，我真的需要你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. You might want to brace yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你可能要做好准备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Usanagi [000EC7A3] (file) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {flourishes needle}This might get a bit painful.
ESP.TRADUIT: {拿出针头}这可能会有点痛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Usanagi [000EC7A3] (file) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa whoa! Okay, maybe I'll just stick to a dozen Jet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哇！好吧，也许我还是坚持用那些杰特吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really ought to avoid using those kinds of chems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的应该避免使用这种药品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Usanagi [000EC7A3] (file) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I completely agree.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完全同意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Usanagi [000EC7A3] (file) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh okay. Another time, doc.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，好吧，下次见，医生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，拿去吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey...uh, could you cough up a few caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿...呃，你能给我点瓶盖吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, I owe you one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，我欠你一个人情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing.(200 caps)
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然可以。（200瓶盖）

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess it isn't my day, huh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得今天不在状态，哼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I don't have that much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我没有那么多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me blunt. I've got people to care for. I'm a busy woman. Go away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我直说吧。我得照顾别人。我是个大忙人。走开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Usanagi [000EC7A3] (file) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry but I can't give you meds for nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉，我不能免费给你药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Usanagi [000EC7A3] (file) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, okay. Another time, doc.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，好吧，下次再见，医生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me blunt. I've got people to care for. I'm a busy woman. Go away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我直说吧。我得照顾别人。我很忙。走开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Usanagi [000EC7A3] (file) Quest : ([110258D5]vvVincentClinicSceneQuest) Vincent - Clinic Scene EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wooh, I must've died and gone to heaven!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，我肯定已经死了而且到了天堂！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110283FB]vvVincentEssentialQuest) Sets Vincent essential in Hardcore Mode EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we should talk about how reckless you should be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为我们应该讨论一下你应该有多鲁莽。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常正确。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110283FB]vvVincentEssentialQuest) Sets Vincent essential in Hardcore Mode EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go in guns blazing, we only live once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 全力冲锋，我们只有一条命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit's getting hairier than a gorilla in a bear suit. Let's do our best not to rattle the cages.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这破事比穿着熊装的大猩猩还要棘手。我们得尽量不要打草惊蛇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Roger that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([110283FB]vvVincentEssentialQuest) Sets Vincent essential in Hardcore Mode EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try and stay alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽力活下去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Neither here nor there, my friend. Unless by "there" you're talking about the Republic of New California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不重要，朋友。除非你说的“那里”是指NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never asked you, where are you from originally?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来没问过你，你原本是哪里人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, most people say if you want to make your fortune, "Go west young man." Well, if I went west I'd walk right into the fucking ocean.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，大多数人说，如果你想发财，“往西走，年轻人”。可是，如果我往西走，我会直接走进他妈的海里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I went east. Then north. Then who the fuck knows. Pretty soon you're just going in circles, until the day you go six feet down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我往东走。然后往北。然后谁他妈知道呢。很快你就只会在绕圈子，直到你去世的那一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What brought you all the way out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么把你带到这里的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No buckaroo, I reckon that's one place I'll never be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，哥们儿，我觉得那是我永远不会去的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate to break it to you, but after the shit we've done, we'll be playing cards with the devil until the shit freezes over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不想打击你，但在我们干了那些破事之后，我们会一直陷入麻烦之中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You could go a thousand feet up. You know, to heaven.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以往上走一千英尺。你懂的，去天堂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the thing. We know that karma's bill is coming. Only thing different is how we pay it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是，我们都知道因果报应迟早会来。唯一不同的是我们怎么偿还。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But rest assured, whether it's out here or down there, no bad deed will go unpunished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但请放心，无论是在这里还是在地狱，不做坏事就不会受惩罚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear you. We're all headed to the same place, just taking different routes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白。我们都朝着同一个地方，只是走的路不同。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That it is. Doesn't matter if you're going in or out, up or down...
ESP.TRADUIT: 确实如此。不管你是进是出，是上是下...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's all one big conga line and you're just trying your darndest not to step out of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这都是一条巨大的康加舞队列，而你只是拼尽全力不被挤出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought going in circles was your thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为绕圈子是你的强项。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is, and it isn't. No matter where you go, you see the same shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，但也不是。无论你去哪里，你都会看到同样的破事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't matter if you're a man in California or a bug on a windshield. Life will hit you where it hurts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你个加州人还是在挡风玻璃上的虫子，生活都会打击你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: California's a long way from here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 加州离这里很远。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mean besides death by orgasm? Shit, to be honest, I don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说除了死于高潮之外？妈的，说实话，我不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This world, man...these wastes...this all here is some biblical shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个世界...这些废土...这一切都像是圣经里的破事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The nukes, that was our original sin. And maybe we're all redeemers, just trying to set things right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 核弹，那是我们的原罪。也许我们都是救赎者，只是想把事情弄对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it too late for us? Yeah, probably. But maybe hundreds of years from now, mankind will finally be in the black.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我们来说太晚了吗？是啊，可能吧。但也许几百年后，人类终于会有盈余。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So to answer your question, it doesn't matter how I go. I just hope that when my time comes, I can face the tax man, and tell him I've paid my share.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以回答你的问题，不管我怎么走，我只希望当我的日子到了，我能面对收税人，告诉他我已经付清了我的份额。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When it's your time, how do you want to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你的日子到了，你想怎么离开？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mind if we slow down for a sec? I think I need to take five. Make that twenty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你介意我们稍微慢一点吗？我觉得我需要休息五分钟。不如就二十分钟吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: In fact, I might just drop dead right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，我可能就要在这里倒下了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Agh, it's just I'm dealing with half a lung. Took a bullet in my chest about five years back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，就只是我只能用半个肺罢了。大概五年前胸口中了一枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's another reason I quit being courier. Can't go a couple miles without getting winded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这也是我不再做邮差的另一个原因。走不了几英里就喘不过气来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You okay? What's wrong?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还好吗？怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not about distance, really. You know how some people got a trick knee? Well, I got a trick lung.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它跟距离无关，真的。你知道有些人有膝盖问题吗？呃，我有肺问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got a bullet wedged in there three inches deep. Every now and then it decides to make a fuss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有颗子弹卡在了里面，深入三英寸。时不时就会发作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Already? We've barely moved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就不行了吗？我们还没走几步。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Roger that, bucko. If I go down, I'll be sure to keep my asshole clenched.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收到，老兄。 如果我倒下了，我肯定会握紧我的屁眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then again, this bullet in my chest - it's been trying to kill me for years and hasn't done it yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，这颗在我胸口里的子弹 - 它已经试图杀我好几年了，但还没成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, try not to evacuate yourself when you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你这样的时候尽量不要退缩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, funny story behind it too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，这背后还有个有趣的故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, as a courier, you got to make a lot of raw deals just to survive. Sometimes I paid in caps, other times I paid in blood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，作为一个邮差，为了生存你得做很多不公平的交易。有时候我用瓶盖交易，有时候用血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But this was different. Thing is, the guy who owns this bullet - he wasn't trying to shoot it. He was trying to smuggle it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这次不一样。事情是这样的，这颗子弹的主人 - 并不是要射出它。他是想偷运它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got a bullet lodged in your chest?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你胸口有颗子弹卡着？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A couple of gangs were calling a truce. They were gonna meet in this old war museum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几个帮派在谈停战协议。他们打算在一个老战争博物馆见面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a single gun in the whole place, save for the one in the display case.
ESP.TRADUIT: 整个地方一把枪都没有，除了展览柜里的那把。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, guns like that don't come with any bullets. So this chief, he gets an idea to smuggle one inside a courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，像那样的枪是没有子弹的。所以这个头目想到了一个主意，用邮差偷运一个进来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you mean, he was trying to smuggle it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的意思是，他想偷运子弹？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A free ride through his part of the wastes. Was a pretty good deal, seeing as he'd be in charge of most of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 穿过他那片废土的免费通行权。考虑到他负责大部分区域，这是个不错的交易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you get in exchange?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你得到了什么作为交换？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We shared the same dealer. I mean shit, how else do people know each other?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有同一个供货商。废话，人们之间不都是这么认识的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you meet this raider chief?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么认识这个掠夺者头目的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck if I know. But I figured it was good enough to do the job. You don't get in a museum without killing someone famous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈也不知道。但我觉得这已经够完成这项工作了。不杀掉某个有名的人是进不了博物馆的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of gun was it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么样的枪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was supposed to show up in the middle of the meeting, like it was part of my route.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本应该在会议进行到一半的时候露面，就像这是我的常规路线一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The idea was to take me aside and start working me over, and cut the bullet out in the process.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的主意是把我拉到一边，开始殴打我，然后在这过程中剜出子弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only it sank in there pretty good and the chief, he pushed it down further till it popped right into my lung.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是子弹深入得很厉害，那个头目，他把它推得更深，直到它直接进入了我的肺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the end, I don't know what he pulled out, but I'll tell you this. It wasn't a bullet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，我不知道他拔出了什么，但我告诉你。那不是一颗子弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was the plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 计划是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pretty much what you'd expect. The raider chief grabs this dusty old pistol and fires.
ESP.TRADUIT: 基本上就是你能料到的。那个掠夺者头目拿起这把满是尘土的旧手枪开火。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the shot doesn't do anything, the two chiefs end up trying to beat the shit out of each other. That’s when I managed to crawl out the back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当开枪没有起到作用时，两个头目最后尝试互相殴打。那时我设法从后面爬了出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Long story short, now I got a bullet in my chest and two raider gangs who want me dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 长话短说，现在我胸口里有一颗子弹，还有两个掠夺者帮派想要我死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([1103E1A5]vvVincentConversations) Bonus Conversations EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened then?
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This reminds me of a place back west. One of those old banjo towns where you can't tell the moonshine from the motor oil.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这让我想起了西部的一个地方。那种老式的班卓镇，你分辨不出私酿酒和机油。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only the people there had bald heads and shaggy beards, like their faces were upside down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是那里的人光头秃顶，胡须蓬乱，就像他们的脸颠倒了过来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent [110008D6] (mod) Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some people say crows are a bad omen. You see one, and it's a sign that someone's gonna die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人说乌鸦是不祥之兆。你看到一只，就意味着有人要死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what else is a bad omen? A hive of angry radscorpions. I'll take my chances with the crows.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道还有什么是不祥之兆？一窝愤怒的辐射蝎。我宁愿和乌鸦打交道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([11004B9A]vvVincentIdleChatter) Vincent's Locational Comments EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: While Hope is a companion, your chances of chem addiction is decreased by 50% and your health recovery increases by 10%.

ESP.TRADUIT: 货到付款

ESP.ORIGINAL: While Vincent is your companion, both of you temporarily gain 20 extra Action Points and much greater Damage Threshold when you drop below 50% Health.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当文森特是你的同伴，且你的生命值低于 50% 时，你们都会暂时获得 20 点额外行动点和更高的DT。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave the elevator alone.

ESP.TRADUIT: 墓碑标记

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here lies Art Seager. Died 2281.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里安息着阿特·西格。卒于 2281 年。

ESP.TRADUIT: 墓碑标记

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the cross are carved two words. "Fuck Goodsprings."
ESP.TRADUIT: 十字架上刻着几个字。 “去你妈的清泉镇。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grave Marker
ESP.TRADUIT: 墓碑标记

ESP.ORIGINAL: The marker has no name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 标记没有名字。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Grave Marker
ESP.TRADUIT: 墓碑标记

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope has gone home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 霍普已经回家了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope has gone to the Lucky 38 Suite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 霍普已经去了幸运38套房。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost Hope's Blithe Spirit perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经失去了霍普的“快乐的精灵”能力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope has given you the Blithe Spirit perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 霍普给了你“快乐的精灵”能力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You find the orchid, but it's rooted in deep. It would take considerable time and effort to remove.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找到了兰花，但它扎根很深。移除需要花费大量的时间和精力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Check on Hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检查霍普。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attempt to dig out the roots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尝试挖出根部。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use your remaining strength to pull the orchid out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用你剩下的力气把兰花拔出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope is unconscious. The radiation sickness is getting worse by the second.
ESP.TRADUIT: 霍普失去意识了。辐射病每秒钟都在恶化。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Check on the orchid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检查兰花。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pick her up and take her out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把她抱起来，带她离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attempt to lift her up and take her out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尝试把她抬起并带她离开这里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exhausted, you find her too heavy to lift. It doesn't appear Hope will survive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你精疲力尽，发现她太重了，抬不动。霍普似乎活不下去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After digging out the roots, it's likely you can remove the orchid. However, it will require most of your remaining strength.
ESP.TRADUIT: 挖出根部后，你很可能可以把兰花移走。然而，这将需要你大部分剩余的力量。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Check on Hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检查霍普。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attempt to dig out the roots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尝试挖出根部。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pull the orchid out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把兰花拔出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't have the time or strength to remove the orchid with Hope on your back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你背着霍普，没有时间和精力去移走兰花。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You put Hope over your shoulder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把霍普搭在肩上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have received the Cash On Delivery perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你获得了“货到付款”能力。
